src_text: Lulawulo lwenhlekelele ngemuva kwetikhukhula.
tgt_text: Ndangulo ya tshiwo nga murahu ha miḓalo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalisa kudzabuka kwayo kubo bonkhe bantfu labalahlekelwe tihlobo tabo labatitsandzako kuletikhukhula letidale umonakalo letisandza kwenteka letikhahlamete tincenye letinyeti telive letfu, ikakhulu KwaZulu-Natal..     Kumenyetelwa kwetingenelelo tekuhhamula Simo Savelonkhe Senhlekelele netingenelelo tetenhlalomnotfo letisandza kumenyetelwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kuhloswe ngato kucinisekisa kuphendvula lokuhlanganisiwe nalokunemphumelelo kuyo yonkhe imikhakha yahulumende, ngekusebentisa Sikhungo Savelonkhe Sekulawula Tenhlekelele.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo swikisa maipfi ndiliso kha vhathu vhoṱhe vhe vha ṱutshelwa nga  vhafunwa vhavho kha miḓalo ye ya vhanga tshinyalelo khulwane ine ya kha ḓi tou bva vha hone zwenezwino kha zwipiḓa zwo fhambanaho zwa shango ḽashu, nga maanḓa ngei KwaZulu-Natal..     Zwa ḓivhadzwa ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka na maga thuso ya ṱhaḓulo kha zwa ikonomi na matshilisano zwe zwa itwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa, zwo livhiswa kha vhona uri hu khou vha na maga khwaṱhaho nahone tshimbidzwaho zwavhuḓi vhukati ha masia oṱhe muvhuso hu tshi shumiswa  Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo ya Lushaka.

src_text: Sigidzigidzi sinye semarandi hulumende lasente kutsi sitfolakale sisetjentiselwa kwesekela kuhhamula nemitamo yekuvusetela kabusha, kubuyisela esimeni tinsita letisisekelo kanye nekuniketa lusito lwebuntfu ngendlela yekudla, emanti, kuhanjiswa kwekungcola kanye netimphahla tekugcoka.
tgt_text: Masheleni linganaho R1 biḽioni a ṋetshedzwa nga muvhuso khou shumiswa kha tikedza ndingedzo dza mvusuluso na ṱhaḓulo vhuedzedza tshumelo dza mutheo khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa vhuthu nga vha ṋea zwiḽiwa, maḓi, vhudzulo, tshumelo dza vhuthathazwitzhili na zwiambaro..     Mushumo wa dovha fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa fhethu ho tshinyadzwaho nga miḓalo kati, ngeno vhathu vha shango ḽashu vha tshi khou farana vha vha ṅanda nthihi kha vhuḓiimiseli havho ha thusa avho vho tshinyalelwaho nga mahaya na thundu dzavho.

src_text: Lenchubo yekwakha kabusha tindzawo letitsintsekile seyivele icalile njengaloku bantfu belive lakitsi babumbana ekuncumeni kutsi basite labo labalahlekelwe ngemakhaya abo naloko labanako.
tgt_text: Mafhungo maswa nga ha Vhulwadze ha Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).

src_text: Lokusha mayelana neSifo seLigciwane leKhorona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha khathihi na vhilaedzwa nga engedzea ha zwenezwino  ha tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwa kavhiwa nga vairasi ya COVID-19 kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa  shango nahone khou  ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha dzhie maga tsireledzo itela ḓitsireledza kha vairasi iyi re khombo ngaurali, nga maanḓa nga tshifhinga tsha vhuriha.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikucaphele ngekukhatsateka kwenyuka lokusandza kwenteka kwelufu lwe-COVID-19 kuletinye tincenye futsi icela bonkhe bantfu kutsi batsatse tinyatselo tekutivikela kuleligciwane lelibulalako, ikakhulu ngalesikhatsi sasebusika.
tgt_text: Vairasi iyi khou bvela phanḓa na vha khombo tshifhinga tshoṱhe nahone muhaelo ndi wone une swika zwino wa vha tshone tshiṱhavhane tsha vhuhali tsha ḓitsireledza.

src_text: Leligciwane solomane lisasenebungoti lobungapheli kantsi kugoma kusikhali lesiyimphumelelo lenkhulu sekutsi sitivikele.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri vhunzhi ha vhathu vha khou bvela phanḓa na nanga muhaelo sa tshone tshipileli tshavho tsha thoma kha COVID-19 nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dzo sumbedza uri ro swika kha ḽiga ḽa nṱhesa ḽa fhirisa phesenthe dza 50 dza vhaaluwa vho haelwaho kha mavunḓu maṱanu.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ijabulile kubona bantfu labanyenti bachubeka nekukhetsa kugoma njengendlela yekucala yekutivikela ku-COVID-19 ngemuva kwelubalobalo lolusandza kwentiwa lolukhomba kutsi sesifinyelele ngetulu kwe-50 yemaphesenti ebantfu labadzala lasebagomile etifundzeni letisihlanu..     Ikhabhinethi icela labo labasengakagomi kutsi bagome kute bativikele kanye nalabatsandzekako babo.

Kufanele kutsi sonkhe sichubeke nekugcina tonkhe tinchubo tekutivikela ku-COVID-19, lokufaka ekhatsi kufaka sifonyo lesivala imphumulo nemlomo, sigeze tandla ngemanti nangensipho, nome sisebentise sibulalimagciwane sekugeza tandla lesine-70% ye-alkhoholi, kanye nekugcina libanga lekuchelelana leliphephile lokungenani libe imitha yinye..     Sibonelelo Sahulumende Sekuhhamula Inhlupheko (i-SRD).
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha avho vhane vha athu haelwa uri vha ite ngauralo itela uri vha kone ḓitsireledza khathihi na tsireledza vhafunwa vhavho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi igcugcutele takhamuti letitfola sibonelelo sahulumende sekuhhamula inhlupheko kutsi tiphindze futsi tifake ticelo, ngemuva kwekungeniswa kwemitsetfosimiso lemisha lelawula ticelo kanye nekufaneleka kutfola lesibonelelo sahulumende.
tgt_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra bvela phanḓa na tevhedza milayo yoṱhe ya thivhela dwadze ḽa COVID-19, hu tshi katelwa na zwa ambara maski une wa thivhedza mulomo na ningo ṱamba zwanḓa nga maḓi na tshisibe kana shumisa sanithaiza ya zwanḓa re na aḽikhohoḽi linganaho 70%, khathihi na sia tshikhala tshi linganaho mithara muthihi vhukati hau na muṅwe muthu..     Magavhelo Ṱhaḓulo ya Thambulo  kha Vhadzulapo (SRD) .

src_text: Ticelo tingafakwa kuwebhusayithi ye-Ejensi Yesibonelelomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA ku: https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo vha wanaho Magavhelo masheleni linganaho R350 SRD uri vha dovhe vha ite khumbelo hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha musi ho thoma shumiswa milayo miswa langaho zwa itwa ha khumbelo idzi khathihi na zwa vha muthu tewaho nga wana magavhelo aya.

src_text: Luhlelo lwekufaka ticelo luvulwe mhla tinge-23 Mabasa 2022 kantsi lusebentisa ngalokuphelele inchubo yedijithali kute kutsi kutsatse sikhatsi sekukuphendvula lesiphangisako..     Lesibonelelomali sekuhhamula siyinetha yekuphephela lemcoka yemindeni leswelako lengabe ikhahlabetwe buphuya nekuswela umsebenti.
tgt_text: Khumbelo dzi nga itwa kha webusaithi ya Zhendedzi ḽa Thuso ya zwa Masheleni kha Vhadzulao ḽa Afrika Tshipembe (SASSA) ine ya vha https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Hulumende utimisele kuniketa lusito lwetenhlalo kulabo abahlaseleka lula kakhulu kute kutsi bakhone kuhlangabetana netidzingo tabo letisisekelo.
tgt_text: Sisiṱeme ya ita khumbelo yo vula nga ḽa 23 Lambamai 2022 nahone khumbelo  dzenedzo dzi itwa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho ya didzhithaḽa hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone  wanala phindulo nga ṱavhanya..     Magavhelo ṱhaḓulo tshikwama tsha ndeme tsha thuso ya zwa masheleni kha miṱa shayaho ye ya vha tshi ḓo vha kha nyimele konḓaho vhukuma nga mulandu wa vhushai na shayea ha mishumo.

src_text: Tekuphepha Nekuvikeleka.
tgt_text: Muvhuso wo ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa matshilisano kha avho vha sa koni ḓiitela uri na vhone vha kone swikela ṱhoḓea dzavho dza mutheo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyachubeka nekuhlaba kubulawa kwabomake lokute ingcondvo futsi iyakwemukela kuphendvula ngekushesha lokwentiwe tiphatsimandla tekucinisekisa kugcinwa kwemtsetfo ngekubamba basolwa labayamaniswa nekufa kwaMk.
tgt_text: Tsireledzo na Vhutsireledzi.

src_text: Hillary Gardee (28), waKamagugu eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou bvela phanḓa na sasaladza zwa vhulawa ha vhafumakadzi nga nḓila ya tshiṱuhu nahone khou dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhukando ho dzhiwaho nga ṱavhanya nga vhaofisiri vha zwa mulayo ha fara vhahumbulelwa malugana na lufu lwa Mufumakadzi Vho Hillary Gardee (28), vha fhaḽa Kamagugu kha ḽa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ichubeka futsi ngekuhlaba sento sekubulawa kwebantfu labasitfupha eKhayelitsha, eKapa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya sasaladza mabulayo vhathu vha rathi ngei Khayelitsha, hune ha vha fhaḽa Cape Town.

src_text: Lokubulala lokute ingcondvo kuyinkhumbuto yekutsi kufanele sente kakhulu njengemmango kute sicedze budlova kanye nebudlova lobucondziswe ebulilini lobutsite kanye nekubulawa kwalabasikati (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Mabulayo aya tshiṱuhu ngaurali tou vha tshihumbudzi tsha uri hu kha ḓi vha na zwinzhi zwine ra kha ḓi tea ita sa vhadzulapo itela fhelisa zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi khathihi na khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu hu tshi katelwa na mabulayo vhathu vha tshifumakadzi (GBVF)..     Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe fhano shangoni uri vha shumisane na muvhuso kha lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga na GBVF.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi igcugcutela bonkhe bantfu lapha eveni kutsi basebentisane nahulumende ekulweni nebugebengu kanye ne-GBVF.
tgt_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu khathihi na magondo ashu vhe tsireledzeaho kha vhathu vhoṱhe, hu tshi katelwa vhaaluwa, vhafumakadzi na vhana..     Ikonomi.

src_text: Ngekubambisana singasenta siciniseko sekutsi imimango yetfu kanye netitaladi tetfu tiphephile kubo bonkhe bantfu, lokufaka ekhatsi bantfu lasebakhulile, bomake nebantfwana.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa lwa tshiofisi ha ḽimaga ḽa foroma zwidina ḽa Corobrik Kwastina ngei Driefontein kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 4 Shundunthule.

src_text: Temnotfo.
tgt_text: Ḽimaga iḽi ḽa maimo nṱha ḽi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R800 miḽioni, zwine hezwi zwa khou tshimbila khathihi na maṅwe masheleni linganaho R200 miḽioni ane khou lavhelelwa ḓo engedza mishumo ya khonkhirithi ya vha ha Corobrik ngei KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kuvulwa ngalokusemtsetfweni kwefekthri yekubhaka titini yakwa-Corobriks i-Kwastina lapha eDriefontein eGauteng nguMengameli Ramaphosa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla ti-4 Inkhwekhweti.
tgt_text: Corobrik ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mabindu fhano hayani a fhindula khuwelelo ya Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ye vha ita kha mabindu fhano Afrika Tshipembe na dzitshaka uri bindudze kha ikonomi ya ḽino shango.

src_text: Lefekthri lesezingeni lemhlaba yakha incenye yelutjalomali lwetigidzi letinge-R800, loluhamba kanye naletinye tigidzi letinge-R200 letibekelwe kusebenta ngakhonkolo kwe-Corobrik lelapha KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha zwa uri ikonomi ya gesemaḓi ine ya khou  aluwa yo wana thikhedzo khulwane nga rwelwa ṱari ha tshiendedzi tsha ṱhiraka shumisaho gesemaḓi nga vha ha Anglo American.

src_text: I-Corobrik ingulenye yemabhizinisi lamanyenti endzawo laphendvulile kulesimemo lesentiwe nguMengameli Ramaphosa kumabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika kanye nakumabhizinisi emave emhlaba kutsi atjale timali kulelive..     Ikhabhinethi ikucaphele kutsi lomnotfo lomusha longakhiphi ikhabhoni lenyenti ugcugcutelekile ngesikhatsi kwetfulwa iloli lehamba ngemandla ehayidrojini baka-Anglo American.
tgt_text: Tshiendedzi itshi tsha ṱhiraka, tshe tsha shandukiswa bva kha tsha shumisa diziḽi ya kha tsha gesemaḓi, nahone tshi shumisa na beṱiri dza lithium-ion, tshi tou vha tshone tsha thoma ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Leloli − lebeyihamba ngedizili yantjintjelwa kutsi ihambe ngehayidrojini, futsi ihamba ngencenye yemandla emabhethri e-lithium-ion – isezingeni lekucala lemhlaba.
tgt_text: Ikonomi ya gesemaḓi yo ṱaluswa sa tshithu tsha ndeme kha ikonomi sa tshikafhadzi mupo wa shango ḽashu khathihi na kha ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi na sika mishumo..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafu ya ṱanganedza vhuṅwe vhubindudzi kha ikonomi yashu bva kha khamphani ya zwiḽiwa ya Ireland ine ya ḓivhiwa sa The Kerry Group ye ya vula ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽi ḓuraho masheleni swikaho R650-miḽioni ngei Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal ḽiṋe ḽa ḓo bveledza zwiḽiwa zwine zwa nga shumiswa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kha dzhango ḽa Afrika.

src_text: Umnotfo wehayidrojini ubonakale njengelisubuciko lelibekwe embili kutsi kucalwe ngalo kumnotfo lonekhabhoni lephasi walelive, kanye nekuchubela embili kukhula kutemnotfo nekucashwa..     Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela lolunye lutjalomali kumnotfo wetfu lolwentiwe yinkampani yekudla yase-Ireland, i-The Kerry Group, lesungule sikhungomkhicito lesisha setigidzi letinge-R650 lapha eHammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal lokuhloswe ngaso kutsi kukhicitwe kudla lokusimeme kwalelivekati.
tgt_text: Heḽi ndi ḽimaga ḽo khetheaho ngauri ḽi na zwishumiswa zwinzhi zwo khwaṱhaho zwine zwa katela na zwishumiswa zwi shumisaho fulufulu ḽiṱuku, vhubveledzi ha fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha masana ḓuvha itela fhungudza shumiswa ha muḓagasi bvaho kha netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya henefho fhethu kuvhanganywa ha mufhiso wo no shumaho kuvhanganywa ha maḓi nga nḓila yavhuḓi shumisa hafhu na phungudzo.

src_text: Lesikhungomkhicito sehlukile ngobe sikhombisa timphawu letinyenti tekusimama lokufaka ekhatsi tisetjentiswa letisebentisa emandla agezi lamancane, kuphehlwa kwemandla elilanga kute kuncishiswe kusetjentiswa kwemandla agezi kugridi yendzawo, konga kulahleka kwekushisa, kanye nekubamba emanti ngemphumelelo, kuwasebentisa futsi nekunciphisa kungcola.
tgt_text: Ḽimaga ḽa The Kerry Group ḽo vha hone fhano Afrika Tshipembe bva nga ṅwaha wa 2011, nahone vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa vhune ḽa vhu ita ndi tshiga tsha uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kha ḓi vha fhethu havhuḓi ha ita zwa vhubindudzi.

src_text: I-Kerry Group yafika lapha eNingizimu Afrika kusukela nga-2011, kantsi kuchubeka kwayo nelutjalomali kuluphawu lwekutsi iNingizimu Afrika iyindzawo yelutjalomali longatikhetsela yona.
tgt_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu khou vha hone nga murahu ha rwelwa ṱari zwa magwa ha tshiendedzi tsha luṱanḓala tsha Isuzu D-Max ngei Gqeberha kha ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha ṅwedzi wo fhelaho.

Lushaka luswa lwa D-Max lu khwaṱhisedza vhuḓiimiseli ha vha ha Isuzu kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nahone ndi iṅwe ya mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa nga fhasi ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mveledziso ya Vhubveledzi ha Mimoḓoro (APDP).

src_text: Lolutjalomali lulandzela etinyatselweni tekwetfulwa kweveni i-Isuzu D-Max leyakhiwe kulelive eGqeberha eMphumalanga Kapa kulenyanga lephelile.
tgt_text: APDP ndi tshikimu tsha magavhelo vhubveledzi kha nḓowetshumo ya mimoḓoro tsho livhiswaho kha ṱuṱuwedza vhubveledzi nga vhunzhi kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa mimoḓoro yo tiwaho ṱuṱuwedza nyengedzedzo ya ndeme kha tshipiḓa tsha nḓowetshumo ya zwa mimoḓoro  zwine hezwi zwa  fhedza nga sika mishumo kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhubveledzi ha mimoḓoro nga angaredza.

src_text: Lesitukulwane lesisha sema-D-Max siluphawu lwekutinikela kwe-Isuzu lapha eNingizimu Afrika futsi ingulenye  yetimphumelelo letifezekisiwe ngaphasi kweLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Kukhicitwa Kwetimoto (i-APDP).
tgt_text: Masheleni swikaho R2,8 biḽioni ḓo bveledzwa kha zwa vhubveledzi ha zwibveledzwa zwa fhano hayani nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi APDP tshi kha ḓi vha hone.

src_text: Le-APDP iluhlelo lekukhutsata kukhicita lokucondziswe embonini yetimoto lokuhloswe ngalo kugcugcutela umkhicito ngebunyenti kule mboni yetimotoe, ngekugcugcutela  lizingagugu lelengetiwe emkhakheni wemboni yetetimoto ngaleyo ndlela-ke kudaleke ematfuba emsebenti kutinchubo tekukhicita timoto.
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi uvhu vhu ḓo sika mishumo ya vhukuma fhiraho 1 000 kha ḽimaga ḽeneḽo ya dovha hafhu ya thola vhathu vha linganaho 24 000 henefho nga thungo tsini na ḽimaga, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo vha shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha bveledza zwitshavha henefho kha dzingu ḽeneḽo..     Indaba ya zwa Migodi.

src_text: Tilinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi leti-R. 8 letitawukwentiwa emkhicitweni welizingagugu walelive ngekusebentisa umjikeleto we-APDP.
tgt_text: Indaba ya Bindudza kha Migodi ya Afrika ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa  Cape Town International Convention Centre bva nga ḽa 9 swika nga ḽa 12 Shundunthule 2022, ndi tshiṅwe tsha tshikhala tshihulwane tsha nyambedzano na tshumisano vhukati ha vhashumisani vhoṱhe vha kwameaho zwa kha nḓowetshumo ya migodi.

src_text: Lolutjalomali lutawudala imisebenti ngco lengetulu kwe-1000 kulesosikhungomkhicito bese kutsi bantfu labange-24 000 bacashwe hhayi ngco, lokuyintfo letawufaka ligalelo lelimcoka ekutfutfukiseni lesifundza..     Ingcugcutsela Yetetimayini.
tgt_text: Thero ya vhuṱambo yo vha tshi ri: “Tshanduko kha zwa Migodi ya Afrika bindudza kha Tshanduko ya Fulufulu, ESG, na Dziikonomi”.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela yeLutjalomali Etimayini Tase-Afrika yanga-2022 lebeyibanjelwe eCape Town International Convention Centre kusukela ngamhla ti-9 kuya mhla ti-12 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ingulenye yetinkhundla letinkhulu kakhulu tekuchumana nekuhlanganyela emkhatsini walabatsintsekako embonini yetimayini.
tgt_text: Khabinethe na fulufhelo ḽa uri iyi Indaba ya zwa Migodi ḓo thusa kha ṱana bveledzisa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu ho teaho ita zwa vhubindudzi.

src_text: Ingcikitsi yalomcimbi beyitsi: “Kugucugucuka Kwetimayini e-Afrika: Kutjala Timali eKuntjintjeni Kutemandla, i-ESG neMinotfo.”.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ṱanganedza vhubindudzi kha shango ḽashu nahone ḽo ḓiimisela bveledza nyimele dzavhuḓi hu tshi itelwa nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na tshanduko ya ikonomi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi inelitsemba lekutsi leNgcungcutsela Yetetimayini itawusita ekukhombiseni nasekugcugcuteleni iNingizimu Afrika njengendzawo yelutjalomali longatikhetsela yona.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha dzingu na ha dzitshaka.

src_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika liyalwemukela lutjalomali lapha kulelive letfu futsi itimisele kudala timo letikuvunako loko kute kutsi kube nekukhula lokufaka wonkhe wonkhe kanye nekugcuculwa kwemnotfo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza nyambedzano dza zwenezwino dza vhukati ha Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa na Phresidennde Vho Joe Biden vha shango ḽa Amerika, Phresidennde Vho Emmanuel Macron vha ḽa Fura khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Hakainde Hichilema vha ḽa Zambia kha miṱangano yavho yo fhambanaho.

src_text: Budlelwane bemave emhlaba nebesigodzi.
tgt_text: Hedzi nyambedzano dzo ita uri Phresidennde vha kone khwaṱhisa vhushaka ha mashango mavhili khathihi na tshumisano vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na maṅwe mashango vhashumisani nga ha mafhungo ndeme dzitshaka na dzingu, hu tshi katelwa na wana thandululo ya mulalo kha nndwa ya fhaḽa Ukraine     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela kucocisana lokusandza kwenteka kwaMengameli Ramaphosa naMengameli Joe Biden waseMelika, Mengameli Emmanuel Macron waseFrance naMengameli Hakainde Hichilema waseZambiya ngetinkhundla tekuchumana letahlukene.
tgt_text: Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama.

src_text: Lokucocisana kwente kutsi Mengameli acinise budlelwane bemacembu lamabili kanye nekusebentisana emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika nemibuso lebalingani mayelana netindzaba letimcoka tesifundza netemave emhlaba, lokufaka ekhatsi kutfola likhambi lekuthula kuloludvweshu lwase-Ukraine     Tincumo teKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe ya uri vha thetshelese Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama nga mihasho ya muvhuso ya lushaka na Ofisi ya Phresidennde itela uri vha kone hwesa muvhuso vhuḓifhinduleli..     Nga tshifhinga tsha Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama, mihasho yoṱhe ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo zwa puḽane na zwipikwa zwayo zwa ṅwaha.

src_text: Emavoti eSabelomali.
tgt_text: Hedzi Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama ndi dzine dza lingedza vhona uri masheleni muvhuso khou shumiswa zwavhuḓi itela swikela ṱhoḓea dza vhadzulapo..     Dzi dovha hafhu dza ṋea tshikhala tsho teaho kha Dziminisṱa uri vha kone dodombedza nga vhuḓalo mushumo wa muvhuso, hu tshi katela na mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho khathihi na khaedu dzine dza vha hone..     Puḽane ya ṋetshedzwa ha Gese ya Peṱiroḽiamu yo Luḓifhadzwaho (LPG).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icela tonkhe takhamuti kutsi tilandzelele laMavoti lahlukahlukene eSabelomali lentiwa ngematiko ahulumende wavelonkhe kanye neLihhovisi laMengameli kutsi tente hulumende kutsi atilandze.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Puḽane ya ṋetshedzwa ha LPG  ye ya anḓadzwa itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe 2022 uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Ngesikhatsi seMavoti eSabelomali, onkhe ematiko anika inchazelo lenemininingwane yemasu awo kanye naloko lakubeke embili latawucala ngako akwente ngemnyaka.
tgt_text: Puḽane iyi ndi ine ya khou lingedza alusa nḓowetshumo iyi ya LPG kha shango.

src_text: EMavoti eSabelomali ahlose kucinisekisa kutsi timali tahulumende tisetjentiswa ngelikhono yini kuhlangabetana netidzingo temmango.
tgt_text: LPG ḓo shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha vha hone ha zwiko zwo fhambanaho zwa fulufulu..     Puḽane iyi, vhukati ha maṅwe maga u lugisa zwithu ḓo langa mitengo kha nḓowetshumo yoṱhe khathihi na tikedza vhubveledzi ha maboḓelo LPG kha shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya gudisa vhadzulapo nga ha mbuelo dza shumisa LPG sa luṅwe lushaka lwa fulufulu ḓo wanala nga murahu ha musi yo no anḓadzwa nga Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Minerala na Fulufulu kha www.dmr.gov.za.
Muhanga wa Maano Lushaka nga ha Mafulo U tsivhudza Vhathu nga ha Pfanelo dza  Vhuholefhali hu tshi itelwa Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.

src_text: LaMavoti aphindze futsi ente kutsi kube nenkhundla lefanele kutsi Tindvuna tichaze kabanti umsebenti wahulumende, lokufaka ekhatsi timphumelelo netinsayeya.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Maano Lushaka nga ha Mafulo U tsivhudza Vhathu nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhuholefhali hu tshi itelwa Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.

src_text: Kukhishwa kweLisubuciko lekwenta Igesi Leluketjeti (i-LPG).
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu ndi une wa khou lingedza eletshedza sekhithara dzoṱhe ya muvhuso na ya phuraivethe kha vhona uri pfanelo dza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dzi khou tsireledzwa, sa zwe zwa sumbedziswa kha Mulayotewa wa Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe wa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile Kukhishwa kweLisubuciko le-LPG kutsi lifezekiswe, lelashicilelwa ngeNdlovulenkhulu 2022 kutsi kubonisanwe ngalo nemmango.
Lelisubuciko kuhloselwe ngalo kutsi kwengetwe imboni ye-LPG kulelive.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza tshishumiswa tshine tsha ḓo thusa kha fheliswa ha zwikonḓisi zwa khethululo kha zwa dzhia tsheo, nga maanḓa idzo dzine dza elana na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dovha hafhu wa eletshedza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali uri vha ḓivhe nga ha pfanelo dzavho sa zwe dza tsireledzwa nga Mulayotewa.

src_text: I-LPG itawufaka ligalelo lelibonakalako ekwehlukaniseni imitfombolusito yetemandla..     Lelisubuciko emkhatsini waletinye tingenelelo, litawulawula intsengo yetinchubo temkhicito kanye nekwesekela kwakhiwa emabhodlela e-LPG kulelive.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza vhupfumbudzi, mivhigo kha nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na tsivhudza vhathu tshitshavhani nga ha pfanelo dza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dovha wa ita uri Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali thome shuma.

src_text: Litawuphindza futsi lifundzise ummango mayelana netinzuzo tekusebentisa i-LPG njengalenye indlela yetemandla.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽone ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango sainaho idzi Thendelano dza Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali khathihi na Maitele UN kha Thendelanomviswa ya Afrika ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu na Pfanelo dza Vhathu dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali (Maitele Pfanelo dza Vhuholefhali Afrika).

src_text: Lelisubiciko litawutfolakala ngemuva kwekutsi selishicilelwe Litiko Letetimbiwa Nemandla ku: www.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu wo vha hone nga murahu ha vhukwamani na vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho, hu tshi katelwa na vha Khoro ya Mveledziso ya Ikonomi na Mafhungo zwa Vhashumi ya Lushaka.

src_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lwavelonkhe Lwelisubuciko lolumayelana neMkhankhaso Wekuvusa Kucashelwa kweMalungelo Ekukhubateka eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo ha Nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iluvumile Luhlakamsebenti Lwavelonkhe Lwelisubuciko lolumayelana neMkhankhaso Wekuvusa Kucashelwa kweMalungelo eKukhubateka eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo Nnyi na nnyi nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 27 na Mugivhela, wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule 2022 kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti kuhloselwe ngalo kukhomba indlela imikhakha yomibili yahulumende naletimele ekucinisekiseni emalungelo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka kutsi ayavikeleka, njengaloku abhalwe kuMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Tsheo dza nga ha Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo ha Mavu Nnyi na nnyi nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe.
Yo ṋea ndaela ya uri hu dovhe hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na vhaṅwe vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lingumgodla lotawusita ekususeni tihibe letibandlululako ekutsatseni tincumo, ikakhulu leto letiphatselene nebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Muṱangano uyu ḓo vha wone maṱhakheni  mushumo we wa itwa ṅwaha wo fhiraho, we wa ita khumbelo ya mahumbulwa bva kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho vho fhambanaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Luphindze futsi lukhumbute bantfu labaphila nekukhubateka kutsi bati kutsi emalungelo abo avikelwe nguMtsetfosisekelo.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa Vhuṱanu wa nga ha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha Vhana.

src_text: Loluhlelomsebenti luphindze futsi lwente kutsi kube nekuceceshwa, betindzaba lababikako kanye nekuvusa kucaphelisa ummango mayelana nemalungelo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka..     Lunika emandla kutsi Umtsetfo Lokusakhulunyisanwa Ngawo lomayelana neBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ndi ḽone ḽine ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi ya Vhuṱanu wa nga ha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha Vhana fhaḽa Durban International Convention Centre kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal bva nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 15 swika Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 20 Shundunthule.

src_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika lisisayinile Sivumelwano saMhlabuhlangene (i-UN) lesimayelana neMalungelo eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka kanye neNchubo yaMhlabuhlangene kuMculu wase-Afrika lomayelana neLuntfu neMalungelo eBantfu mayelana neMalungelo eBantfu Labaphila Ngekukhubateka (Inchubo yase-Afrika yeBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka).
tgt_text: Ndi lwa tou thoma musi Dzangano ḽa zwa Vhashumi ḽa Dzitshaka (ILO) ḽi tshi farela muṱangano uyu fhano kha ḽa Afrika.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti kwabonisanwa ngalo nabo bonkhe labafanele labatsintsekako, lokufaka ekhatsi Tekutfutfukiswa Kwetemnotfo Nemkhandlu Webasebenti.
tgt_text: Vharangaphanḓa vha mashango, dziminisṱa vha swikaho 120, vhuimeli ha masia mararu ha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya ILO swikaho 187, mazhendedzi UN, zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo, madzangano vhadzulapo, madzangano ane sa vhe muvhuso, nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na vhadzulapo vha khou lavhelelwa vha hone kha muṱangano uyu.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela yeKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba Nemalungelo eBunikati Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlaba eTindzaweni teMmango.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo dovha hafhu ha ṋea  Afrika Tshipembe tshikhala tsha bvisela khagala Mulayotewa wa shango sa izwi tshi tsireledza pfanelo dza vhana.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kusingatfwa kweNgcungcutsela yeKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba neMalungelo eBunikati Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlaba eTindzaweni teMmango ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-27 nangeMgcibelo, mhla tinge-28 Inkhwekhweti 2022 eGauteng.
tgt_text: Shango ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa davhidzana na mashango fhambanaho ane no vha phanḓa fhirisa riṋe kha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha vhana hu itela uri ri kone vha na zwine ra nga guda bva kha mashango ayo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi isivumile Sitatimende Sesinyatselo Leme Kuso lesimayelana neKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba neMalungelo eBunikat Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlabai eTindzaweni teMmango  ngeNdlovulenkhulu nga-.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM).

src_text: Ifake sicondziso lesitsi kube nekubonisana lokuchubekako nalabanye labafanele labatsintsekako.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo fara Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya DDM ngei Mpumalanga nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 20 Shundunthule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A hu na ane tea sala murahu”.

src_text: Lengcungcutsela itawuba ngumphumela wemsebenti lowentiwe kulomnyaka lophelile, leyacela imibono kulabatsintsekako labahlukahlukene     Imicimbi Letako.
tgt_text: Sa tshikhala tsha ndeme tsha shela mulenzhe ha vhadzulapo, Imbizo iyi ṋea tshikhala Phresidennde tsha amba na vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho vho tou livhana navho, nga maanḓa zwitshavha zwa mahayani, khathihi na thetshelesa thaidzo dzavho na khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo itela uri dzi kone tandululwa.

src_text: Inkhomfa Yemhlaba Wonkhe Yesihlanu lemayelana neKucedza Kusebentisa Bantfwana.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya DDM yo livhiswa kha vula zwikhukhulisi zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo yo ṱanganelaho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza zwa shela mulenzhe ha vhadzulapo ya nga DDM.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawube isingatse Inkhomfa Yemhlaba Wonkhe Yesihlanu lemayelana neKucedza Kusetjentiswa Kwebantfwana letawube ise-Durban International Convention Centre KwaZulu-Natal kusukela ngeLisontfo, ti-15 kuya ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti.
tgt_text: MaAfrika Tshipembe vha nga tevhela na shela mulenzhe kha nyambedzano dza kha nyanḓadzamafhungo dza matshilisano nga fhasi ha hashtag #PresidentialImbizo.

src_text: Kwekucala kutsi Inhlangano Yemave Emhlaba Yebasebenti (i-ILO) kutsi isingatse lenkhomfa lapha e-Afrika..     Tinhloko temibuso, tindvuna leti-120, imikhandlu lemitsatfu yemave la-187 e-ILO, ema-ejensi e-UN, tikhungo temfundvo, tinhlangano temmango, tinhlangano letingekho ngaphasi kwahulumende, betindzaba nemmango ulindzeleke kutsi uyihambele lenkhomfa.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Afrika.

src_text: Lomcimbi utawuphindze wente kutsi iNingizimu Afrika igcamise Umtsetfosisekelo walelive njengaloku uvikela emalungelo ebantfwana.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ha Ṅwedzi wa Afrika na Ḓuvha ḽa Afrika nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 25 Shundunthule vhu khou pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Ṅwaha wa Pfushi khwaṱhisedza zwa konḓelela kha zwa pfushi na nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa na kha dzhango ḽa Afrika”..     Sa tshipiḓa tsha bono ḽa tshifhinga tshilapfu ḽe ḽa sumbedziswa kha Adzhenda ya 2063 (ine ya vha pulane ya mveledziso ya Afrika hu tshi itelwa swikela mveledziso ya ikonomi na matshilisano ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone katelaho vhathu vhoṱhe lwa miṅwaha fhiraho 50), thero iyi sedzesa kha vhukoni ha vhathu vha Afrika, nga maanḓa ho sedzeswa kha vhafumakadzi, vhatukana na vhasidzana khathihi na vhana.

src_text: Lelive litawuchumana nemave lahlukene lasembili kunatsi ekucedzeni kusetjentiswa kwebantfwana futsi sitawufundza kuwo.
tgt_text: Hezwi ndi zwa ndeme kha mveledziso sa zwi zwi tshi livhisa kha khwinifhadzea ha matshilo vhathu, mbuelo dza nṱha na miholo yo khwinifhadzeaho ya mashango.

src_text: Imbizo yaMengameli YeLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwetigodzi (i-DDM).
tgt_text: Tsha ndeme khulu nahone tshi vhonalesaho kha mabembela aya Ṅwedzi wa Afrika, ndi Vhege ya Vhudavhidzani ya Afrika, ine ya ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Constitutional Hill kha ḽa Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 23 swika ḽa 27 Shundunthule.

src_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawube asingatse Imbizo yaMengameli Yekutfutfukiswa Kwetigodzi ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti 2022 ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Ungashiyi namunye ngemuva”.

Njengendlela yenkhundla lemcoka yekutimbandzakanya kwemmango, leMbizo ivumela Mengameli kutsi achumane ngco nalabatsintsekako labahlukahlukene – ikakhulu imimango yasetindzaweni tasemaphandleni – kanye nekulalela tingcinamba tawo kanye netinsayeya ngenhloso yekutilungisa.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Afrika ndi tshikhala tsha ṱuṱuwedza vhuthihi ha Afrika khathihi na ṱhanganelo ya dzingu yo khwaṱhaho hu tshi katelwa na kumedzela hafhu Afrika kha vhuyo vhu fanaho.

src_text: LeMbizo yaMengameli Yekutfutfukiswa Kwesigodzi  ihlose kuvula lapho kuvaleke khona ekwetfuleni tinsita letihlanganisiwe kanye nekugcugcutela kutimbandzakanya kwemmango lokuhambisana ne-DDM.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou humbudza muthu muṅwe na muṅwe uri madzangalelo ashu lushaka ṱumana tshoṱhe na vhudziki ha Afrika, vhuthihi na mvelaphanḓa     Milaedza.

src_text: Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika bangalandzela lokwentekako futsi batimbandzakanye kuloko lokucocwako etinkhundleni tekuchumana ngaphasi kwe-hashtag letsi: #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Ndiliso     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza: Mufumakadzi Vho Phindile Xaba (53), vhe vha shuma tshifhinga tshilapfu kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa nyanḓadzamafhungo fhano Afrika Tshipembe na kha mashango seli.

src_text: Inyanga yase-Afrika.
tgt_text: Vho shuma vha sa neti vha tshi itela khwinifhadza shango ḽashu.

src_text: Kugujwa njalo ngemnyaka kweNyanga yase-Afrika neLusuku Lwase-Afrika ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-25 Inkhwekhweti lubungatwa ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Umnyaka Wekudla Lokunemsoco: Kucinisa likhono lekucina ekudleni lokunemsoco kanye nekubakhona kwekudla kulelivekati lase-Afrika”.
tgt_text: Muambasada Vho Silumko Sokupa (74), vhe vha shuma kha Zhendedzi ḽa Vhutsireledzi ha Muvhuso kha maimo fhambanaho nga tshifhinga tshilapfu tsha musi vha tshi khou shuma kha Tshumelo ya Muvhuso.Phrofesa Vho Francis Wilson (83), raikonomi ḓivheaho na mutumbuli wa Yunithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso dza Mveledziso na zwa Vhashumi ya Tshipembe ha Afrika  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu fhira nga fhasi ha khwaṱhisedzo ya ndalukano na ṱanzwiwa dzina ho teaho.

src_text: Njengencenye yembononchanti wesikhatsi lesidze lobhalwe ku-Ajenda 2063 (lokulisu lase-Afrika lekufezekisa intfutfuko yetemnotfo lefaka wonkhe wonkhe nalesimeme kwengca iminyaka lenge-50), lengcikitsi igcile emandleni lakhona ebantfu base-Afrika ekugcizeleleni kakhulu kubomake, kubantfu labasha nakubantfwana.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Kesavan Naidoo sa Tshanḓa tsha Mulangi Muhulwane (DDG): Mveledziso ya Tshiimiswa kha Muhasho wa Tshumisano ya Mavhusele (DCoG).

src_text: Loku kumcoka kutentfutfuko ngobe kuholela etimphilweni letentiwe ncono yalowo nalowo, inzuzo lenkhulu, kanye nemalingena lencono yemave..     Lokugcame kakhulu lokubonakalako kulemigubho yeNyanga yase-Afrika, Liviki lase-Afrika Letekuchumana, lelitawubanjelwa lapha e-Constitution Hill eJozi kusukela mhla tinge-23 kuya mhla tinge-27 Inkhwekhweti..     Inyanga yase-Afrika ilitfuba lekugcugcutela bunye base-Afrika kanye nekuhlanganiswa ngalokujulile kwesifundza, kanye nekutinikela futsi kwe-Afrika kuloko lephokopholele kufika kuko lokusifaka sonkhe.
tgt_text: Vho Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka sa DDG: Thikhedzo ya Muvhuso Wapo na Ndangulo ya Thusedzo kha DCoG..     Vho Risimati Patrick Mathye sa DDG: Ndangulo ya zwa Maḓi Tshumelo dza Vhuthathazwitzhili kha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS)..     Vho Collin Xolani Zwane sa DDG: Milayo, Vhutevhedza Milayo na Vhukombetshedzi kha DWS.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikhumbuta lowo nalowo kutsi timfuno tetfu tavelonkhe tihlangene nekusimama kwe-Afrika, bunye kanye nemphumelelo yayo     Imilayeto.
tgt_text: Vho Melanchton Makobe sa DDG: Khwaṱhisedzo ya Mavhusele na Mashumele  SOC kha Muhasho wa Mabindu Muvhuso     Khabinethe yo tendelana na Dziminisṱa nga ha tholwa hu tevhelaho:.

src_text: Kudzabuka Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kudzabuka kwayo emndenini nakubangani ba: Mk.
tgt_text: Vho Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa Khorondangi (CEO) wa Zhendedzi ḽa Mveledziso ya zwa Dzinnḓu (HDA).

src_text: Phindile Xaba (53), losebente sikhatsi lesidze futsi wasebenta ngemalengiso embonini yebetindzaba, lapha eNingizimu Afrika kanye nangesheya kwetilwandle.
tgt_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Joy Keledi Masemola sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa  zwa Masheleni  kha HDA..     Dokotela Vho Cornelius Ruiters sa CEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.

src_text: Imitamo yekuvuselela nekwakha kabusha ngemuva kwetikhukhula.
tgt_text: Ndingedzo dza vhuedzedza na dovha fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha miḓalo .

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kubonga lokukhulu kubo bonkhe bantfu netinhlangano letidlale indzima emitameni yekuvuselela kanye nekwakha kabusha ngemuva kwetikhukhula letisandza kwenteka kuletinye tincenye talelive, ikakhulukati KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khoḓa na livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe khathihi na madzangano ane khou ḓidzhenisa kha ndingedzo dza vhuedzedza na fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha miḓalo ya zwenezwino ye ya vhanga tshinyalelo khulwane kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa shango, nga maanḓa ngei KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Ibonge tonkhe tinhlangano letingekho ngaphasi kwahulumende, tinhlangano tetenkholo, imimango, bosomabhizinisi netinhlangano letisita imimango ngekudla, tingubo tekugcoka, tingubo tekulala, tinsita tekubuyisa sitfunti nekuhlonipheka kanye netinyifomu tesikolwa emindenini lekhahlabetekile kute kutsi ikhone kuhlangabetana netidzingo tayo letibalulekile..     Sikhungo Savelonkhe Setekulawula Kwetinhlekelele siyachubeka nekuchumanisa tonkhe tigaba tahulumende emitameni yaso yekusita ngelusito lwekuhhamula bantfu kuwo onkhe emakhaya latsintsekile.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya livhuwa madzangano oṱhe ane si vhe muvhuso, madzangano zwa vhurereli, vhadzulapo, vhoramabindu khathihi na madzangano ṱhaḓulo kha zwiimo zwi sa takadzi a ṋetshedza zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, mabai, zwishumiswa zwa vhathu vha tshifumakadzi na yunifomo ya tshikolo kha miṱa yo kwameaho uri vha kone swikela ṱhoḓea dzavho dza nga misi.

src_text: Tinsita tekukhosela tinikwa bantfu labangetulu kwe-7 000 etigodzini letine letikhahlabeteke kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal..     Sewucalile umsebenti wekwakhiwa kwetindlu tesikhashana temindeni lekhahlabetekile etindzaweni letingaphasi kwahulumende letikhonjiwe  KwaZulu-Natal kute kutsi tihlaliswe.
Ikhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutibophelela kwahulumende ekuphatseni timali telusito lwetikhukhula ngebuhlakani nangekungafihli lutfo.
tgt_text: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiwo ya Lushaka khou bvela phanḓa na ṱanganya masia oṱhe muvhuso kha ndingedzo dzayo dza ṋetshedza thuso ya ṱhaḓulo ya zwa vhuthu kha miṱa yoṱhe yo kwameaho.

src_text: Umcwaningimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika usita ngemsebenti wekulandzelela lowengetiwe kanye nekuhlela kabusha kusetjentiswa kwetimali lokufanele kutsi kubekwe embili ngekuhambisana neluhlelo lwahulumende lwesabelomali..     Takamuva mayelana neLigciwane leSifo seKhorona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Tshumelo dza zwa vhudzulo dzi khou ṋetshedzwa kha vhathu vha fhiraho 7 000 kha zwiṱiriki zwiṋa zwo kwameseaho ngei KwaZulu-Natal..     Mushumo kati wa fhaṱa vhudzulo ha tshifhinganyana hu tshi itelwa miṱa yo kwameaho kha mavu ane vha muvhuso a ḓo wanala fhaḽa kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal ane vhathu avho vha ḓo pfulutshela khao.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse bonkhe bantfu labaseNingizimu Afrika kutsi batsatse tinyatselo tekuphepha kute kutsi bagweme kubhebhetseka kwe-COVID-19 ngemuva kwekutsi tibalo takamuva tibonise kwandza lokuphawulekako kwelizinga lalesifo kanye netifo letihlobene nesikhatsi sasebusika eveni..     Ikhabhinethi ikhumbute wonkhe umuntfu kutsi achubeke nekuzivikela tsine kanye nalabanye bantfu ngekugeza tandla tetfu njalo noma kusebentisa sibulali-magciwane, kufaka tifonyo uma singekhatsi kwetakhiwo, sikhweshelane nebantfu, kuvula amafasitelo kute kutsi kungene umoya lohlobile kanye nekugoma.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha langa masheleni ṱhaḓulo ya tshiwo itshi tsha miḓalo nga nḓila ya fulufhedzea nahone re khagala.

src_text: Kugoma nguyona ndlela lencono kakhulu yekutivikela ku-COVID-19 ngoba kuvimbela kugula lokumatima, kulaliswa esibhedlela ngisho nekufa.
tgt_text: Muṱolambalelano wa Afrika Tshipembe vha khou ṋetshedza tshumelo dza vhulavhelesi dza ḓadzisa kha idzo dzi re hone nahone uhu kovhelwa hafhu ha masheleni ndi hune ha khou elana na sisṱeme ya muvhuso ya dzudzanya mugaganyagwama.

src_text: Awudzingi likheli lasekhaya kute kutsi ugome.
Nanoma ngubani, angaba namatisi noma abete, ugoma mahhala kuto tonkhe tindzawo tekugoma kulo lonkhe lelive.
tgt_text: Maswa nga ha Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).

src_text: Vimba lubandlululo lwebuhlanga!.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe uri vha dzhie maga tsireledzo itela thivhela phaḓalala ha COVID-19 nga murahu ha mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dze dza sumbedza uri ho vha na engedzea vhukuma ha tshivhalo tsha kavhiwa nga malwadze ane vha na vhushaka na khalaṅwaha ya vhuriha fhano shangoni..     Khabinethe yo humbudza vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha bvele phanḓa na ḓitsireledza khathihi na vhaṅwe vhathu nga ṱamba zwanḓa kana zwi sanithaiza misi yoṱhe ambara maski musi nga ngomu ha tshifhaṱo sia tshikhala tsho tsireledzeaho vhukati hau na muṅwe muthu vula mafasiṱere itela uri hu dzhene muya khathihi na haelwa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itigcekile kakhulu tonkhe tento tekubandlululana ngekwelibala eveni, lokufaka ekhatsi netehlakalo letibikiwe eSikolweni Semabanga Laphakeme sase-Good Hope Seminary kanye naseNyuvesi yaseStellenbosch eNshonalanga Kapa.
tgt_text: Muhaelo kha ḓi vha yone philelo ya khwinesa kha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 sa izwi tshi thivhela lwalesa valelwa vhuongeloni kana lufu vha tei thoma vha vha na ḓiresi ya vhudzulo uri vha kone haelwa.

src_text: Letento letidzabukisako tingcubutana nemagugu eMtsetfosisekelo lekwakhelwe kulo live letfu lentsandvo yelinyenti, lokufaka ekhatsi sitfunti semuntfu, kungabandlululani ngebuhlanga, bulungiswa betenhlalakahle, kulingana kanye nenhlonipho..     Umtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996 uyinkhombandlela yetfu yekucedza luchekeko lolunyanyekako kanye nekungabi nebulungiswa kwesikhatsi lesendlulile.
tgt_text: Muthu muṅwe na muṅwe nga vha na ḽiṅwalo ḽa vhuṋe kana si na nga haelwa mahala kha vhupo vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe ha muhaelo ha nnyi na nnyi mona na shango ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Batali bayancuswa kutsi bafundzise bantfwana kwala kubandlululwa ngekwebuhlanga futsi bamukele kwehlukahlukana, njengencenye yemkhankhaso wetfu wekukhutsata kwakhiwa kwesive nekubumbana kwemmango.

Asisebente ngekubambisana kute sibeke ebaleni lubandlululo nanoma ngukuphi lapho lutsatfwa njengentfo lefanele siphindze futsi sitfumele umlayeto locacile wekutsi kute indzawo yalo lapha eveni letfu; lentsandvo yelinyenti..     Budlelwane beNingizimu Afrika – neJalimane.
tgt_text: Kha vha fhelise khethululo nga lukanda!.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ilwemukele Luvakasho Lolusemtsetfweni lwaShansela We-Federal Republic of Germany, Umhlonishwa Olaf Scholz, eNingizimu Afrika ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-24 Inhlaba.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou sasaladza tshoṱhe zwiito zwoṱhe zwa khethululo nga lukanda fhano shangoni, hu tshi katelwa na zwiwo zwo vhigwaho fhaḽa Tshikoloni tsha Nṱha tsha Good Hope Seminary na fhaḽa Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch ngei kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhukovhela.

Hezwi zwiito zwo vhifhaho ngaurali zwi lwa na mikhwa ine ya vha hone kha ndayotewa ye shango ḽashu ḽa dimokirasi ḽa ḓitika khayo ine ya katela tshirunzi tsha vhuthu sa vha na khethululo nga lukanda sa khethulula nga mbeu, vhulamukanyi kha zwa matshilisano, ndinganelo na ṱhonifho.

src_text: Kuvakasha Lokusemtsetfweni kwaShansela Scholz bekungesimemo saMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, lohola umkhankhaso wahulumende wekugcugcutela budlelwano lobuhle besifundza kanye nemave emhlaba, kanye nekuheha batjalitimali labadzingeka kakhulu.

Labaholi lababili bakhulume, emkhatsini walokunye, ngetindlela tekutfutfukisa kubambisana etindzaweni letifana namandla agezi nekuntjintja kwesimo selitulu, kuhwebelana nekutjalwa kwetimali, kanye nekubhekana ne-COVID-19 kanye nesidzingo sekugoma.
tgt_text: Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 ndi yone ndededzi yashu musi ro livha kha fhelisa zwiito zwi vhavhaho zwa khethululana na tshayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhingani tsho fhelaho.

src_text: Baphindze babuka intfutfuko kulelivekati lase-Afrika nakulamanye emave, kufaka ekhatsi kungcubutana kwe-Ukraine nemtselela wako emnotfweni wemave emhlaba kanye nekutfolakala kwekudla nemandla agezi..     Ijalimane ayigcini-nje ngekuba ngumlingani weNingizimu Afrika wesibili ngebukhulu kuteluhwebo, kodvwa futsi ingumtfombo wesitsatfu ngebukhulu wetivakashi tangesheya kwetilwandle, batjalimali labakhulu kanye nebalingani betfu ngetentfutfuko..     Inkhomfa Yesihlanu Yemave Emhlaba Lemayelana Nekucedza Kwenta Bantfwana Kutsi Babe Basebenti.
tgt_text: Vhabebi vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa gudisa vhana vhavho uri vha hanedzane na zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda na ṱanganedza zwa fhambana ha vhathu ya nga mvelele dzavho, sa tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dzashu dzo khwaṱhaho dza lingedza ṱuṱuwedza zwa fhaṱa lushaka na vhuthihi..     Kha ri shumisane, ri bvisele khagala zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda afho hune zwa dzhiiwa sa vhuḓifari ho teaho nahone ri dovhe hafhu ri rumele mulaedza re khagala wa uri zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda zwi na vhudzulo kha shango ḽashu ḽa demokirasi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi isemukele siphetfo lesiyimphumelelo seNkhomfa Yesihlanu Yemave Emhlaba Lemayelana Nekucedza Kwenta Bantfwana Kutsi Babe Basebenti lebeyibanjelwe eThekwini kusukela mhla ti-15 kuya kumhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha Afrika Tshipembe na shango ḽa Dzheremane.

src_text: Badlalindzima labavela kuwo onkhe emave emhlaba bayihambele lenkhomfa, lebeyibanjwe ngekubambisana neNhlangano Yemhlaba Yebasebenti..     Ngemuva kwekucocisana ngemikhuba lemihle leyentiwa ngemave lahlukene nekubona emagebe kanye netinyatselo letiphutfumako letidzingekako kute kutsi kusheshiswe kucedvwa kwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti kanye nekusetjentiswa ngekuphocelelwa, bamukele ‘I-Durban Call to Action’ kute kutsi kubukwane nesihlava sekwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo Tshiofisi a tshimbila zwavhuḓi Mutshantseḽara wa Riphabuḽiki ya Muvhuso wa Feḓeraḽa wa shango ḽa Dzheremane, Muhulisei Vho Olaf Scholz, fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 24 Shundunthule.

src_text: Kwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti kuveta sihlava lesibi kabi semmango kuphindze futsi kubeke bantfwana engotini.
Kukuhlukubeta kanatsi futsi kuvimbela bantfwana kutsi bangakhoni kutfola imfundvo kanye nalamanye ematfuba ekutfutfuka.
tgt_text: Madalo Tshiofisi Mutshantseḽara Vho Scholz’s vha hone nga murahu ha thambo ya Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa, vhane vha khou ranga phanḓa fulo ḽa muvhuso ḽa fhaṱa vhushaka havhuḓi ha dzingu na ha dzitshaka, hu tshi katelwa na kunga vhubindudzi vhune ha ṱoḓea vhukuma.

src_text: Wonkhe umntfwana eNingizimu Afrika unelilungelo lelingeke liphikiswe lekutsi avikeleke kumikhuba yekusetjentiswa ngekubacaphata.
tgt_text: Zwiṅwe zwe vharangaphanḓa avha vhavhili vha amba nga hazwo ho vha nḓila dza khwaṱhisa tshumisano kha masia fanaho na fulufulu khathihi na tshanduko ya kilima, mbambadzo na vhubindudzi hu tshi katelwa na maga u lwa na COVID-19 khathihi na ṱhoḓea ya khaelo.

Vho dovha hafhu vha sedza na kha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha dzhango ḽa Afrika khathihi na ḽifhasi nga angaredza, hu tshi katelwa na khuḓano ya ngei Ukraine khathihi na masiandaitwa ayo kha ikonomi ya ḽifhasi na wanala ha zwiḽiwa na fulufulu..     Shango ḽa Dzheremane ḽi tou vha fhedzi muvhambadzelani wa vhuvhili muhulwanesa na ḽino ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, ḽi dovha hafhu ḽa vha tshiko tsha vhuraru tshihulwanesa tsha vhaendelamashango vha bvaho seli ha malwanzhe, mubindudzi muhulwanesa na mushumisani kha zwa mveledziso..     Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha Fheliswa ha zwiito zwa dzhia Vhana sa Vhashumi.

src_text: Lilungelo lekutfola imfundvo lesisekelo licuketfwe kuMtsetfosisekelo wetfu futsi ngekweMtsetfo Wetikolwa waseNingizimu Afrika, wanga-1996 (Umtsetfo 84 wanga-1996), “wonkhe umtali kufanele ente kutsi wonkhe umfundzi ambophelele kutsi afundze esikolweni kusukela ngelilanga lesikolwa lekucala.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa khunyeledzwa zwavhuḓi ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa Vhuṱanu wa nga ha Fheliswa ha zwiito zwa dzhia Vhana sa Vhashumi we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban nga ḽa 15 swika 20 Shundunthule.

src_text: Lusuku lwemnyaka lapho lowo mfundzi ufinyelela iminyaka lesikhombisa kute kube lusuku lwekugcina lwesikolwa lapho lowo mfundzi afinyelela iminyaka le-15 noma ebangeni lesishiyagalolunye, kuye ngekutsi ngukuphi lokwenteka kucala”..     Ngekwemibandzela yeMtsetfo Webantfwana, wanga-2005 (Umtsetfo 38 wanga-2005), “kute umuntfu longasebentisa, atfole, noma anike noma acashe umntfwana njengemsebenti”     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho mona na ḽifhasi vho dzhenela muṱangano uyu we wa fariwa nga tshumisano na Dzangano ḽa Vhashumi ḽa Ḽifhasi.

src_text: Kungena Kusivumelwane Semave Emhlaba mayelana Nekuvikela Bonkhe Bantfu Ekunyamalaleni Ngekuphocelelwa (I-ICPPED) .
Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwe-ICPPED ePhalamende mayelana nekucutjungulwa kwekungena kweNingizimu Afrika kulesivumelwane.
tgt_text: Nga murahu ha ambedzana nga ha maitele avhuḓi ane shumiswa nga mashango fhambanaho bvisela khagala vhuṱudzeṱudze vhune ha vha hone khathihi na maga tshihaḓu ane ṱoḓea itela ṱavhanyedzisa zwa fheliswa ha zwiito zwa shumiswa ha vhana na shumiswa nga nḓila ya khombekhombe, ho swika he ha ṱanganedzwa thendelano dze dza ḓivhiwa sa ‘Durban Call to Action’ hu tshi itelwa lwa na samba heḽi ḽa dzhiiwa ha vhana vha tshi itwa vhashumi.

src_text: Lesivumelwane sivamise kuba sibopho saMhlabuhlangane (se-UN) lesibonelelanako lesibukene nekunyatselwa kwemalungelo eluntfu ngekusetjentiswa kunyamalala kwebantfu ngekuphocelelwa.
tgt_text: Zwa dzhiiwa ha vhana vha itwa vhashumi ndi zwiito zwi vhavhaho vhukuma kha tshitshavha nahone zwi vhea vhana kha nyimele dza khombo vhukuma.
Zwi dzhiiwa sa zwiito zwa tambudza nahone zwi khakhisa vhana uri vha si kone wana pfunzo khathihi na zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa aluwa.

src_text: Lesivumelwane sichaza lokunyamalala kwebantfu ngekubaphocelela kute kutsi kufakwe ekhatsi kutfumba, kubopha, kutokisa noma-ke ngutiphi letinye tinhlobo letingabangela kutsi umbhebhetseli ale noma kwemukela noma-ke futsi afihle kutsi umhlukubetwa ukuphi..     Sitawutsi  singavunyelwa kutsi sibe ngaphansi kwemitsetfo yetfu, iNingizimu Afrika kulindzeleke kutsi ibike njalo ngeminyaka lemibili ku-UN mayelana nekutsi isicalisa kanjani sivumelwane.
tgt_text: Ṅwana muṅwe na muṅwe fhano Afrika Tshipembe na pfanelo dzine ha tei dzhielwa dzone dza tsireledzwa kha zwiito zwa shumiswa nga nḓila ya tambudzwa.

src_text: Lesivumelwane siniketa tinyatselo tekuvimbela emave langemalunga lokudzingeka kutsi atibeke kute kutsi avimbele kunyamalala kwebantfu ngekuphocelelwa emaveni abo..     Umbiko Wesine Welive LaseNingizimu Afrika Wekuvikela Nekukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu.
Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwembiko Wesine Welive LaseNingizimu Afrika Wekuvikela Nekukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu kuMkhandlu Wamhlabunhlangene Wemalungelo Eluntfu.
tgt_text: Pfanelo ya wana pfunzo ya mutheo hone kha Ndayotewa yashu nahone ya nga Mulayo wa Zwikolo zwa Afrika Tshipembe, wa ṅwaha wa 1996 (Mulayo 84 wa 1996), “mubebi muṅwe na muṅwe tea ita uri mugudi muṅwe na muṅwe ane vha nga fhasi ha ndango yawe dzhene tshikolo tou bva kha ḓuvha ḽa thoma ḽa tshikolo kha ṅwaha wonoyo une mugudi  khou fara miṅwaha ya sumbe ngaḽo vhuya swikela ḓuvha ḽa tshikolo ḽa fhedzisela kha ṅwaha wonoyo une mugudi uyo khou fara miṅwaha ya 15 kana gireidi ya vhuṱahe, kana zwenezwo zwine zwa ḓa thoma” ya nga Mulayo wa Vhana, wa ṅwaha wa 2005 (Mulayo 38 wa 2005), “a hu na muthu ane tea shumisa wana ṋetshedza kana thola ṅwana tshi itela mu shumisa sa mushumi”     Tsheo dza Khabinethe ṱanganedza Thendelano dza Dzitshaka dza nga ha Tsireledzwa ha Vhathu vhoṱhe kha zwiito zwa Ngalangadzwa ha vhathu nga Khombekhombe nga vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo (ICPPED) .

src_text: Lubuyeketo Lwe-UN Lwanjalo Ngetikhatsi Letitsite lutawubuyeketa lombiko ekuhambeni kwalomnyaka.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha ICPPED kha Phaḽamennde uri hu sedzwe fhungo ḽa ṱanganedza thendelano dzenedzo nga shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Kusukela yasayina Sivumelwano Semalungelo Ebantfu se-UN, iNingizimu Afrika seyibuyeketwe emahlandla lamatsatfu, lapho khona kubuyeketwa kwekugcina kwentiwa ngeNyoni yanga-..     Lombiko uniketa takamuva mayelana netincomo letemukelwe leti-187 kusukela nga-2017 kunchubo yekubuyeketa.
tgt_text: Hedzi ndi thendelano dza Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) dzine dza tou vha mbofho ya ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dzi sedzaho kha zwa kandekanywa ha pfanelo dza vhuthu nga zwiito zwa ngalangadzwa ha vhathu nga nḓila ya khombekhombe nga vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo.

src_text: Imibono itsetfwe kumininingwane lecinisekisiwe, kulwatiso loluvela ematikweni lafanele, tikhungo teSahluko 9 kanye netinhlangano temmango letifanele..     Ikhabhinethi iyatfokota ngenchubekelembili leyentiwe ekuphumeleliseni letincomo kanye futsi naleto tindzawo letisasetjentwa.
Lombiko utawentiwa utfolwe sive ngemuva kwekwetfulwa ku-UN ngeNgci.
tgt_text: Thendelano dzi ṱalutshedza zwa ngalangala nga nḓila ya khombekhombe sa zwithu zwi katelaho thubiwa fariwa hoṋelwa tshiṱokisini hu si na senga kana nḓila iṅwe na iṅwe ine ya nga ita uri avho vhaiti vha zwiito zwenezwo vha hane ṱanganedza kana vha dzumbe fhethuvhupo hune zwipondwa zwenezwo zwa zwiito zwenezwo zwa vha hone..     Musi zwo no tendelwa uri zwi vhe tshipiḓa tsha milayo yashu, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo lavhelelwa ṋetshedza muvhigo nga murahu ha miṅwaha mivhili kha vha UN sumbedzaho uri ndi zwifhio zwine ḽa khou ita nga ha thendelano dzenedzo..     Muvhigo wa Shango wa vhuṋa wa Afrika Tshipembe wa zwa Tsireledzwa na Ṱuṱuwedzwa ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu.

src_text: Inchubomgomo Yekuphatsa Emanti Asemayini yanga-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Muvhigo wa Shango wa vhuṋa wa zwa Tsireledzwa na Ṱuṱuwedzwa ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu kha vha Khoro ya Pfanelo dza Vhuthu ya Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyivumile Inchubomgomo Yekuphatfwa Kwemanti Asemayini yanga- 2022 kutsi iphunyeleliswe.
tgt_text: Tsenguluso ya Ḽifhasi ya nga murahu ha Tshifhinga ya vha ha UN ḓo sengulusa muvhigo ngavhuya ṅwaha uno tou bva tshe ḽa saina Thendelano dza Pfanelo dza Vhuthu dza UN, Afrika Tshipembe ḽo no senguluswa luraru, he tsenguluso ya fhedzisela ya itwa nga ṅwedzi wa Khubvumedzi..     Muvhigo uyu sumbedza zwiswa nga ha themendelo dza 187 dzo ṱanganedzwaho bva kha mushumo wa sengulusa wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo iniketa timiso tekuvikela nekonga kusetjentiswa kwemanti.
tgt_text: Ho dzhiiwa makumedzwa bva kha data dzi fulufhedzeaho, mafhungo bva kha mihasho yo teaho, zwiimiswa zwi tikedzaho demokirasi na ndayotewa ya shango khathihi na madzangano vhadzulapo teaho.

src_text: Isimamisa imisebenti yetemnotfo yasemayini ngeligunyakwenta lekuniketa lelive kusetjentiswa kwemanti ngalokusimeme.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo fushea nga mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha themendelo khathihi na kha ayo maṅwe masia ane khao mushumo wa kha ḓi bvela phanḓa.

src_text: Emkhatsini waletinye tingenelelo, lenchubomgomo icacisa tibopho netindzima letidlalwa emkhatsini waletinhlaka letintsatfu tahulumende mayelana netindzaba temanti.
tgt_text: Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa kha nnyi na nnyi zwenezwo musi wo no ḓivhadzwa kha vha UN nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src_text: Letingucuko letihlongotwako titawusombulula tinsayeya tekufaka lunswinyo kubangcolisi futsi kwente kube lula kubita umngcolisi akhokhe.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Maḓi Migodini ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo yentiwa ngekuhambisana neMtsetfo Wavelonkhe Wemanti, wanga-1998 (Umtsetfo 36 wanga-1998).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Maḓi Migodini ya ṅwaha wa 2022 uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Umbiko Weluhlakamsebenti Lwekuhlela Tekuphendvula Kutebulili, Kulandzelela, Kulinganisa kanye Neluhlakamsebenti Lwelucwaningomabhuku.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi ṋetshedza nḓila dza tsireledza na vhulunga kushumisele kwa maḓi ita ndinganyelo vhukati ha mishumo ya zwa ikonomi henefho kha migodi na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṋetshedza nḓila dza kushumisele kwa maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu fhano shangoni ḽashu..     Zwiṅwe zwa zwine mbekanyamaitele iyi ya ita, ndi bvisela khagala mishumo na vhuḓifhinduleli vhukati ha masia mararu muvhuso nga ha mafhungo kwamaho maḓi migodini.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko wenchubekelembili mayelana neLuhlakamsebenti Lwekuhlela Tekuphendvula Kutebulili, Kulandzelela, Kulinganisa kanye Neluhlakamsebenti Lwelucwaningomabhuku.
tgt_text: Tshanduko dzine dza khou dzinginywa dzi ḓo tandulula khaedu dza ṋetshedza ndaṱiso kha vhatshikafhadzi khathihi na ita uri zwi leluwe shumisa maitele uri mutshikafhadzi tea badela.
Mbekanyamaitele yo bveledzwa hu tshi tevhelwa Mulayo wa Maḓi wa Lushaka, wa 1998 (Mulayo 36 wa 1998).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyitfokotele inchubekelembili leyentiwe ngematiko ahulumende lamanyenti ekufakeni loluhlakamsebenti etinhlelweni tayo lolwemukelwa nga-2019 kutsi luphunyeleliswe.
tgt_text: Muvhigo nga ha Muhanga wa Vhupuḽani vhune ha Dzhiela Nṱha zwa Mbeu, Mugaganyagwama, Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi khathihi na Muvhalelano.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa mvelaphanḓa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Muhanga wa Vhupuḽani vhune ha Dzhiela Nṱha zwa Mbeu, Vhupuḽani, Mugaganyagwama, Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi khathihi na Muvhalelano.

src_text: Kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi ematiko lamanyenti asemise ngemumo tinchubomgomo letibomabekwembili tekukhombindlela tinhlelo tekuhlanganisa leticondze bomake, lusha kanye nebantfu labaphila ngekukhubateka.
Ikhabhinethi seyimemetele kutsi kuciniswe sandla ekulandzeleleni nasekubikeni, ikakhulukati ngalamanye alamatiko lasengakabiki.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo takalela mvelaphanḓa khulwane ye ya itwa nga vhunzhi ha mihasho ya muvhuso kha zwa dzhia muhanga uyu we wa ṱanganedzwa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 hu tshi itelwa uri thome shumiswa wa vho vha tshipiḓa tshayo tsha mashumele.

src_text: Inkhulumomphendvulwane Yelusha Ka-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).
Ikhabhinethi icinisekise i-NMYD kutsi yentiwe njalo ngemnyaka kusukela nga-.
tgt_text: Vhunzhi ha mihasho swika zwino yo no thoma dzudzanya mbekanyamaitele dzayo dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ranga phanḓa mbekanyamushumo khulwane dzine dzo livhiswa kha vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.

src_text: Kwetfulwa kwale-NMYD kutawuba mhla ti-7 kuya kumhla tinge-20 Kholwane.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ita khuwelelo ya uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi na vhiga ho khwaṱhaho, nga maanḓa kha miṅwe ya mihasho ine i athu ṋetshedza mivhigo yayo.

src_text: Lona ngumtamo weLihhovisi laMengameli wekunika lusha lwaleLivekati inkhundla yekukhulumisana ngenkhulumomphendvulwane mayelana netindzaba letibatsintsako.
tgt_text: Fulo ḽa Nyambedzano dza vhukati ha Vhaswa ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza zwa uri NMYD vho ḓo vha hone ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe bva zwino nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Letinkhulumomphendvulwane – letitawusima kulichawe letfu lemave emhlaba Mengameli  wesikhatsi lesengcile Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – titawucala tinkhulumo tekujulisa lisiko lebuholi lobunenkhambo lenhle yekutiphatsa e-Afrika.
tgt_text: NMYD ya thoma ḓo vha hone bva nga ḽa 7 swika ḽa 20 Fulwana.

src_text: Titawunika bantfu labasha ematfuba ekucobelelana ngelifa labo lelinemasiko lanotsile.
tgt_text: Hedzi ndi ndingedzo dza Phresidennde dza ṋea vhaswa vha Dzhango ḽino tshikhala tsha ḓidzhenisa kha nyambedzano dza fhaṱa dza nga ha mafhungo ane vha kwama.

src_text: Lomtamo utawuphindze futsi ucinisekise budlelwane bebantfu (kulomunye nakulomunye) emkhatsini welusha lwalelivekati.

Litiko letaBomake, Lusha Nebantfu Labanekukhubateka litawuniketa imininingwane yeluhlelo lwalemikhosi esikhatsini lesitako..     Umbiko Wekulandzelela Kusebenta Wemnyaka 2021/22 lomayelana neKuhlonyiswa Kwabomake Nekulingana Ngebulili, Nekutfutfukiswa Kwelusha kanye neKukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Hedzi nyambedzano, dzine dza ḓo ḓitika kha ḽizhakanḓila ḽashu ḽi ḓivheaho ḽifhasini Phresidennde washu wa kale Vho Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, dzi ḓo mbo ḓi thoma na zwenezwo hu tshi itelwa ṱuṱuwedza maitele vhurangaphanḓa vhu re na mikhwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika..     Dzi ḓo ṋea vhaswa tshikhala tsha kovhana nga ha vhufa ho ḓalaho zwinzhi vhukuma vhune ha sumbedza mvelele dzavho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko wekulandzelela kusebenta wemnyaka 2021/22 lomayelana nekuhlonyiswa kwabomake, lusha kanye nebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Hedzi ndingedzo dzi ḓo dovha hafhu dza khwaṱhisa vhushaka ha muthu nga muthu vhukati ha vhaswa vha ḽino dzhango.

src_text: Lombiko ulandzelela tinkhomba letinkhulu tekukhutsatwa kwetekulingana, lizinga lemisebenti nebuniyo kanye nekuhlanganyela kwalamacembu kumisebenti yematiko kanye nasetikhungweni tahulumende.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali ḓo ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwa mbekanyamushumo ya vhuṱambo uvhu ngavhuya.

src_text: Lombiko uhlanganiswa mayelana nelwabiwomali lwekuhlela tekuphendvula kutebulili, kulandzelela, kulinganisa kanye neluhlakamsebenti lweLucwaningomabhuku lolwemukelwa yiKhabhinethi nga-     Imitsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Vhulavhelesi ha Mashumele nga Ṅwaha wa ṅwaha wa 2021/22 kha zwa Maanḓafhadza Vhafumakadzi na Ndinganyelo ya Mbeu, Mveledziso ya Vhaswa khathihi na Ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibiyela Temphilo Netekuphepha Emayini.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa vhulavhelesi ha mashumele wa nga ṅwaha nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchitjelwa Kwetemphilo Netekuphepha Emayini kute kutsi ummango uphawule ngawo.
tgt_text: Muvhigo uyu sala murahu zwithu zwa ndeme kha ṱuṱuwedzwa ha ndinganyelo, maimo kha zwa mishumo khathihi na vhuṋe na shela mulenzhe ha zwigwada izwi kha mishumo ya mihasho na mabindu muvhuso.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kwenta kancono temphilo netekuphepha tebasebenti basemayini, kufaka ekhatsi simondzawo lapho kwentiwa khona imisebenti yasemayini.
LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo Wetemphilo Netekuphepha Emayini, wanga-1996 (Umtsetfo we-29 wa-1996).
tgt_text: Muvhigo uyu wo dzudzanywa ho sedzwa zwa vhupuḽani ha mugaganyagwama une wa dzhiela nṱha zwa mbeu, zwa vhulavhelesi, vhusengulusi na muhanga wa Muvhalelano we wa ṱanganedzwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa     Milayotibe.

src_text: Letichibiyelo letibuyeketiwe tiniketa, emkhatsini walokunye, kucaciswa kwaleminye imicondvo lekuloMtsetfo, ucinise luhlakamsebenti lwekulawula temphilo netekuphepha uphindze futsi uwente uhambisane nekusebenta ezingeni lemhlaba leliphakeme kakhulu mayelana netekuphepha etimayini.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mutakalo na Tsireledzo Migodini.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mutakalo na Tsireledzo Migodini hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfosisekelo Kwelishumi nasiphohlongo wanga-2022 .
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khou lavhelelwa khwinisa mutakalo na tsireledzo ya vhashumi vha migodini, hu tshi katelwa na vhupo honoho vhune zwa migodi zwa khou bveledzwa khaho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchitjelwa  KweMtsetfosisekelo Kwelishumi nasiphohlongo Kwanga-2022 kute kutsi sive siphawule ngawo nekutsi Indvuna Yetebulungiswa Nekucondziswa Kwesimilo, Mnu.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou khwinisa Mulayo wa Mutakalo na Tsireledzo ya Migodini, wa 1996 (Mulayo 29 wa 1996) une wa vha hone zwazwino.

src_text: Ronald Lamola, anikete tatiso nemininingwane mayelana naletichibiyelo teMtsetfosisekelo letiphakanyisiwe..     LoMtsetfosisekelo uchibiyela Sigaba 6(1) seMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yeNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996, lomemetela kutsi tilwimi taseNingizimu Afrika leti-11 letisetsetfweni Sepedi, Sesothoisutfu, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, Sibhunu, Singisi, Sindebele, siXhosa kanye nesiZulu..     Letichibiyelo temukela Lulwimi Lwetimphawu LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) kutsi lulwimi lwe-12 lolusemtsetfweni lwalelive futsi lutawutfutfukisa kwemukelwa kwalo kutemasiko luphindze futsi lucinisekise kuba nemalungelo lalinganako kubo bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika, ngekunganaki kubanekukhubateka kwabo.
Litiko Letemfundvo Lesisekelo selivele lemukela i-SASL njengelulwimi lwasekhaya     Imikhosi Letako.
tgt_text: Khwiniso idzi dzo shandukiswaho ndi dzine dza bvisela khagala maṅwe maipfi kha Mulayo khwaṱhisa muhanga wa zwa milayo ya mutakalo na tsireledzo khathihi na ita uri elane na maitele khwinesa ḽifhasini ane elana na zwa tsireledzo migodini..     Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndayotewa ya Vhufumimalo wa ṅwaha wa 2022  .

src_text: Liviki Lekuvikelwa Kwebantfwana.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndayotewa ya Vhufumimalo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi nahone Minisṱa wa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Vhululamisi, Vho Ronald Lamola, vha nga ṋetshedza nḓivhadzo ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa khwiniso iyo ine ya khou dzinginywa kha Ndayotewa.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawugubha Liviki Lekuvikelwa Kwebantfwana kusukela mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti kuya kumhla ti-4 Inhlaba 2022 ngaphasi kwalengcikitsi: “Asivikele Bantfwana ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 neKwendlula lapho”..     Kuleliviki, kutawunakwa kakhulu ngalokukhetsekile ludzaba lwavelonkhe lwekukhulelwa kwelusha, lokwakhuphuka ngemandla lokwandlondlobala kakhulu ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 lapho khona batala kakhulu nga-..     Ikhabhinethi icele kutsi kube khona kubambisana kubatali, kummango, emacembu ebetenkholo kanye nemmango ngebubanti bawo kutsi basite kube netingucuko ekukhulelweni kwelusha.
Iforamu Yetemnotfo Yemhlaba (i-WEF).
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou khwinisa Khethekanyo 6(1) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996, ine ya sumbedza uri nyambo dza 11 dza tshiofisi dza fhano Afrika Tshipembe, ndi Tshibeli, Tshisuthu, Tshitswana, Tshiswati, Tshivenḓa, Tshitsonga, Tshivhuru, Luisimane, Tshindevhele, Tshithoza na Tshizulu..     Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo ita uri hu vhe na ṱanganedzwa ha Luambo lwa Tswayo dza Zwanḓa lwa Afrika Tshipembe (SASL) sa luambo lwa tshiofisi lwa vhufumimbili (12) nahone ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza ṱanganedzea ha mvelele ya luambo lwonolwo khathihi na khwaṱhisa pfanelo dzi linganaho kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe, hu sa sedzwi uri vha na vhuholefhali.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawuhlanganyela ku-WEF eDavos-Klosters, eSwitzerland kusukela mhla tinge-22 kuya kumhla tinge-26 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Sisebenta Ngekubambisana, Sibuyisa Litsemba”..     INingizimu Afrika itfokotela litfuba lekuba yincenye yalesisombululo nekuphindze futsi yabelane kuleforamu yemave emhlaba ngaloko lesihlangabetene nako.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa Pfunzo dza Mutheo wo no ḓi ṱanganedza SASL sa luambo lwa hayani     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Bukhona betfu ku-WEF kukhulisa lidvumela letfu njengendzawo yekwenta lutjalomali, sabelana nemhlaba ngembononchanti wetfu welikusasa kanye nekuphakamisa tintfutfuko letinsha ngekhatsi kulelive.
tgt_text: Vhege ya Tsireledzo ya Vhana.

src_text: Inyanga Yelusha.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fhululedza Vhege ya Tsiredzo ya Vhana bva nga ḽa 29 Shundunthule swika ḽa 4 Shundunthule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Kha ri Tsireledze Vhana nga tshino tshifhinga tsha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 na nga Murahu”..     Kha yeneyo vhege, hu ḓo lavheleswa nga maanḓa kha mafhungo kwamaho shango ḽoṱhe, ane vha vhifha muvhilini ha vhaswa, lwe ha wanala hu tshi vha na engedzea vhukuma ha tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vhe vha vha na vhana nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽo ḓiṋea maanḓa nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iluvumile Luhlelo Lwenyanga Yelusha lwanga-2022 ngaphasi kwalengcikitsi: “Kukhutsata tindlela tekutiphilisa letisimeme nekucina kwebantfu labasha kute babe nelikusasa lelincono”.
Lilanga Lelusha Lelisemtsetfweni litawukhunjulwa eMphumalanga Kapa.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo ya uri hu vhe na ndingedzo dzo khwaṱhaho vhukati ha vhabebi, vhadzulapo, zwigwada zwa vhurereli khathihi na zwitshavha nga angaredza dza itela thusa shandukisa izwo zwa engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vhane vha khou vhifha mivhilini..     Muṱangano wa Ikonomi wa Ḽifhasi (WEF).

Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou shela mulenzhe kha WEF ine ya khou ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Davos-Klosters, kha ḽa Switzerland bva nga ḽa 22 swika 26 Shundunthule 2022, nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U shumisana vhuedzedza Fulufhelo”.

src_text: Lomnyaka lona utawuba ngumkhosi we-46 wekubungata umhla ti-16 Inhlaba 1976 wetibhelu tetitjudeni taseSoweto ngesikhatsi bantfu labasha balwa nekuhlisibetwa ngeSibhunu ngumbuso welubandlululo kutsi bafundziswe ngaso etikolweni.

Ngekwemoya weNhlaba yanga-1976, Ikhabhinethi imeme bonkhe bantfu labasha kutsi babukane nensayeya yekukhula kwelizinga lekweswelakala kwemisebenti ngekutsi bahlanganyele etinhlelweni tekutitfutfukisa njengetemfundzamakhono emsebentini netekusebentela kutfola sipiliyoni emsebentini.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzhiela nṱha tshikhala tsha vha tshipiḓa tsha thandululo nahone ḽi kovhana nḓivho ine ḽa vha nayo kha muṱangano uyu wa ḽifhasi vha hone ha shango ḽashu kha muṱangano uyu wa WEF na zwone ndi zwa ndeme kha bveledza phanḓa dzina ḽa shango ḽashu sa hone fhethu havhuḓisa ha ita zwa vhubindudzi kovhana na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nga ha bono ḽa vhumatshelo hashu khathihi na bvisela khagala dziṅwe mveledziso dzine dza khou itea ngomu kha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa.

src_text: Hulumende uhlele tinhlelo tekwesekela kweswelakala kwemisebenti kulusha kanye nekwakhiwa kwemisebenti yesikhashana.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ya ṅwaha wa 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U ṱuṱuwedza nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo dzine dza nga vha dza tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na konḓelela ha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo ha khwine”.

src_text: Nebemabhizinisi nabo bakhutsatwa kutsi batsatse bantfu labasha labanyenti babacashe ngekutsi bakhe ematfuba emisebenti yelusha..     Luhlelo lwelusha lwayo yonkhe lenyanga yeNhlaba lufaka ekhatsi imisebenti leminyenti leyehlukene kusukela ekwetfuleni umkhankhaso wemavulandlela lamasha, kwetfula Luhlelo Lwelincusa Le-NYDA kanye nekuvuswa kweTinsita Tavelonkhe Telusha  kulo lonkhe lelive..     Indvuna eHhovisi laMengameli, letaBomake, Lusha Nebantfu Labanekukhubateka masinyane-nje litawuhlahlela loluhlelo ngalokuphelele.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa tshiofisi ḽi ḓo pembelelwa ngei kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha.

src_text: Yonkhe imisebenti yelusha itawulindzeleka kutsi ihambisane netindlelanchubo tetemphilo te-COVID-.
Ingcungcutsela Yemhlaba Wemmango.
tgt_text: Houno ndi ṅwaha wa vhufuiṋarathi (46) wa pembelelwa ha ḓuvha ḽa mvutshelano ya matshudeni ye ya vha hone nga ḓuvha ḽa 16 Fulwi 1976 fhaḽa kha ḽa Soweto he vhaswa vha vha vha tshi khou gwalabela zwa kombetshedzwa guda nga luambo lwa Tshivhuru nga muvhuso wa khethululo nga lukanda..     Nga muya wonoyo muthihi fanaho na uḽa wa ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 1976, Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhaswa vha shango ḽashu ya uri vha lwe na khaedu ine ya khou engedzea ya shayea ha mishumo kha vhaswa nga shela mulenzhe kha mbekanyamushumo dza mveledziso dzi fanaho na mbekanyamushumo dza vhugudisamishumo khathihi na dza ṋea vhagudi tshenzhemo.

src_text: Hulumende, abambisene neNdlu Yavelonkhe Yebaholi Bendzabuko, utawubita Ingcungcutsela Yemhlaba Wemmango ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-27 nangeMgcibelo, mhla tinge-28 Inkhwekhweti 2022 kutewukhulunyiswana ngetindzaba letiphatselene nekuba nemhlaba..     Loku kufaka ekhatsi inchubo  yekwendluliselwa umhlaba wemmango uphume kuMbuso uye kulabo labanemalungelo awo labafanele, lokuyintfo lebalulekile ekuhlomiseni imimango yasemaphandleni ngemandla.

Kweswelakala kwebuniyomhlaba etindzaweni temmango akufaki-nje kuphela umtselela lomubi kumalungelo ebantfu ekutsi babe nemhlaba labahlala kuwo kepha kuphindze futsi kunciphise ematfuba ekukhona kwabo kuwusebentisa kute bente kancono batfutfukise timphilo tabo tetemnotfo     Imilayeto.
tgt_text: Muvhuso wo bveledza mbekanyamushumo dza tikedza zwa tholiwa ha vhaswa khathihi na sikwa ha mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi.

src_text: KuhalalisaIkhabhinethi yendlulisela kuhalalisa netilokotfo letinhle ku: Mk.
tgt_text: Mabindu na one khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri kunge vhaswa nga vhunzhi kha zwa mishumo nga sika zwikhala zwinzhi zwa vhaswa..     Mbekanyamushumo ya vhaswa ya ṅwedzi woṱhe wa Fulwi katela vhuṱambo ho fhambanaho bva kha zwa rwelwa ṱari ha fulo ḽa zwa vhurangaphanḓa ha vhaswa rwela ṱari Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhaambasada vha Pfungavhuṋe ya NYDA khathihi na vhuṅwe vhuṱambo vhunzhi ha Tshumelo dza Vhaswa dza Lushaka mona na shango ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Leanne Manas, Umetfuliluhlelo lwe-SABC Morning Live, lohlonishwe ngendondo Yavelonkhe Levelele ye-Knight of the French National Order Merit ngaLesibili, mhla ti-17 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ngesizatfu seligalelo lakhe ekwetfulweni kwetindzaba, kutetindzaba kanye naleminye imisebenti yekwephana leminyenti.
Kudvudvuta Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ekulilela nekudvudvuta imindeni nebangani ba: Mnu.
tgt_text: Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali Ofinisini ya Phresidennde hu si kale vha ḓo bvisela khagala mbekanyamushumo iyi nga vhuḓalo.

src_text: Mpho Moerane (52), Sodolobha Lomkhulu wesikhatsi lesengcile weLidolobhakati laseJozi, futsi lobekasishikashiki setepolitiki semphilo yonkhe aphindze futsi abe ngumsebenti webantfu baseJozi.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo hoṱhe ha vhaswa vhu ḓo lavhelelwa uri vhu tevhedze milayo ya zwa mutakalo ya COVID-.

src_text: Ngembi kwekuba nguSodolobha Lomkhulu, bekasebenta njengelilunga leLikomidi Labosodolobha leTetinsita Tetemvelo Nesakhiwonchanti.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Vhuṋe ha Mavu ha Tshitshavha.

src_text: Dkt.
tgt_text: Muvhuso tshi khou shumisana na vha Nnḓu ya Vhurangaphanḓa ha Sialala ya Lushaka ḓo vhidza Muṱangano wa Vhuṋe ha Mavu ha Tshitshavha nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 27 na Mugivhela wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule 2022 itela amba nga ha mafhungo elanaho na vhuṋe ha mavu.

src_text: Deborah Fraser (56), sobuciko wemculo wetenkholo lobekanetindondo letinyenti lobekasandza kuklonyeliswa ngeTicu teBudokotela kuTemculo Longcwele yi-Christian Leadership Academy.Dkt.
Namane Magau (70), sifundziswa lebesihlonishwa lebesiphindze futsi sibe lilunga lelihloniphekile leBhodi Yavelonkhe YaseNingizimu Afrika Yemkhandlu Webaphatseli Bebhodi Yetengculazi.Mnu.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi katela mushumo wa ṋetshedzwa ha mavu tshitshavha bva kha Muvhuso tshi ya kha vhathu vha re na pfanelo dza vhuṋe ho teaho, zwine hezwi zwa vha zwa ndeme kha maanḓafhadza zwitshavha zwa vhupo ha mahayani.

src_text: Mike Schüssler (60), Somnotfo waseNingizimu Afrika lowatiwa kakhulu lobekasigayigayi salemboni lobekatisa ngebunjalo betemnotfo waseNingizimu Afrika.Mnu.
tgt_text: Zwa shayea ha vhuṋe ha mavu vhu re mulayoni kha vhupo ha tshitshavha zwi tou fhungudza fhedzi pfanelo dza vhathu dza vha vhaṋe vha mavu ane vha dzula khao, fhedzi zwi dovha hafhu zwa fhungudza khonadzeo yavho ya nga shumisa kha khwinifhadza matshilo avho khathihi na tshiimo tshavho tsha zwa masheleni     Milaedza fhululedza Khabinethe yo rumela maipfi u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha:  Mufumakadzi Vho Leanne Manas, muhashi wa SABC Morning Live, vhe vha ṋewa tshiga tsha khuliso tsha Knight of the French National Order Merit nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 17 Shundunthule 2022, kha shela havho mulenzhe kha zwa vhoramafhungo, nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na miṅwe mishumo ya ndeme yo fhambanaho ya thuso ya zwa vhuthu..     Ndiliso Khabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza:  Vho Mpho Moerane (52), vhe vha vha vhe Ṋeḓorobo Muhulwane wa Ḓorobo khulwane ya Johannesburg, rapolotiki we vha mulwelambofholowo vhutshilo hawe hoṱhe khathihi na vha mushumeli wa vhathu vha fhaḽa Johannesburg.

src_text: Jamie Bartlett (56), umdlali waseNingizimu Afrika wemidlalo yamabonakudze neyasesiteji, lobekadvume kakhulu, labekatidlala angu-Mike O'Reilly ku-Isidingo aphindze futsi abe ngu-David Genaro ku-Rhythm City.Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yahambisana naMengameli Ramaphosa ekulileleni hulumende kanye nebantfu base-United Arab Emirates (i-UAE) ngekushona kweSilo Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), Mengameli wase-UAE      Kubekwa EtikhundleniKutawuhlolwa ticu tabo bonkhe lababekwe etikhundleni kubuye futsi kucinisekiswe kufaneleka kwabo mayelana netekuphepha.
tgt_text: Phanḓa ha musi vha sa athu tholwa sa Ṋeḓorobo Muhulwane, vho shuma sa Muraḓo wa Komiti ya Ṋeḓorobo hweswaho vhuḓifhinduleli ha Tshumelo dza zwa Mupo na Themamveledziso.

src_text: Mnu.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Deborah Fraser (56), muimbi wa muzika wa zwa vhurereli ane dovha vha muwini wa pfufho nnzhi dza zwa muzika vhane vha kha ḓi tou bva huliswa zwenezwino nga avhelwa digirii ya Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music nga vha tshiimiswa tsha Christian Leadership Academy.

src_text: Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla ubekwe njengeMphatsihhovisi Lomkhulu  weBhodi Yetekutfutfukiswa Kwemboni Yetekwakha.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Namane Magau (70), vhane vha vha radzipfunzo ṱhonifheaho khathihi na vha muraḓo huliseaho wa Bodo ya Vhafarandaka vha Khoro ya Lushaka ya AIDS ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Mnu.
tgt_text: Vho Mike Schüssler (60), raikonomi wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe ḓivheaho we vha muraḓo fulufhedzeaho kha nḓowetshumo iyi nahone we ṋetshedza mihumbulo pfalaho nga ha tshiimo tsha ikonomi ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Shabeer Hamid Khan njengeMhlolimabhuku Jikelele weTemafa Avelonkhe.
tgt_text: Vho Jamie Bartlett (56), mutambi wa matambwa theḽevisheni na tshiteidzhini wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe ane wina pfufho nnzhi, we vha tshi ḓivhea nga maanḓa sa Mike O'Reilly kha Isidingo na David Genaro kha Rhythm City.

src_text: Mk.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ya rumela maipfi ayo ndiliso kha muvhuso na vhathu vha fhaḽa United Arab Emirates (UAE) nga murahu ha lovha ha Muḓivhalea Muṱahabvu Vho Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), vhe vha vha vhe Phresidennde wa UAE  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa lwa tshoṱhe nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.

src_text: Mendoe Ntswahlana njengeSikhulu Lesikhulu seTekutsengwa Kwetinsita kuTemafa Avelonkhe.
tgt_text: Vho Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla sa Muofisi Mulanguli Muhulwane wa Bodo ya Mveledziso ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa fhaṱa..     Vho Shabeer Hamid Khan sa Muḓivhambalelano Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka..     Mufumakadzi Vho Mendoe Ntswahlana sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa zwa renga Thundu na Tshumelo kha Muhasho wa Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya tendelana na zwa tholwa ha vhathu vha tevhelaho uri vha ḓadze zwikhala zwine zwa vha hone kha Bodo ya Vhalangi vha Tshikwama tsha Vhukati tsha zwa Fulufulu     Vho Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mufumakadzia Vho Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.

src_text: Temnotfo.
tgt_text: Ikonomi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungenelela lokuhle lokusandza kwenteka lokuhlose kuvuselela kukhula kwemnotfo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mveledziso dza zwezwino dzi vhuedzaho shango dzo tetshelwaho khwaṱhisa nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya nga figara dza vhushayamishumo dza zwezwino dzi bvaho kha Tshitatisitiki Afrika Tshipembe, vhushayamishumo ho tselafhasi bva kha.

src_text: Ngekwetinombolo letisandza kukhishwa letikhishwe beteLubalobalo TaseNingizimu Afrika, kuswelakala kwematfuba emsebenti kunciphe kusuka kumaphesenti la-.
tgt_text: 3 phesenthe kha kotara ya vhuṋa ya 2021 ya kha.

src_text: 3 kulekota yesine yemnyaka we-2021 kwaya kumaphesenti la-.
tgt_text: 5 phesenthe kha kotara ya thoma ya.

src_text: 5 kukota yekucala yemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Tshikalo tsha vhushayamishumo tshe tsha vha tsho gonyelanṱha tsho tselafhasi kha kotara ya vhuvhili nga tevhekanya.

src_text: Lokukhula kwemazinga ematfuba ekungacashwa kunciphe kwalandzelana emakota lamabili.
tgt_text: Mbuyelo khulwane ya mishumo yo vha kha tshitshavha na tshumelo dza matshilisano, mveledziso na mbambadzo..     Zwibveledzwaguṱe zwapo kha kotara ya thoma ya 2022 zwo engedzea nga.

src_text: Umkhakha wetematfuba emsebenti lozuze kakhulu ngilowetinsita temmango netenhlalakahle, tekukhucita netekuhwebelana.
