src_text: Sicela imimango kutsi idlale indzima yayo ekugcineni bantfwabetfu baphephile ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi..     Bantfwana labaneminyaka lengaphasi kwe-18 abakavunyelwa kungena emathaveni, emashibhini, emaphabhu nasetitolo tetjwala.
Batsengisi betjwala labatfolakala bephula noma yimiphi yalemitsetfo kumele babekwe emacala baphindze futsi bemukwe netincwadzi tabo tekusebenta.
tgt_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela thaveni ya fhaḽa East London.

Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu shushaho vhukuma tshe tsha bvelela Thaveni ya Enyobeni ine ya vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya East London vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 26 Fulwi 2022 he khatsho ha lovha vhaswa vha swikaho 21, tsho shusha shango ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Imiphumela Yengcungcutsela yeLicembu Lemave Lasikhombisa (i-G7).
tgt_text: Zwi konḓa vhukuma lingedza humbula nga ha vhuṱungu vhune vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhana nga nḓila yeneyi ya makhaulambilu ngaurali vha khou vhu pfa..     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhafunwa vhayo ya dovha hafhu ya livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe kha thikhedzo yavho ya zwa vhuthu ye vha ṋetshedza kha miṱa iyi ine ya khou lila nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tshi konḓaho ngaurali zwi pfasesei zwavhuḓi uri ndi ngani fhethu afho ho vha ho tendelwa na vhana vhaṱuku vhukuma vhane vha vha na miṅwaha ya 13 uri vha dzhene vha nwe mahalwa.

src_text: Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela kuNgcungcutsela yeBaholi be-G7 lebeyibanjelwe eBavaria, eJalimane ngeMsombuluko, mhla tinge-27 ngeNhlaba.
tgt_text: Ri khou ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha zwoṱhe ya uri zwi shele mulenzhe kha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu uri vha dzule vho tsireledzea misi yoṱhe.

src_text: Mengameli – lowahlanganyela etingcocweni tekusebenta lapho khona  bekudzingidvwa tesimo selitulu, emandla agezi, temphilo, kutfolakala kwekudla emhlabeni wonkhe kanye netindzaba tekulingana ngekwebulili – bekamenye ngumngenisi (sokhaya), Shansela Olaf Scholz..     I-G7 iyinkhundla yetepolitiki lefaka ekhatsi iCanada, iFrance, iGermany, i-Italy, iJapan, ne-United Kingdom kanye ne-United States     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
Luhlaka Lwemitsetfotimiso Yemkhakha Wetemtsetfo (Luhlaka Lwe-LSC).
tgt_text: Vhana vha miṅwaha re fhasi ha 18 vho ngo tendelwa dzhena ngomu dzithaveni, zwipotoni, phabuni na mavhengeleni u rengisa mahalwa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweLuhlaka Lwe-LSC kute kutsi sive siphawule ngalo.
tgt_text: Vharengisi vha mahalwa vhane vha ḓo wanala vha tshi khou pfuka muṅwe wa iyo milayo vha tea farelwa mulandu wa vhugevhenga nahone ha dovha ha dzhiwa na ṱhanziela dzavho dza rengisa.

src_text: Tinjongo talemitsetfotimiso kuchuba tingucuko temkhakha wetemtsetfo kute kutsi kube nekumelelwa ngekuya kwetinhlobonhlobo tebantfu balelive.
Lemitsetfotimiso itawuphindze futsi icinisekise kwakhiwa kwemtimba lotawukhicita batfulitinsita betemtsetfo labaceceshwe ngalokufanele nalabawatiko umsebenti wabo.
tgt_text: Mvelelo dza Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7).

src_text: Kwakhiwa kwaloLuhlaka Lwe-LSC bekwenganyelwe nguMkhandlu Webasebenti Betemtsetfo, umtimba wetemtsetfo lowasungulwa ngekwemibandzela yeSigaba se-4 seMtsetfo Wekusebenta Kwetemtsetfo, 2014 (Umtsetfo we-28 wanga-2014) futsi bowukhonjwindlela nguMtsetfo Wekuhlomisa Ngemandla Emnotfo Umkhakha Lobanti Webantfu Labamnyama (i-B-BBEE), 2013 (Umtsetfo 46 wanga-2013).
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho shela mulenzhe kha Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7) we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Bavaria, kha ḽa Germany nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 27 Fulwi.

src_text: Umtsetfo we-B-BBEE wanga-2013 unika Indvuna yeTekuhwebelana, Timboni Nemncintiswano kutsi ikhiphe imitsetfotimiso yekusebenta ngalokufanele  kutekuhlonyiswa kwalabamnyama ngemnotfo emikhakheni-ngco letsite.
tgt_text: Phresidennde – vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha madzulo u shuma he khaho ha vha hu tshi khou ambiwa nga mafhungo kwamaho kilima, fulufulu, mutakalo, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe nga angaredza khathihi na mafhungo zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu, vho vha vho rambiwa nga murangaphanḓa wa shango ḽe vhuṱambo uvhu ha vha ho farelwa khaḽo, Mutshantseḽara Vho Olaf Scholz..     Muṱangano uyu wa G7 ndi foramu ya zwa polotiki ya vhukati ha mashango ngaho Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom na ḽa United States     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Emalunga etebungcweti betemtsetfo kwamanje ete umtsetfosimiso wemkhakha lobakhombindlela ekulungiseni kungalingani nekungasimami lokukhona kutebungcweti betemtsetfo.
tgt_text: Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC).

src_text: Luhlaka Lwe-LSC lutawushicilelwa kuGazethi yahulumende emalanga lange-60 kute kutsi sive sitfole sikhatsi sekuphawula..     Imibiko yenchubekelembili yekusebenta leyetfulwa kabili ngemnyaka.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyivumile imibiko yenchubekelembili yekusebenta leyetfulwa kabili yangeMphala 2021 kuya kuNdlovulenkhulu.
tgt_text: Zwipikwa zwa idzi khoudu ndi ṱuṱuwedza tshanduko ya sekhithara ya zwa mulayo itela swikela zwa imelelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe ya nga mirafho ya vhathu vha ḽino shango.

src_text: Lemibiko yenta incenye yeLuhlakamsebenti Lwelisubuciko Lwethemu Lesemkhatsini (lwe-MTSF) 2019-.
tgt_text: Khoudu iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mveledziso ya tshiimiswa tshine tsha ḓo bveledza vhaṋetshedzi vha tshumelo dza zwa mulayo vho pfumbudzwaho nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone vha re na vhukoni.

src_text: Le-MTSF 2019-2024 luhlelo lwekuphumelelisa kanye neluhlakamsebenti lwekulandzelela lwekuzuza Luhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Lwavelonkhe: Bomabekwembili beMbononchanti 2030 belulawulo lwahulumende lwesitfupha.

Lemibiko igcile kubomabekwembili bahulumende labasikhombisa, lekungulaba (1) Kugucula temnotfo nekwakha imisebenti; (2) Temfundvo, emakhono netemphilo; (3) Kuhlanganiswa kwemholombasha wetenhlalo ngekusebentisa tinsita letetsembekile naletisezingeni lelingulonalona; (4) Kuhlanganiswa kwendzawo, kuhlaliswa kwebantfu nahulumende wasekhaya; (5) Lubumbano lwetenhlalo nemimango lephephile; (6) umbuso lokhonako, lonesimilo nalotfutfukisako; kanye (7) ne-Afrika lencono kanye nemhlaba, kanye netingenelelo letiphatselene naloko telulawulo lwesitfupha..     Ikhabhinethi itemukele tindzawo letisadzinga inchubekelembili kulemigomo lencunyiwe yesikhatsi lesibuyeketwako.
tgt_text: Zwa bveledzwa ha Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) zwo vha zwo rangwa phanḓa nga vha Khoro ya Maitele zwa Mulayo, ine ya vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa mulayo tshe tsha vhumbwa hu tshi tevhedzwa Khethekanyo 4 ya Mulayo wa Maitele zwa Mulayo, wa 2014 (Mulayo 28 wa 2014) ya dovha ya ṱuṱuwedzwa nga Mulayo wa Maanḓafhadzwa ha Vharema ho Angalalaho kha zwa Ikonimi (B-BBEE), wa 2013 (Mulayo 46 wa 2013).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yabona tindzawo letidzinga lungenelelo kute kutsi kulungiswe kubambeleleka, leto letatfola umtselela lomubi impela wekubakhona kwelubhubhane i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Mulayo wa B-BBEE wa 2013 na mbetshelwa ya uri Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Muṱaṱisano vha kone ṋetshedza khoudu dza maitele avhuḓi dza nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema kha zwa ikonomi kha sekhithara dzo teaho.
Miraḓo ya buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo swika zwino vha athu vha na khoudu ya sekhithara ine ya vha yone ine ya vha eletshedza kha zwa tandulula thaidzo dza sa eḓana na tshayandingano kha buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo.

src_text: Tindvuna titawubamba imihlangano nebetindzaba kulamaviki letako ticacise imibiko yato tiphindze futsi tenabe mayelana netindzawo letidzinga kutsi kuciniswe kusebenta     Umkhosi lotako.
Inkhomfa Yabosomboni Labamnyama Labatsengisela Lamanye Emave (I-BIEC).
tgt_text: Heyi Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) ḓo anḓadzwa kha Gurannḓa ya Muvhuso lwa maḓuvha 60 itela uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi..     Muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya mashumele ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.

src_text: I-BIEC lelivulandlela itawubanjelwa eSikhungweni Semave Emhlaba Setingcungcutsela e-Sandton International Convention Centre, eJozi ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-20 Kholwane.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ya tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021 swika Shundunthule.
Mivhigo iyi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha Muhanga wa Puḽane dza Tshifhinga tsha Vhukati ha Ṅwaha (MTSF) wa bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Lenkhomfa ita ngemuva kwekutfulwa kweNethiwekhi Yabosomboni Labamnyama Nebatsengisi leyetfulwe nguhulumende, lesekela bosomboni labamnyama kute kutsi bakhone kungena etimakethe letinsha, baphindze futsi batfole timali tekutsengisa imikhicito yabo kulamanye emave kanye netindlela tekumaketha     Umlayeto.
tgt_text: MTSF dza tshifhinga tsha bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa 2024 ndi dzone puḽane dza shuma khathihi na muhanga wa vhulavhelesi hu tshi itelwa swikela Puḽane ya mveledziso ya Lushaka: Zwipikwa zwa Bono ḽa 2030 zwa ndangulo ya muvhuso wa vhurathi.

src_text: KuhalalisaIkhabhinethi indlulisela kuhalalisa netilokotfo letinhle ku: Emabhokobhoko, ngekuncoba ngalokujabulisako ekugcineni ancoba i-Wales ngesikhatsi semidlalo yekuvana emandla lemitsatfu eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo eLoftus Versveld ePitoli ngeMgcibelo, mhla ti-2 Kholwane.
tgt_text: Mivhigo yo lavhelesa nga maanḓa kha zwipikwa zwa sumbe zwa muvhuso, zwine zwa vha (1) Tshanduko ya Ikonomi na sikwa ha mishumo; (2) Pfunzo, zwikili na mutakalo; (3) khwaṱhisa muholo wa zwa matshilisano nga shumisa tshumelo dza fhasisa dzine dza vha dza maimo nṱha nahone dzi fulufhedzeaho; (4) ṱanganywa ha fhethu, vhudzulo ha vhathu na muvhuso wapo; (5) Vhuthihi ha vhadzulapo na zwitshavha zwo tsireledzeaho; (6) shango ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni, maitele mikhwa yavhuḓi na mvelaphanḓa; khathihi na (7) Afrika ḽa khwinesa hu tshi katelwa na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe khathihi na dzhenelela ho teaho ha ndangulo ya muvhuso ya vhurathi..     Khabinethe yo dovha ya ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa kha zwipikwa zwo tiwaho zwa tshifhinga tshine tsha vha nga fhasi ha tsenguluso.

src_text: Banyana Banyana, ngekuncoba kwabo iNigeria  2-1 ekuvuleni umdlalo wabo weNdzebe Yabomake Yemave Ase-Afrika, longeniswe yiMorocco, ngeMsombuluko, mhla ti-4 Kholwane     Kubekwa Etikhundleni    Kutawuhlolwa ticu tabo bonkhe lababekwe etikhundleni kubuye futsi kucinisekiswe kufaneleka kwabo mayelana netekuphepha.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha na afho hune ha kha ḓi vha na ṱhoḓea ya dzhenelela hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo ya tshilengo tshe tsha vha hone nga mulandu wa ṱaha ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.

src_text: Dkt.
Nyameko Barney Pityana njengaSihlalo we-National Lotteries Commission..     Ummeli Rory Voller njengaKhomoshina we-Companies and Intellectual Property Commission.
tgt_text: Dziminisṱa vha ḓo fara miṱangano na vhoramafhungo kha vhege dzi si gathi dzi ḓaho itela bvisela khagala mivhigo yavho nga fhambana hayo khathihi na ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwi elanaho na afho hune ha vha hu tshi khou tea khwaṱhiswa mashumele     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Imibuto: Mk.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Vhoranḓowetshumo khathihi na Vhavhambadzelannḓa vha Vharema (BIEC).

src_text: Temandla.
tgt_text: Fulufulu.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungenelela lokwentiwe nguhulumende lokutawubukana nalenhlekelele yagezi walelive.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga a ḓivhadzwa nga muvhuso u tandulula thaidzo dza fulufulu dzine shango ḽa khou ṱangana nadzo.

src_text: Letinyatselo letibanti titawuvula indlela letawucedza loluhlelo lwekucishwa kwagezi ngenhloso yekuwonga, titawugucula lomkhakha wetegezi futsi titawenta kutsi kuphumelele loluhlelo lwesikhatsi lesidze lwekutfolakala kwagezi.
tgt_text: Maga aya angalalaho ngaurali ndi one ane ḓo vula nḓila dza fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi shandukisa sekithara ya muḓagasi khathihi na swikela zwa nḓisedzo ya fulufulu lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Kute sisekele legridi yagezi nekusita live lakitsi kulokucindzeteleka kwekuphakela kwagezi, kufuneka sinciphise kusebentisa gezi wesive sakitsi ngema-megawatts la-600 kuletinyanga letitako letintsatfu.
Imindeni nayo ingadlala yayo indzima yekonga gezi ngekucisha onkhe emalambu langakabaluleki kanye netintfo tagezi letisebentisa gezi lomnengi ngetikhatsi gezi lasetjentiswa kakhulu ngato.
tgt_text: Sa ndingedzo dzashu dza tikedza netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi khathihi na thusa shango ḽashu kha vhuleme vhune ḽa khou ṱangana naho kha zwa nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, ri tea fhungudza tshivhalo tsha muḓagasi une shango ḽashu ḽa shumisa nga megawati dza 600 kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi miraru ḓaho..   Miṱa nga shela mulenzhe kha vhulunga fulufulu nga dzima zwishumiswa zwoṱhe zwo fungwaho zwine zwa si vhe zwa ndeme khathihi na izwo zwi shumisesaho fulufulu nga zwifhinga zwa musi hu na ṱhoḓea khulwane ya muḓagasi.

src_text: Emabhizinisi ayagcugcutelwa kutsi alandzelele bucwepheshe lobunendlela lekahle kakhulu yekukhicita gezi nekutsi afake sandla kumitamo yekunciphisa kusetjentiswa kakhulu kwagezi.

tgt_text: Fulo ḽa Vulindlela.

src_text: I-Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho nga fhasi ha Fulo ḽa Vulindlela ḽo livhiswaho kha fhelisa vhukonḓi vhune ha vha hone kha sekhithara dza zwa fulufulu, vhudavhidzani ha ṱhingo, maḓi na zwa vhuendelamashango hu tshi itelwa vusulusa ikonomi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela loko losekwentiwe ngaphasi kwaloluhlelo lwe-Operation Vulindlela lekucedza kusalela emuva kwemsebenti kulemikhakha yetegezi, yetekuchumana, neyetemanti netekuvakasha kute kuvuselelwe umnotfo..   Tiyimfica kuleti-26 tindlela tekuvuselela umnotfo lekuphunyelelwe kuto, leti-11 tikhomba inchubekela embili lenhle.
tgt_text: Ho no swikelwa tshandukiso dza zwa milayo dza ṱahe kha dza 26, hune dziṅwe tshandukiso dza milayo dzi swikaho 11 dza khou vhonala hu tshi khou vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi khadzo.

src_text: Leti lekuphunyelelwe kuto tifaka ekhatsi kukhulisa umkhawulo lobekiwe wekukhishwa kwemalayisensi ekukhicita gezi, kugucula nekuhlela kabusha Luphiko Lwavelonkhe Lwemacweba aka-Transnet, kukhishwa kweluhlu lolusha lwemakhono labucayi  nekusebentisa luhlelo lwe-e-Visa emaveni la-14, lafaka ekhatsi timakethe letinsha tetekuvakasha letifana neChina, i-India, iKenya neNigeria.
tgt_text: Magundo no swikelwaho ndi ane katela zwa engedzwa ha vhuhulwane ha ḽaisentsi dza bveledza muḓagasi une wa ḓo dzheniswa kha netiweke khulwane ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, zwa shandukiswa ha khamphani ya muvhuso ya Maanḓalanga Vhuimangalavha ha Lushaka ya Transnet ya kha vha khamphani ya zwa makwevho yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe phaḓaladzwa ha mutevhe wo shandukiswaho wa zwikili zwa ndeme khathihi na thoma shumiswa ha sisteme ya e-Visa kha mashango 14, hu tshi katelwa na mimaraga miswa mihulwane ya zwa vhuendelamashango sa shango ḽa China, India, Kenya na Nigeria..   Khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu na Mabulayo Vhafumakadzi (GBVF).
Khabinethe yo sumbedza vhaiswa nga zwiito zwa tshiṱuhu zwa tshipiwa ha vhafumakadzi vha malo zwine zwa kha ḓi tou bva itea ngei Krugersdorp kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: Budlova lobubhekiswe Kubulili lobutsite Nekubulawa kwalabasikati (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Hezwi zwiito zwivhi ngaurali khathihi na tambudzwa ha vhafumakadzi ndi zwine zwa khakhisa vhudziki na vhuthihi vhune ha vha hone zwitshavhani zwashu.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka kakhulu ngalokudlengulwa lokusandza kwenteka kulabasikati eKrugersdorp, eGauteng.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya fhululedza vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha fara nga ṱavhanya vhunzhi ha vhahumbulelwa kha vhugevhenga uvhu ha tshiṱuhu ngaurali..   Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha ya uri zwi shumisane na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo nga kovhana navho mafhungo maṅwe na maṅwe kana vhiga zwiito zwi soliseaho.

src_text: Letento letimbi nekuhlukunyetwa kwalabasikati tibukela phasi indlela lesiphilisana ngayo.
tgt_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu zwi vhe fhethu ho tsireledzeaho kha vhana na vhafumakadzi..   Mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe wa Afrika Tshipembe na vhuḓifhinduleli ha lwa na vhaiti vha zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi nga fhasi ha mulayo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yancoma kakhulu Tembutfo Wetemisebenti Yetemaphoyisa AseNingizimu Afrika ngalokushesha abophe linani lelitsite lebasolwa labatsintsekako kulelicala lelisabekako.
tgt_text: Kha vha vhige zwiwo zwoṱhe zwine zwa elana na GBVF kha tshiṱitshi tsha mapholisa tshi re tsini navho kana vha tou founela kha nomboro ya mahala ya Fhelisa Zwiito zwa Vhugevhenga ya: 0860 01 0111, Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiito zwa GBVF ya Lushaka kha: 0800 428 428 kana kha Nomboro ya Luṱingo ya Thuso ya Fhelisa Khakhathi dza zwa Mbeu ya: 0800 150. .

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icela imimango kutsi isebentisane nema-ejensi etemtsetfo ngekutsi yabelane nganoma ngiluphi lwatiso noma ngekubika imikhuba lesolekekayo.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi.

src_text: Ngekusebentisana, singenta kutsi imimango yakitsi ibe ngulephephile ebantfwaneni nakulabasikati..   Wonkhe umuntfu waseNingizimu Afrika unemsebenti wekulwa nalabo lababhebhetselisa budlova ngendlela lelandzela umtsetfo.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi une wa pembelelwa ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule ndi une khawo ha fhululedzwa vhafumakadzi vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha nndwa ya mbofholowo khathihi na vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi vhoṱhe zwitshavhani zwashu.

src_text: Bika ngato tonkhe tigameko letimayelana ne-GBVF esiteshini semaphoyisa sangakini noma ushayele lenombolo yamahhala Yekulwa Nebugebengu letsi: 0860 01 0111, kuSikhungo Savelonkhe Semiyalo nge-GBVF letsi: 0800 428 428 noma Inombolo Yekulwa Nebudlova Betebulili letsi: 0800 150. .
Inyanga Yabomake.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi wa ṋaṅwaha ndi une wa khou fhululedzwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Pfanelo dza Vhafumakadzi kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi khathihi na Maanḓafhadzwa Fhaṱa hafhu nga nḓila ya Khwine hu tshi itelwa Konḓelela ho Khwinifhadzeaho ha Vhafumakadzi”..   Vhafumakadzi vha fhiraho 20 000 vhe vha gwalaba vho livha ngei Union Buildings, ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 9 Ṱhangule 1956 vho shela mulenzhe kha ita uri zwa ndinganyiselo nga mbeu na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi zwi dzulele vha tshone tshipikwa tshihulwane tsha muvhuso wa demokirasi wa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Ingci yinyanga yemnyaka yabomake lapho khona kubungatwa bomake labadlala indzima kulomzabalazo wenkhululeko kanye nabo bonkhe bomake emangweni.

Inyanga Yabomake yalomnyaka itawubungatwa ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Emalungelo Abomake Kutenhlalo Netemnotfo Nekutfutfukiswa Kwabo: Kuphindza Sakhe Kancono Kute Sitfutfukise Bomake Bakhone Kumelane Nebumatima”.
tgt_text: Maga aya vhuhali vhafumakadzi avha vha dzhia ṱuṱuwedza vhunzhi ha vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi nga angaredza uri na vhone vha ḓiwane vha tshi khou dzhia maimo nṱha Phaḽamenndeni, kha muvhuso na ngomu kha zwitshavha zwa havho nahone rikhou bvela phanḓa na khwaṱhisa mvelaphanḓa iyi tou bva tshe ra wana mbofholowo nga ṅwaha wa.
Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha Marikana.

src_text: Labomake labangetulu kwe-20 000 labamashela e-Union Buildings ePitori mhla ti-9 ngemnyaka we-1956 bafaka sandla ekucinisekiseni kutsi kulingana ngekwebulili nekutfutfukiswa kwabo kutawuhlala kuyintfo lemcoka lecaliswa embili kuNingizimu Afrika Yentsandvoyelinyenti.
tgt_text: Nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 16 Ṱhangule 2022, muvhuso khathihi na shango ḽoṱhe nga angaredza wo vha na ḓuvha ḽa humbula nga ha tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela fhaḽa Marikana kha ḽa North West nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Letento tabo tekungasabi tagcugcutela bomake jikelele kutsi batsatse indzawo yabo lefanelekile ePhalamende, kuhulumende kanye nakutinhlangano temmango, futsi sisachubeka njalo nekwakha kuloku losekwentiwe kusukela kwatfolakala inkhululeko ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Vhuṱungu he vhashumi vha vhu pfa, miṱa yavho khathihi na lushaka nga angaredza vhu ḓo dzulela vha tshipiḓa tsha ḓivhazwakale yashu swikela zwenezwo.

src_text: Sikhumbuto SaseMarikana.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Mvusuluso ya Marikana yo no thoma shuma itela fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa khathihi na bveledza nyimele yavhuḓi itela khwinisa matshilo zwitshavha zwa fhaḽa Marikana.

src_text: NgaLesibili, mhla ti-16 Ingci 2022, hulumende uhlanganyele naso sonkhe sive sakitsi kukhumbula ingoti leyenteka eMarikana eNyakatfo Nshonalanga ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Ṅwaha wo fhelaho, muvhuso wo badela masheleni ndiliso linganaho R176 miḽioni kha miṱa ya zwipondwa ngeno hu na uri milandu yo salaho ine ya kha ḓi vha khothe tshi khou lavhelelwa khunyeledzwa mafheloni ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src_text: Buhlungu lebaviwa basebenti, imindeni yabo kanye naso sonkhe sive sakitsi butawuhlala bugcilile emlandvweni wetfu.
Loluhlelo Lwekuvuselela iMarikana lusetjentisiwe ekwakheni kabusha nasekusunguleni simondzawo lesivumako kutsi kutfutfukiswe timphilo temmango waseMarikana.
tgt_text: Ho vha na nnḓu dza tshivhalo ntswa kana dze dza tou vusuluswa dze dza ṋetshedzwa kha tshilikadzi dza fhaḽa Marikana ngeno hu na dziṅwe dzine dza ḓo fhela fhaṱwa uno ṅwaha.

src_text: Lomnyaka lowengcile hulumende ubhadale imali lesincepheteliso letigidzi leti-R176 kuncephetelisa imindeni yalabo labatsintseka kantsi emacala lasilele lasenkantolo kulindzeleke kutsi aphotfulwe ngasekupheleni kwenyanga yeNgci.
tgt_text: Thandela ya zwa dzinnḓu ya masheleni linganaho R700 miḽioni ḓo ita uri vhashumi vha migodini vha kone ṋetshedzwa madzulo khwine.
Hu khou ṋetshedzwa hafhu na themamveledziso ya zwa matshilisano ya ndeme ine ya ḓo thusa kha khwinifhadza nyimele dza kutshilele kwa zwitshavha zwa vhupo vhune ha vha na zwa migodi.

src_text: Kunetindlu letinengi letivuselelwe naletisha letakhiwe taniketwa kubafelokati baseMarikana kantsi letinye titawuphotfulwa kulomnyaka.
Kunemklamo wetindlu wetigidzi leti-R700 lotawenta kutsi basebenti basetimayini babonelelwe ngetindlu letisezingeni.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM) kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: Sakhiwonchanti lesimcoka setenhlalo siyaphakelwa kute kutfutfukiswe simo imimango yasetimayini lephila kuso..   Imbizo YaMengameli YaseGauteng Lemayelana Neluhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Tigodzi (i-DDM).
tgt_text: Nga murahu ha tshimbila zwavhuḓi ha Imbizo dza Phresidennde dza nga ha DDM tharu dzo fhiraho dze dza farelwa fhaḽa North West, Free State na Mpumalanga nga fhambana hadzo, Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng re kha ḽa Gauteng wone wo fara imbizo yawo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 12 Ṱhangule..   Nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A huna tsaleli”, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa ha vhaofisiri vhahulwane vha bvaho kha mivhuso yapo, wa vunḓu na wa lushaka.

src_text: Kulandzela lemphumelelo lebe khona yaletiMbizo TaMengameli letintsatfu te-DDM letenteke eNyakatfo Nshonalanga, eFree State naseMpumalanga ngekwehlukahlukana, Masipala Wesigodzi SaseSedibeng eGauteng ubambe imbizo yesine ngaLesihlanu, mhla ti-12 Ingci.
tgt_text: Vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe bva kha zwiimiswa na sekhithara dzavho dzo fhambanaho, vho swika he vha kuvhangana vha tshi itela uri vha kone lwa na engedzea ha tshikalo tsha vhushai khathihi na vhuheḓana vhune ha khou vhangwa nga nyimele dzine dza si vhe dzavhuḓi dza ikonomi.

src_text: Ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Ungashiyi muntfu emuva”, Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa bekahola licembu lakhe letikhulu tahulumende letisetulu letibuya kuhulumende wavelonkhe, wesifundza newendzawo.
tgt_text: Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng tsho vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane ya ita uri Vhupo ha Ikonomi yo Khetheaho ha Vaal River (SEZ) vhu kone shuma, vhune ha vha vhupo vhu re na khonadzeo khulwane ya ita uri dzingu iḽi, vunḓu kana shango ḽi dovhe hafhu vha fhethu hune khaho ha nga itwa zwa nḓowetshumo.

src_text: Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika ngekwehlukahlukana kwabo nangekwemikhakha yabo bahlanganiswa kute basebentisane balwe nekukhula kwemazinga ebuphuya nekuswela kakhulu lokubangwa ngulenseyeya yesimo setemnotfo.
tgt_text: SEZ ya fhaḽa Vaal River khou dzudzanya uri hu vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo vha na sekhithara dza ndeme dzi tevhelaho: Vaal River Smart City ntswa; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight khathihi na sekhithara yo vusuluswaho ya bveledza tsimbi.

src_text: Sigodzi sase-Sedibeng sichubekile ekwenteni kutsi isebente i-Vaal River Special Economic Zone (i-SEZ), lenemandla ekwenta kutsi kwakhiwe kabusha timboni kulendzawo, kulesifundza nakulelive.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde.

src_text: Le-Vaal River SEZ ihlele kutsi kube nalemikhakha lemcoka lelandzelako: Indzawo yesimanje lelidolobhakati lenato tonkhe tinsita tekuhlalisa bantfu (i-Smart City) lebitwa ngekutsi yi-Vaal River Smart City; ihabhu yekusungula ihayidrojini lehlantekile, ihabhu yemikhicito yensango; luhlelo lwekuhanjiswa kwemikhicito yetekulima; lidolobhakati lelitawuba nesikhumulo setindiza; sikhumulo setindiza lesincane; tekutfutswa kwemphahla ngetindiza kanye nekuvuselela umkhakha wekuchicita insimbi.
tgt_text: 1   Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde we wa farelwa fhaḽa Ekurhuleni, kha ḽa Gauteng bva nga ḽa 4 swikela ḽa 5 Ṱhangule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U Ṱuṱuwedza Vhuthihi ha zwa Matshilisano hu tshi Itelwa Shela Mulenzhe kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi nga Zwitshavha”, wo ṱanganya vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho bva kha masia fhambanaho itela uri vha shumisane na muvhuso muhumbulo muhulwane wa tandulula khaedu dza zwa matshilisano na ikonomi khathihi na kuvhanganya zwishumiswa zwo teaho hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya zwitshavha..    Muṱangano wo dzhiela nṱha mivhigo ya nyambedzano bva kha mavunḓu ṱahe ine ya amba nga ha khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo, dzi katelaho swikela masheleni, mafhungo zwa milayo, tshandukiso ya sekhithara ya zwa matshilisano muhumbulo wa ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka ha tshumisano vhukati ha muvhuso na vhadzulapo hu tshi itelwa tandulula khaedu dzi elanaho na vhushai, tshayandingano na shayea ha mishumo.

Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na vhadzulapo ya uri vha shele mulenzhe nga nḓila yo fhelelaho kha ita uri ri kone fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine, sa zwine zwa khou lavhelelwa kha Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Lushaka: Bono ḽa   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Umhlangano waMengameli Wemkhakha Wetenhlalo.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki.

src_text: Umhlangano waMengameli wemkhakha wetenhlalo bewubanjwe Ekurhuleni, eGauteng kusuka mhla ti-4 kuya kumhla ti-5 Ingci 2022 ngaphasi kwesihloko lesitsi: “Kukhutsata Kubumbana Esiveni Kute Imimango Ihlanganyele Kutemnotfo Nakutenhlalo”, wahlanganisa balingani labavela emimangweni lehlukahlukene kute basebente nahulumende kubukana netinseyeya tetemnotfo netenhlalo nekuta netindlela tekutfola tinsita letitawusetjentiswa tinhlangano temmango, kulokunye kwaletinhloso.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Lomhlangano ubuke imibiko yekucocisana levela kuletifundza letiyimfica lemayelana netinseyeya tato, lebetifaka ekhatsi indlela yekutfola imali, tindzaba tekulawula, kugucula umkhakha wetetimali kute ukhutsate budlelwane emkhatsini kwetinhlangano temmango nahulumende kute ukhone kubukana netinseyeya letimayelana nebuphuya, kungalingani nekuswelakala kwemisebenti.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi yo sedzesa kha zwa vhutsila ha vhona nga maṱo, vhuvhaḓi na nyolo, ha vhona nga maṱo na thetshelesa nga nḓevhe khathihi na nyanḓadzamafhungo dza vhukati ha vhavhili; nyolo na tshumelo dza zwa vhusiki, mabepha na minyanya hu tshi katelwa na muzika, nyanḓadzamafhungo dza nyanḓadzo na khanḓiso.

src_text: IKhabhinethi icele tinhlangano temmango netakhamuti kutsi tidlale indzima yato kucinisekisa kutsi sakha likusasa lelincono, njengoba kucatjangwa kuLuhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwentfutfuko: Umbono Wemnyaka We-    Tincumo teKhabhinethi.
Luhlelo Lolukhulu Lwetemasiko Nelwebuciko.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi ḓo dzhenelela kha sekhithara dzenedzi ho livhiwa kha fhaṱa sekhithara ya zwa vhusiki yo shandukiswaho ine ya dzhielwa nṱha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nahone ya dovha ya vha ya maimo nṱha ḽifhasini ḓo dovha hafhu ya shuma yo livha kha ita uri nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhusiki ya Afrika Tshipembe kone swikela mimaraga yapo na ya dzitshaka.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi Loluhlelo Lolukhulu Lwetemasiko Nelwebuciko lusetjentiswe.

Loluhlelo Lolukhulu lugcile kakhulu kutebuciko lobubonakalako, kumisebenti yetetandla neyekudizayina, yekubona nekulalela, neyekucocisana; yetemisebenti yekudizayina nekuticambela; yekulingisa nekubungata, lefaka ekhatsi umculo, kushicilela netemaphephandzaba.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele yo Dzudzanyululwaho ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khwinifhadzwa ha Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.

src_text: Loluhlelo Lolukhulu lutawungenelela kulemikhakha kute kwakhiwe umkhakha lomusha webuciko lotawatiwa emhlabeni wonkhe futsi ube sezingeni laloko.
tgt_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi kanzhi ndi dze dza itwa kha khethekanyo ya zwa khadzimiso ya uno muhanga.

src_text: Lutawusebenta kwenta kutsi imboni yebuciko yaseNingizimu Afrika ikhone kufinyelela kutimakethe tendzawo netemave emhlaba.
tgt_text: Dziṅwe dza khwinifhadzo dzine dza khou dzinginywa ndi ḓivhadzwa ha tshifhinga tsha khadzimiso dza masheleni dza tshifhinga tshilapfu tshine tsha ḓo elana na tshifhinga tsha shumisea ha dziṅwe dza ndaka dzenedzo dzine dza khou avhelwa masheleni ayo.

Khwinifhadzo idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha zwiimiswa zwa masheleni mveledziso kha sia ḽa zwa khadzimiso dza masheleni dza mimasipala..   Khethekanyo 230 ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 maanḓafhadza mimasipala uri ite khadzimiso dza masheleni hu tshi itelwa uri kone engedza masheleni ayo ane ya shumisa kha londa ndaka dzayo kana ane shumiswa kha mbadelo dza ḓuvha na ḓuvha.

src_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lwemtsetfomgomo Lobuyeketiwe Wekuboleka Timali Kwabomasipala Newetimo Letiphutfumako Tetemali.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa thoma wo tendelwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋea ṱhalutshedzo kha Ndima ya 6 na ya 13 ya Mulayo wa zwa Masheleni ha Masipala, wa 2003 (Mulayo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itivumile letichibiyelo letikuLuhlakamsebenti Lwemtsetfomgomo Wekuboleka Timali Kwabomasipala Newetimo Letiphutfumako Tetimali lokhona nyalo.
tgt_text: Hedzi khwinifhadzo dzo tendelwaho ndi dzine dza ḓo vhuedza vhahadzimisi vhanzhi vhane vha hadzimisa mimasipala masheleni fhedzi dzi ḓo ḓi bvela phanḓa na tevhedza maitele ndeme ane langa khadzimiso dza ha masipala.

src_text: Letichibiyelo tenteke kakhulu kulesigaba sekubolekwa saloluhlakamsebenti.
Kulokunye kwaletichibiyelo letihlongotwako ngilokufaka kutsi kube nesikhatsi lesengetiwe sekuboleka kute sihambisane nesikhatsi sekusebenta kwalenye imphahla letsengwe ngalemali.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dze dza rekhodiwa nga kotara ya ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.

src_text: Letichibiyelo tibuye futsi tichaze umsebenti wetikhungo tetimali tentfutfuko yalendzawo bomasipala lababolekela yona.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa ha ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara.

src_text: Sigaba 230 Semtsetfosisekelo WaseNingizimu Afrika Semnyaka we-1996 sinika bomasipala emandla ekutsi baboleke imali yekwenta imiklamo yabo lemikhulu noma yekubukana netindleko tabo.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwo vha itela shandukisa maitele kale mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga fhano shangoni dza vha dzi tshi bviswa nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lwekucala lavunywa yiKhabhinethi ngemnyaka we-2000 kute lukhombe indlela Sahluko se-6 nese-13 Semtsetfo Wetimali Tabomasipala, we-2003 (Umtsetfo wema-56 we-2003).
tgt_text: oyu ṅwedzi une wa ḓo rangela bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga une wa khou dzinginywa ndi wa Ṱhangule 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya thoma na ṅwedzi wa Ḽara 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya vhuvhili.

src_text: Letichibiyelo letivunyiwe tihlose kukhutsata kutsi kwandze babolekisi betimali kuletimakethe tabomasipala kodvwa babe bachubeka kulandzela letimiso letingumgogodla letichaza ngekuboleka kwabomasipala.
tgt_text: Mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara ya vhuraru na kotara ya vhuṋa dzi ḓo bviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi na wa Shundunthule 2023 nga fhambana hazwo fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD).

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tshe tsha vha tsho ḓivhadzwa nga murahu ha miḓalo tshinyadzaho ye ya vha hone ngei vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha na ḽa KwaZulu-Natal..   Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tsho fhelelwa nga tshifhinga nga ḽa 18 Ṱhangule 2022 nga murahu ha musi tsho swika he tsha engedzwa nga ḽa 18 Fulwi.

src_text: Kukhishwa ngembi kwesikhatsi kwekhalenda yekushicilela lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yemnyakatimali we-2022/.
tgt_text: Uhu engedzwa ha tshifhinga ho vha hone nga murahu ha musi ho ranga dzhielwa nṱha ṱhoḓea ya bvela phanḓa na engedza maga tshiimo tsha shishi ane vha hone zwazwino ane khou dzhiiwa nga zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso itela fhelisa na tandulula masiandaitwa mutsho wo kalulaho kha mavunḓu kwameaho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi isivumile lesiphakamiso sekutsi kukhishwe ngembi kwesikhatsi ikhalenda yekushicilela lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yemnyakatimali we-2022/.
Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kukhishwe lolubalobalo lwemacala ekota.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo tenda zwauri nyimele ine ya vha hone zwazwino i tsha ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na maga songo ḓowelelaho sa izwi zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso, sekhithara dza phuraivethe na vhadzulapo zwi tshi ḓo bvela phanḓa na ita uri hu vhe na ṱhaḓulo ine ya khou bvela phanḓa, mbuedzedzo na phaṱhululo    ilayotibe.

src_text: Loku kwentelwe kutsi kuguculwe kukhishwa kwelubalobalo lwemacala emnyaka aphambilini kulelive.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa 2020 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri sedzuluswe hafhu.

src_text: Kuhlongotwa kutsi kukhishwa ngembi kwesikhatsi kwalekhalenda yelubalobalo lwemacala ekota yekucala kwenteke ngenyanga yeNgci 2022 bese lwemacala ekota yesibili lube ngenyanga yaLweti.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza uyu Mulayotibe nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na tshitshavha khwinifhadzwa uhu hune ha khou dzinginywa hu ḓo ita uri hu kone swikelwa zwa vhuṋe ha mavu ho tsireledzeaho ya nga mulayo kha Khethekanyo 25(6) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yesitsatfu neyesine lutawukhishwa ngekwehlukana ngenyanga Yendlovana neyeNkwekhweti ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza kuvhanganywa ha mbalombalo ya nga murafho, mbeu, lushaka na vhudzulapo ha muthu onoyo ane vha na pfanelo dza zwa mavu fhano Afrika Tshipembe.
Hedzi mbetshelwa dzi ḓo ita uri hu vhe na mivhigo ya muvhalelano wa zwa mavu ine ya vha ya vhukuma khathihi na ṱhoḓisiso dza tshifhinga tshi ḓaho dzine dza elana na zwa shandukiswa ha vhuṋe ha mavu.

src_text: Kuphela kwesikhatsi Sesimo Senhlekelele Yavelonkhe (i-NSoD).

Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi siphele lesikhatsi Sesimo Senhlekelele Yavelonkhe (i-NSoD) lesamemetelwa ngenca yaletikhukhula letinemandla letenteka eNyakatfo Kapa naKwaZulu-Natali..   Le-NSoD saphela mhla ti-18 Ingci 2022 emva kwekutsi kumenyetelwe mhla ti-18 Kholwane 2022 kutsi sikhatsi saso seluliwe.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Zhendedzi ḽa Themamveledziso ya Zwiko zwa Maḓi ḽa Lushaka (NWRIA) wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Lokwelulwa kwalesikhatsi kwentiwe ngenca yekubona kutsi kunesidzingo sekutsi kuchubeke kungetwe letindlela tesikhashana letitsetfwe tinhlaka tahulumende kute tingenelele futsi tibukane nalomtselela walesimo selitulu lesibi kakhulu kuletifundza letatsintseka.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa NWRIA wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha lwa tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha fuṱahe (90).

Mulayotibe uyu khou dzinginya uri hu vhumbiwe NWRIA ine ya ḓo vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha vhupuḽani, zwa masheleni khathihi na mveledziso ya themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ya shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ine ya vha hone zwazwino.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi lesimo lesikhona nyalo asisadzingi kutsi tindlela letingakatayeleki tichubeke njengoba tiphakelwa tinhlaka tahulumende, umkhakha lotimele kanye natinhlangano temmango kucinisekisa kutsi tiyachubeka kunika lusito, kululama nekwakha kabusha   Imitsetfosivivinywa.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo vhona uri hu khou vha na nḓisedzo ya maḓi ine ya nga bvela phanḓa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu, yo linganaho nahone ine ya fulufhedzea zwi tshi elana na ṱhoḓea ya ndayotewa ya kona swikela wana maḓi khathihi na vhupo ho tsireledzeaho nahone vhu re na mutakalo.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivnywa Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemnyaka we-2022 Wekubhaliswa Kwebunikati Bemhlaba.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo vhumbiwa sa Tshiimiswa tsha Muvhuso nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu ya 2 ya Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya zwa Masheleni Muvhuso, wa 1999 (Mulayo 1 wa 1999).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile lokwetfula    ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemnyaka we-2022 Wekubhaliswa Kwebunikati Bemhlaba kute ichubeke iwucubungule.
tgt_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo dzhia mishumo ine zwazwino ya itwa nga vha Maanḓalanga  Thaneḽe ya Trans-Caledon..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma ngenyanga yeNhlaba 2020 kutsi Lomtsetfosivivinywa uyotfola luvo lwemimango..   Lokuchibiyela lokuhlongotwako kutawenta kutsi kuphumelele lokubhalisa kwebunikati bemhlaba lobutfolakala ngalokusemtsetfweni kuSigaba 25(6) Semtsetfosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika wemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa Phaḽamenndeni ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa ubonelela kutsi kube nekugcogca lubalobalo ngekuya kwebuhlanga, kwebulili, kwebuve nangebusakhamuti balobo bunikati bemhlaba eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khwinisa Mulayo wa Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni, wa 2007 (Mulayo 12 wa 2007)..   Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo langa maanḓa mimasipala musi tshi ta mithelo ya mveledziso musi zwi tshi ḓa kha khumbelo dza mveledziso ya mavu dze dza rumelwa kha mimasipala.

src_text: Lesibonelelo sitawenta kutsi kwandze kuba nemibiko lenembako yeluhlolomabhuku kanye nelucwaningo lwesikhatsi lesitako lolumayelana netingucuko tebunikati bemhlaba.
tgt_text: Hedzi khwiniso dzi ḓo ita uri mimasipala thome badelisa mithelo iyi nga nḓila pfalaho re khagala nahone yo fhelelaho.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mulayotibe uyu nga ṅwaha wa 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani na tshitshavha..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa We-Ejensi Yavelonkhe Yesakhiwonchanti Setinsita Tetemanti (i-NWRIA) Yemnyaka We-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni, wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kushicilelwe Umtsetfosivivinywa we-NWRIA Wemnyaka we-2022 kute utfole luvo lwemmango sikhatsi lesitinsuku letimashumi layimfica (90).
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu dzinginya uri hu vhe na khwiniso ya Milayo ya sumbe, ine ya vha (1) Mulayo wa Tshikwama tsha Phentsheni ya Zwiimiswa zwi Elanaho, wa 1963 (Mulayo 41 wa 1963); (2) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1976 (Mulayo 84 wa 1976); (3) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso wa 1996; (4) Mulayo wa Khomishini ya zwa Masheleni na Gwama, wa 1997 (Mulayo 99 wa 1997); (5) Mulayo wa Bannga ya Mveledziso ya Mavu na Vhulimi, wa 2002 (Mulayo 15 wa 2002); (6) Mulayo wa Mishumo ya zwa Muvhalelano, wa 2005 (Mulayo 26 wa 2005) na (7) Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Mishumo ya Muvhalelano wa 2021 (Mulayo 5 wa 2021).

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uhlongota kutsi kusungulwe i-NWRIA kute isebente kuhlela, kunika imali, nekutfutfukisa sakhiwonchanti semanti kulelive.
tgt_text: Uhu khwiniswa hune ha khou dzinginywa hu katela, nga fhasi ha Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1996 katelwa ha muthu ane wa dzula nae lwa tshoṱhe kha mbuelo dza bva murahu nga ḽa 27 Lambamai.

src_text: Itawuphindze futsi isebente kunakekela lesakhiwonchanti semanti lesikhona nyalo..   Le-ejensi utawucinisekisa kutsi kutawuphakelwa emanti ngendlela lesimeme, lelinganako naletsembekile ngekuhambisana netidzingo temtsetfosisekelo tekutfola emanti nekuba nesimondzawo lesihlantekile.
tgt_text: Khwiniso dza milayo ya phentsheni dzi ḓo ita uri vhafarisi vha kone swikela mbuelo dzavho dza phentsheni na zwenezwo nga murahu ha musi mbingano yo no fhaladzwa ḓadzisa kha zwa bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha Minisṱa wa Gwama na kha zwa muvhalelano, khwiniso idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza shandukisa maanḓa komiti ya khombetshedzo afho hune muṱolambalelano ṱanganedza uri ita vhukhakhi.

src_text: Le-ejensi itawakhiwa ibe Sikhungo Sahulumende lesingaphasi kweShejuli ye-2 Yemtsetfo Wekulawulwa Kwetimali Tahulumende, 1999 (Umtsetfo 1 we-1999).
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wo phaḓaladzwa hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi.

src_text: Le-ejensi itawutsatsa lemisebenti lenyalo yentiwa yi-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..   Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Emandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo Wemnyaka We-.
Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Emandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo Wemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo, Wemnyaka we-2007 (Umtsetfo 12 we-2007).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri dzudzanyiwe hafhu.

Mulayotibe uyu ndi Mulayotibe une wa vha na zwipiḓa zwinzhi une wa khou khwinisa Milayo ya zwino ine ya vha  Mulayo wa Senthara ya Vhusevhi ha zwa Masheleni, wa 2001 (Mulayo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Mulayo wa Madzangano sa Shumeli Malamba, wa 1997 (Mulayo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Ndaka ya Vhufarandaka, wa 1988 (Mulayo 57 wa 1988); (iv) Mulayo wa Dzikhamphani, wa 2008 (Mulayo 71 wa 2008) na  Mulayo wa Milayo ya Sekhithara ya zwa Masheleni, wa 2017 ( Mulayo 9  2017).

src_text: tichibiyelo tilawula emandla abomasipala ekutsi bakhokhise tindleko tekutfutfukisa indzawo etintfweni letimayela neticelo tekutfutfukisa umhlaba letitfunyelwe kubo labomasipala.
tgt_text: hwiniso idzi ndi dzine dza khou fhindula kha vhuṱudzeṱudze he ha bviselwa khagala nga tshifhinga tsha tsenguluso ya shango musi ḽi tshi vhambedzwa na maṅwe ye ya itwa nga vha Tshigwada tsha Shuma tsha Mishumo ya zwa Masheleni (FATF).

src_text: Letichibiyelo titawucinisekisa kutsi bomasipala basebentisa letindleko kahle nangendlela lecotfo, levulekele wonkhe wonkhe nalesebenta kahle.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa tsenguluso iyi ya vhoṱhe wo ita themendelo dza 40 dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi shume nga nḓila ine ḽa khou tevhedza maga ḽifhasi u fhelisa zwiito zwa dzumbetshedzwa ha masheleni khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa masheleni kha zwiito zwa vhutherorisi..   Afrika Tshipembe ḽo wanala ḽi tshe ḽo salela murahu kha masia   Hoyu Mulayotibe amba nga ha masia 14 kha ayo a bviselwa khagala.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma kutsi Lomtsetfosivivinywa uyotfola luvo lwemmango ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa FATF bva nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Tintfo Letimayelana Netetimali Wemnyaka we-2022 .
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine zwa si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivnywa Wekuchibiyela Tintfo Letimayelana Netetimali, Wemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine ya si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni hu tshi itelwa uri kone dzudzanywa hafhu.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uhlongota kutsi kuchitjiyelwe Imitsetfo lesikhombisa, lebitwa ngekutsi (1) Umtsetfo Wetikhungo Tetinhlangano Tetimali Temphesheni, 1963 (Umtsetfo 41 we-1963; (2) Umtsetfo Wesikhwama  Setimphesheni Tetemasotja, 1976 (Umtsetfo 84 we-1976); (3) Umtsetfo Wetimphesheni Tebasebenti Bahulumende Wemnyaka we-1996; (4) Umtsetfo Wekhomishini Yetemalingena Netetimali, 1997 (Umtsetfo 99 we-1997); (5) Umtsetfo Wekutfutfukisa Libhange Letemhlaba Netekulima, 2002 (Umtsetfo 15 we-2002); (6)   Umtsetfo Wetemisebenti Yekucwaninga Emabhuku 2005 (Umtsetfo 26 we-2005) kanye (7) Nemtsetfo Wekuchibiyela Umsebenti Wetekucwaninga Emabhuku 2021 (Umtsetfo 5 we-2021)..   Letichibiyelo letihlongotwako ngaphasi Kwemtsetfo Wetimphesheni Temasotja wemnyaka we-1996 tifaka kutsi kufakwe balingani babo nabo bazuze kusukela mhla ti-27 Mabasa.
tgt_text: Mulayo uyu wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi zwi siho Mulayoni, wa 1992 (Mulayo 140 wa 1992) ita uri magwa na phaḓaladzwa ha zwithu zwiṅwe na zwiṅwe zwe zwa bulwa nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu 1 na Sheduḽu 2 ya uno Mulayo zwi vhe vhugevhenga..   Khwiniso idzo dzi lavhelesa na kha sa tea ha Khethekanyo 63, ye ya wanala sa tshimbilelani na ndayotewa kha ḽa uri Minisṱa ṋewe pfanelo dza khwinisa sheduḽu hu songo vha na kwama maitele zwa mulayo.

src_text: Lokuchitjiyelwa kwemitsetfo yetimphesheni kutawenta kutsi balingani babo batfole timali temphesheni leso sikhatsi uma kuhlukanwa umshado uphela..   Kungeta ekucaciseni umsebenti Wendvuna Yetetimali nasekucwaningeni emabhuku, letichibiyelo tiphindze futsi ticondzise emandla ekomiti yekuphocelela kutsi kulandzelwe umtsetfo lapho khona umcwaningi mabhuku avumile kutsi kunelicala.
tgt_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2020, Khothe ya Ndayotewa yo ḓivhadza uri Khethekanyo 63 ya Mulayo wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi wa 1992 u khou tshimbilelana na ndayotewa ya fhedza nga imisa zwa sa tea hawo swika nga ḽa 17 Nyendavhusiku 2022 itela ṋetshela Phaḽamennde tshikhala tsha khakhulula vhuṱudzeṱudze uho    Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa washicilelwa ngenyanga yeNdlovana 2022 kute ukhone kutfola luvo lwemmango..   Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Imitsetfo Jikelele Wemnyaka we-2022 (Kulwa Nekushushumbisa Imali Nekucedza Kusekela Buphekula Ngetimali).
tgt_text: Mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Imitsetfo Jikelele Wemnyaka we-2022 (Kulwa Nekushushumbisa Imali Nekucedza Kusekela Buphekula Ngetimali) kute ichubeke iwucubungule.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fara mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 ngei Ḓoroboni ya Kapa vhukati ha ḽa 9 na ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa ulibhuku lelinemitsetfosivivinywa leminengi lechibiyela Imitsetfo lekhona lebitwa ngekutsi  Umtsetfo Wesikhungo Sebunhloli Betetimali, 2001 (Umtsetfo 38 we-2001); (ii) Umtsetfo Wetinhlangano Letingenti Inzuzo, 1997 (Umtsetfo 71 we-1997); (iii) Umtsetfo Wekulawula Imphahla LekuTrasti, 1998 (Umtsetfo 57 we-1988); (iv) Umtsetfo Wetinkapani, 2008 (Umtsetfo 71 we-2008)  Nemtsetfo Wekulawula Umkhakha Wetetimali, 2017 (Umtsetfo 9 we-2017)..   Letichibiyelo tiphendvula kuletici letibonakele ngesikhatsi salelive sekubukisisa bontsanga lokwentiwe litsimba le-Financial Action Task Force (i-FATF).
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu ha misumbedzo vhu khou ḓo farelwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tou thoma nahone hu ḓo vha na thimu dza vhanna dza 24 na dza vhafumakadzi dza 16 bva ḽifhasini nga angaredza dzine dza ḓo vha dzi tshi khou ṱaṱisana kha vhuṱambo uvhu   Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela mulaedza wayo wa fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: ●  Thimu ya bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi, Banyana, nge vha ita ḓivhazwakale khathihi na fhenya kha muṱaṱisano wa tou thoma wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Tshiphuga tsha Afrika tsha Vhafumakadzi (WAFCON), kha mutambo wa bola ya milenzhe kha makhaulatshele WAFCON ya 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Rabat, kha ḽa Morocco nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 23 Fulwi.

src_text: Umbiko weluhlolo lohambisanako wente tincomo leti-40 letitawusita kwenta iNingizimu Afrika ihambisane netindlela temave emhlaba tekucedza kushushunjiswa kwetimali nekusekela buphekula ngetimali.
tgt_text: Nga tshenetsho tshifhinga tshithihi, vho dovha hafhu vha kona swikela dzhenela mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Ḽifhasi tsha ṅwaha ḓaho tsha bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi tsha FIFA ine ya ḓo farwa khathihi nga shango ḽa Australia na ḽa New Zealand bva nga ḽa 20 Fulwi swika 20 Ṱhangule.

●  Vha Thimu ya Afrika Tshipembe, nge vha thuba mendele ya 27 kha mitambo yo fhambanaho musi vha tshi khou shela mulenzhe kha Mitambo ya Commonwealth ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Birmingham, England bva nga ḽa 28 Fulwana swika ḽa 8 Ṱhangule.

src_text: Iningizimu Afrika itfolakale isalele emuva etindzaweni leti-.
tgt_text: Vho fhedza vho wana vhuimo ha vhuṱahe nga angaredza, vhe na mendele ya musuku ya sumbe, ya ṱahe ya siḽivhere na ya fumithihi ya burontsi.●  Thimu ya Vhafumakadzi ya Springbok, nge vha kunda thimu ya Spain kha mutambo wavho wa thoma kha wa ndingo mbili dza Women’s Winter Series fhaḽa Emirates Airline Park kha ḽa Johannesburg.●  Mufumakadzi Vho Ndavi Nokeri (23), nge vha ambadzwa khare ya vha Ralunako wa Afrika Tshipembe muswa wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa ulungisa tindzawo leticishe tibe-14 letibonakele.
tgt_text: ●  Mufumakadzi Vho Ashleigh Buhai, nge vha fhenya 2022 AIG Women’s Open khathihi na vha mufumakadzi wa vhuraru wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe kha fhenya kha mutambo muhulwane wa vhugweṋa ha musuku.

src_text: Iningizimu Afrika beyiloku ililunga le-FATF kusukela ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: NdilisoKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza: ●   Vho Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), ramuzika, muimbi na muṅwali wa nyimbo dza muzika vhe vha takuwa vha ḓivhea vhukuma musi vha tshi vhumba tshigwada tsha zwa muzika na khonani dzavho mbili nga ṅwaha wa 1996 tshe tsha vha tshi tshi ḓivhea sa TKZee tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwiwa madzina ho teaho.
Mufumakadzi Vho Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo sa Muthusa Mulangi (DDG): Ṱhoḓisiso dza Mbekanyamaitele na Milayo kha Muhasho wa Mishumo ya Muvhuso na Themamveledziso (DPWI).

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa Wetetidzakwamiva Nekushushunjiswa Kwato Wemnyaka we-.
Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wetetidzakwamiva Nekushushunjiswa Kwato wemnyaka we-2022 kute ichubeke iwucubungule.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Bongani Elias Sithole sa DDG: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiwo ya Lushaka kha Muhasho wa Tshumisano ya Mavhusele..   Vho Adam Mthombeni sa DDG: Vhushaka ha Vhukati ha Mihasho kha Muhasho wa DPWI.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa Wetetidzakwamiva Nekushushunjiswa Kwato, 1992 (Umtsetfo 140 we-1992) wenta kube licala kukhicita nekusabalalisa yonkhe intfo lengena ngaphasi kwaleshejuli ye-1 nakuShejuli ye-2 yaloMtsetfo.

tgt_text: Khabinethe yo tendelana na tholwa hu tevhelaho:.

src_text: Letichibiyelo tibukana nalokungasebenti kweSigaba 63, lesatfolakala kutsi asihambisani nemtsetfosisekelo mayelana nalokutsi Indvuna kube ngiyo lenikwa emalungelo ekuchibiyela emashejuli ngaphandle kwekulandzela inchubo yetemtsetfo..   Ngemnyaka we-2020, Inkantolo Yemtsetfosisekelo yamemetela kutsi Sigaba 63 Semtsetfo Wetetidzakwamiva Nekushushunjiswa Kwato Wemnyaka we-1992 awuhambisani nemtsetfosisekelo futsi kwamiswa kusebenta kwawo kute kube ngumhla ti-17 Ingongoni 2022 kute iPhalamende ilungise lenkinga   Umcimbi lotako.
tgt_text: Dokotela Vho Zwanani Titus Mathe sa Muofisiri Mutshimbidzi Muhulwane wa Tshiimiswa tsha Lushaka tsha Mveledziso ya Fulufulu tsha Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Indzebe Yemhlaba Ye-Rugby Sevens Yemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Miraḓo ya tshifhinganyana ya Vhulangi ha zwa Fulufulu ha Lushaka ha Afrika Tshipembe     Vho Thembani Bukula (Mudzulatshidulo)     Mufumakadzi Vho Zandile Mpungose (Muthusamudzulatshidulo)     Mufumakadzi Vho Precious Sibiya     Mufumakadzi Vho Thembeka Semane; nae.

src_text: Iningizimu Afrika itawubamba lomcimbi wendzebe Yemhlaba ye-Rugby Sevens Yemnyaka we-2022 eKapa emkhatsini kwamhla ti-9 kuya kumhla ti-11 ngenyanga yeNyoni.
tgt_text: Vho Fungai Sibanda (vhane vha khou tou  tholwa hafhu lwa vhuvhili).

src_text: Lomcimbi lombukiso utawubanjwa kwekucala ngca kulelivekati le-Afrika kantsi kutawuba nemacembu lama-24 emadvodza nala-16 alabasikati latawucudzelana lavela kuwo wonkhe umhlaba   Imilayeto.
tgt_text: Mudzulatshidulo na muraḓo wa Bodo ya Khoro ya Thekhinoḽodzhi ya Minerala     Dokotela Vho Thibedi Ramontja (Mudzulatshidulo); nab.

src_text: Kuhalalisa Ikhabhinethi indlulisa kuhalalisela netilokotfo letihle ku: ●    I-Banyana, ngekenta umlandvo nekuncoba kwekucala indzebe Yemave Ase-Afrika Yabomake (i-WAFCON), kumancamu  e-WAFCON yemnyaka we-2022 lobewubanjelwe eRabat, eMorocco ngeMgcibelo mhla ti-23 kuKholwane.
tgt_text: Phrof Vho Lwazi Ngubevana..     Mufumakadzi Vho Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe sa Mulangi Muhulwane wa Dzingu wa Zhendedzi ḽa Nḓisedzo ya Thikhedzo ya zwa Matshilisano ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ngei kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Temnotfo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsela fhasi zwiṱuku ha phimo ya vhushayamushumo ha shango, yo tsaho nga.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kwehla kancane kwelizinga lekuswelakala kwemsebenti kwalelive, lokwehle nge-.
tgt_text: 6% bva kha.

src_text: 6%, kusukela ku-.
tgt_text: 5% kha kotara ya thoma ya kha.

src_text: 5% ngekota yekucala kwaba ngu-.
tgt_text: 9% kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: 9% ngekota yesibili ya-.
tgt_text: Tshivhalo tsho ganḓiswaho kha Tsedzuluso ya zwa Vhashumi ya Kotara iṅwe na iṅwe bva kha vha Mbalombalo ya Afrika Tshipembe sumbedza uri mishumo minzhisa yo rekhodiwa kha Tshumelo dza Matshilisano na Tshitshavha (276 000), Mbambadzo (169 000), Masheleni (128 000) na zwa fhaṱa (104 000).

src_text: Letinombolo tishicilelwe kuLuklayo Ngelinani Lalabasebentako Nalabangasebenti Ngekota lolwentiwe Lubalobalo lwaseNingizimu Afrika lukhomba kutsi imisebenti leminyenti ivele kuMisebenti Yemmango Netenhlalakahle (276 000), Tekuhweba (169 000), Tetimali (128 000) kanye nakuTekwakha (104 000)..     Linani lonkhe selilonkhe lebantfu labacashiwe libe tigidzi leti-.
tgt_text: Tshivhaloguṱe tsha vhathu vha shumaho tsho ima kha 15, 6 miḽioni kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022, ngeno tsha vhathu vha sa shumiho tsho gonya nga 132 000 swika kha 8, 0 miḽioni kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 musi zwi tshi vhambedzwa na kotara yo fhiraho dzika uhu naho hu na mbuelo dzi takadzaho hu sumbedza uri vhuḓidini ho khwaṱhaho nga muvhuso na sekhithara dzoṱhe dzi shumisanaho na muvhuso alusa ikonomi na sika mishumo minzhisa ine ya khou ṱoḓea vhukuma vhu khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo.

src_text: 6 kukota yesibili yanga-2022, kantsi linani lebantfu labangasebenti lenyuka nge-132 000 laya kutigidzi le-.
tgt_text: Hezwi ndi ṱhanzielo ya uri arali ri tshi shumisana roṱhe nga khwaṱhisa nungo dzashu dzoṱhe, ri nga kunda khaedu dzo livhanaho na ikonomi yashu.

src_text: 0 ngekota yesibili yanga-2022 nakucatsaniswa nekota yaphambilini.
tgt_text: Khabinethe pfesesa dinalea ha Maafrika Tshipembe musi vha tshi khou kundelwa wana zwa ḓitshidza ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe nga vhanga ḽa ḓura ha zwithu na phimo ya vhushayamushumo re nṱha vhukuma.

src_text: Letinzuzo lesingeke sitikhukhumete ngato kodvwa letijabulisako tikhombisa kutsi imitamo leyentiwe nguhulumende nekuhlanganyela kanye nebalingani betenhlalakahle ekukhuliseni umnotfo  kanye nekudala imisebenti ledzingeka kakhulu seyicala kutsela titselo nyalo..     Lesi sitatimende lesikhombisa liciniso lelitsi nangabe sonkhe singasebenta ngekuhlanganyela ngekwemandla etfu, singatincoba letinsayeya letibukene nemnotfo wetfu.
tgt_text: Sa muvhuso ṱhogomelaho, ri dzula ro ḓiimisela na ḓikumedzela kha shumisana na sekhithara dzoṱhe dzi shumisanaho na muvhuso itela fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine ha muthu muṅwe na muṅwe.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iyakucondza kukhungatseka kwebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba bashikashikeka ngekuphila kwabo kwemalanga onkhe ngenca yetindleko tekuphila kanye nelizinga lelisetulu lekuswelakala kwemisebenti.
tgt_text: Muvhuso dzula wo ḓikumedzela tikedza mabindu apo nga renga na shumisa thundu na tshumelo dzapo.

src_text: Njengahulumende lonakekelako, sihlala sitimisele futsi sitibophelele ekusebenteni ngekubambisana nebalingani betfu betenhlalakahle kuze kutsi sakhe likusasa lelincono lawo wonkhe umuntfu.
tgt_text: Themamveledziso ya Muvhuso.

src_text: Uhulumende usatibophelele ekwesekeni emabhizinisi endzawo ngekutsenga timphahla netinsita tendzawo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo sasaladza tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso nga vhadzuli vha Togaat ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha migwalabo ya khaedu ya ṱhahelelo ya  maḓi.

src_text: Takhiwonchanti Semphakatsi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe ita khuwelelo ya vhudziki na vhukonḓeleli sa zwi mushumo kati wa vhuedzedza Tongaat Water Treatment Works..  Khabinethe khou pfesesa dinalela ha vhadzuli vhe vha ḓo tea shumisa mathannge maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu bva tshe ha vha na tshiwo tsha miḓalo mathomo uno ṅwaha.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikugcekile kulinyatwa kwesakhiwonchanti lokwentiwa takhamiti taseThongathi KwaZulu-Natal ngalesikhatsi kunembhikisho wekutfola emanti.
tgt_text: Honeha, dzikhakhathi na zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwi fhelisi thaidzo, nahone tshinyadza themamveledzido ya lushaka zwi kwamesa zwitshavha zwa tsinisa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi icele kutsi kube nekwehlisa umoya nekubeketela njengoba kuchubeka umsebenti wekubuyisela iMisebenzi Yekuhlanta Emanti eThongathi..     IKhabhinethi iyakucondza kukhungatseka kwetakhamiti lokuze kwadzingeka kutsi tisebentise emathangi emanti sikhatsi lesidze kusukela kwaba netikhukhula ekucaleni kwalomnyaka.
tgt_text: Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo wa.

src_text: Kodvwa-ke, ludlame nekutitsetsela umtsetfo akusiso sisombululo, futsi kulinyatwa kwesakhiwonchanti semphakatsi kulimata kuphela imiphakatsi yaleyondzawo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe ṱanganedza sainwa vha mulayo ha Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa 2022 (Mulayo 3 wa 2022) nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: UMtsetfo Lochibiyelwe Wetinhlelo Tabomasipala Bahulumende Wasekhaya wa-.
tgt_text: Mulayo ṱoḓa khwinisa khaphasithi na phimo ya maitelendavhelelwa muvhuso wapo.

src_text: IKhabhinethi yemukele kusayinwa kweMtsetfo wekuChibiyela Tinhlelo taboMasipala beNdzawo wa-2022 (uMtsetfo Nombolo 3 wa-2022) nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Mulayo vhumba tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dza muvhuso ita uri Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha shume nga vhukoni na khwaṱhisedza ṋetshedzo dzo khwaṱhaho dza tshumelo kha vhathu, sa pfanelo ya mutheo yo ṅwalwaho kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya..  Mulayo ṱalusa maitele ane tea tevhelwa musi hu tshi tholwa vhathu kha poswo khulwane.

src_text: Lomtsetfo uhlose kwenta ncono emandla kanye nemazinga ekutiphatsa lokwamukelekako kwabohulumende basekhaya.
tgt_text: Zwa zwino thivhela vhaofisiri vha tshitshavha vhahulwane uri vha vhe na vhuimo kha zwa poḽotiki kha mahoro zwa poḽotiki.

src_text: Lomtsetfo uyincenye yemitamo yahulumende yekwenta uMkhakha Wetemisebenti Yahulumende ube nebuchwepheshe kanye nekucinisekisa kuphakelwa kwetinsita kubantfu, njengelilungelo lelisisekelo lelicuketfwe nguMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wa-..     LoMtsetfo ucacisa tinchubo lekufanele tilandzelwe uma kucashwa etikhundleni letisetulu.
tgt_text: Nga Mulayo uyu hafhu, poswo dza mulanguli wa masipala dzi lavhelelwa kungedzelwa kha lushaka lwoṱhe itela kunga vhunzhi ha vhonkhetheni vho teaho..  Khabinethe na fulufhelo uri tshanduko idzi dzi ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri avho vhane vha tholwa kana khethwa kha maimo aneo vha ḓo kona bveledza zwe vha fulufhedzisa itela uri ri swikelele ṋetshedzo ya vhutshilo ha khwine kha vhathu vhoṱhe.

src_text: Manje uvimbela tikhulu tahulumende letisetulu kutsi tibe netikhundla tembangave emacenjini etembangave.
tgt_text: Vhugevhenga.

src_text: Futsi njengoba sewukhona loMtsetfo, tikhala tebumenenja tabomasipala letingakagcwaliswa kulindzeleke kutsi tikhangiswe kuvelonkhe kuze kuhehe incumbi yebantfu labafanelekile.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khoḓa vhashumi vha thelisaho zwiṱunḓwa vha Tshumelo ya Muthelo ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha wana  785 kg ya zwidzidzivhadzi zwa crystal meth zwi linganaho R236 miḽioni ya thengiso siho mulayoni ngei OR Tambo International Airport nga Swondaha ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule ṅwaha wa dzumbululwa ha zwidzidzivhadzi izwi zwo ḓo rumela mulaedza wa khaidzo kha zwigwada zwa vhugevhenga ho dzudzanywaho wa uri vhuimangalavha ha dzhena na bva ho tsireledzwa vhukuma nahone vhaofisiri vhashu vha khou shuma nga maanḓa fhelisa zwiito zwa vhugevhenga vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: IKhabhinethi inelitsemba lekutsi letingucuko titocinisekisa kutsi labo labacashiwe kumbe labakhetselwe kuletikhundla batokwati kufeza titsembiso tabo kuze kufinyeleleke emphilweni lencono yawo wonkhe umuntfu.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa Khoro nga ha Ṱhoḓisiso ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha (CHE)  kha Miholo ya Ṱhoho dza zwa Pfunzo na Ndaulo Dziyunivesithi (Vice Chancellors) na Vhalanguli vha Vhahulwane Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Bugebengu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo nyeṱulelwa nga ha mvelelo dza ṱhoḓisiso ya CHE ye ya tiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2020 nga Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli, Dokotela Vho Blade Nzimande ṱola ḽeveḽe dza muholo na maitele fanaho zwa khorondangi dza yunivesithi kha miṅwaha fhiraho 15 bva nga ṅwaha wa 2005 swika wa..  Ṱhoḓisiso yo vha ya wana nḓila yo khwaṱhaho konadzeaho na mveledziso ya dziyunivesithi kana sekhithara ya pfunzo ya nṱha kha shango.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ituse tikhulu teLuphiko Lolugcogca Umtselo eNingizimu Afrika ngekushaca emakhilogremu lange-785 e-crystal meth lenelinani lasemgwacweni letigidzi leti-R236 esikhumulweni i-OR Tambo International Airport ngeliSontfo, mhla tinge-28 iNgci.
tgt_text: Muvhigo uyu sumbedzisa mawanwa mahulwane khathihi na themendelo  dza ndulamiso dzo dzinginywaho.

src_text: Lokubanjwa kwetidzakamiva kutotfumela umlayeto locacile kutigilamkhuba tebugebengu kutsi tikhungo tetfu tekungena nekuphuma tivikelwe kahle futsi tikhulu tetfu tisebenta kamatima kucedza noma ngubuphi bugebengu     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Themendelo dzi ṋetshedza, vhukati ha dziṅwe, maitele miholo khwaṱhaho nahone ane vha khagala thomiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha vhulavhelesi tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe tsha nga nnḓa ingamela maitele u dzhia tsheo dza miholo dovha ya ṋetshedza khwaṱhiswa ha sisiṱeme dza ela kushumele kha zwiimiswa.

src_text: Umbiko weMkhandlu WeTemfundvo Lephakeme (i-CHE) Uphenya Ngekukhokhelwa Kwemasekela aboShansela Bemanyuvesi kanye Nebaphatsi Labasetulu eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Ngudo yo dovha ya dzhiela nṱha vhuhulu ho fhambanaho ya zwiimiswa izwi na dovha ita ndinganyiso na maitele dzitshaka.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ibikelwe ngemiphumela yeluphenyo lwe-CHE lolwagunyatwa nga-2020 nguNgcongcoshe Wetemfundo Lephakeme, Isayensi Nekusungula, Dkt.
tgt_text: Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli vha khou lavhelelwa haseledza nga ha muvhigo uyu na vhurangaphanḓa ha yunivesithi sa ḽiga ḽa khwaṱhisa zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo izwi.

src_text: Blade Nzimande, kuhlola emazinga emaholo kanye netinkhambiso tebaphatsi bemanyuvesi esikhatsini lesiminyaka lengu-15 kusukela nga-2005 kuze kube ngu-..     Loluphenyo belilekukutfola kusimama, kusebenta kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwemanyuvesi noma umkhakha wetemfundvo lephakeme eveni.
tgt_text: Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa nga murahu kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha na Vhutumbuli: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: Lombiko uveta lokutfolakele lokubalulekile kanye netincomo tekulungisa letihlongotwako..     Letincomo tiphakamisa, phakatsi kwalokunye, inchubo yemaholo lecinisiwe nalesebaleni.
tgt_text: Tshanduko Ṱavhanyedzaho ya Khaphasithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso na Pfunzo  kha Sekhithara ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha.

src_text: Kusungulwa kwemtimba wekubukisisa lotimele lotokwengamela inchubo yekutsatsa tincumo ngemaholo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe tikedza themendelo ya risetshe mbili dzo itwaho eletshedza nga ha maga ane fanela dzhiwa itela ṱavhanyisa tshanduko ya risetshe na khaphasithi ya funza kha zwiimiswa zwa ngudo dza nṱha.

src_text: Iphindze iphakamise kuciniswa kwetinhlelo tekuhlola kusebenta etikhungweni.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa thoma wo itwa nga Tshigwada tsha Mushumo tsha Dziminisṱa ṱoḓisisa zwithivheli zwi thivhelaho mushumo wa thola fara vhashumi na mvelaphanḓa ya  vhorapfunzo vha vharema Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Lolu cwaningo luphindze lwabuka bukhulu lobuhlukahlukene baletikhungo lwaphinde lwenta nekulinganiswa ngekwemave ngemave.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa vhuvhili – wo itwa nga Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhutumbuli na Tshiimiswa tsha Ṱhoḓisiso tsha Lushaka – wo itwa nga Yunivesithi dza Afrika Tshipembe, vhuimeli ha tshiimiswa ho angaredzaho ha yunivesithi dza muvhuso dza 26 kha shango.

src_text: Indvuna Yetemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi Nekusungula  Lokusha ilindzeleke kutsi icocisane nebuholi benyuvesi ngalombiko njengesinyatselo sekucinisa letikhungo temfundvo lephakeme.
tgt_text: Mivhigo heyi yoṱhe dzinginya zwiṱirathedzhi zwa thusedzo ṱavhanyisa tshanduko kha masia maṱanu ṱanḓavhuwaho, ane vha kha postgraduate pineline; vhudzheneli nga vhashumi; mvelele ya tshiimiswa na maitele; mbekanyamushumo na tshiṱirathedzhi, na zwiko zwi si zwinzhi.

src_text: Ngemuva kwaloko umbiko utoshicilelwa kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko Letemfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Pfano ya Dzitshaka nga ha Zwiko zwa Dzhenetiki zwa Zwimela zwa Zwiḽiwa na Vhulimi (Pfano).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Pfano Phalamenndeni uri sainwe sa thendelano.

src_text: Ingucuko lephutfumako yeLucwaningo neLikhono Lekufundzisa eMkhakheni weTemfundvo Lephakeme.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe tshipiḓa tsha madzangano a Pfano, ine ya eletshedza mashango ane vha muraḓo ambedzana na vhona uri hu na tshumiso yo khwaṱhaho ya zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela zwa zwiḽiwa na vhulimi saina Pfano iyi zwi ḓo dovha zwa khwaṱhisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha shango kha ndondolo na kushumisele ko khwaṱhaho kwa zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela, na ṋetshedza thikhedzo kha zwitshavha zwa mahayani.

src_text: IKhabhinethi isekele tincomo tetifundvo letimbili letajutjwa ngekweluleka ngetinyatselo lekufanele tibe khona kuze kusheshiswe kuguculwa kwemandla ekucwaninga newekufundzisa etikhungweni temfundvo lephakeme.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe (Just Transition) ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Umbiko wekucala wentiwe liTsimba Langcongcoshe Lelijutjwe kutsi liphenye ngezitsiyo letivimbela kucashwa, kugcinwa kanye nekuchubekela phambili kwetifundziswa letimnyama taseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: Umbiko wesibili – lojutjwe Litiko leteSayensi nekuSungula kanye neSisekelo Selucwaningo Lwesive lolwentiwa yi-Universities South Africa, lokuyinhlangano lemele emanyuvesi emphakatsi lange-26 eveni.
tgt_text: Muhanga ṋetshedza bono ḽi fanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi linganaho na ḽi konḓelelaho kilima ṱalutshedza masia milayo na mbekanyamaitele zwa swikelela izwi.

src_text: Yomibili lemibiko iphakamisa tindlelasu tekungenelela kuze kusheshiswe ingucuko emikhakheni lebanti lesihlanu, lowasebaneticu; kutibandzakanya kwebasebenti; lisiko nekusebenta kwesikhungo; inchubomgomo nendlelasu, kanye netinsita letinganelanga.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa tshanduko ḓo kwama muthu muṅwe na muṅwe Afrika Tshipembe, na ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha tandulula vhushayandingano ha tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na sika ikonomi vhuedzaho vhoṱhe.

src_text: Sivumelwano Semave Ngemave Ngemitfombo yeLufutotitjalo Lwekudla Netekulima.
tgt_text: Khomishini ya Kilima ya Phresidennde yo tshimbidza maitele vhukwamani vhuhulwane na vhashumisani vha wana thikhedzo yo ṱanḓavhuwaho ya muhanga.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePhalamende.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri tsudzuluwo ya kha ikonomi sa shumisi khaboni nga ṅwaha wa 2050 fanela tikedza dzangalelo ḽa lushaka, hu tshi katela na mishumo ya khwine ya vhoṱhe,  khwiniso ya vhudzheneli ha tshitshavhani na pheliso ya vhushai.

src_text: Loku kutokwenta kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ibe yincenye yemacembu kuleSivumelwano, lesicondzisa emave langemalunga ekongeni nasekucinisekiseni kusetjentiswa lokusimeme kwemitfombo yelufuto lwetitjalo ekudleni nasekulimeni.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhashumisani na muvhuso tikedza na ṱanganedza muhanga uyu.

src_text: Kwemukela leSivumelwano kutophindze kucinise kutibophelela kwelive ekongeni nasekusetjentisweni ngendlela lesimeme kwemitfombo yelufuto lwetitjalo, futsi kunikete kwesekwa emiphakatsini yasemaphandleni.
tgt_text: Pulane yo dodombedzwaho ya thoma shumisa muhanga ḓo bveledzwa, nahone ḓo dzheniswa kha vhupulani ha muvhuso na maitele mugaganyagwama.

src_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lweluntjintjo Lolulungile lweNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Garaṱa dza Ḽaisentsi ya reila Ntswa dza Afrika Tshipembe.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓo thoma shumiswa ha Garaṱa ya Ḽaisentsi ya reila ntswa ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo zwa khwine fhira ine ya vha hone zwino.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise luHlaka Lwengucuko Lolufanele lokutsi lusetjentiswe.
tgt_text: Sisiṱeme ya zwino yo shumiswa bva kha ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Loluhlaka lwetfula umbono wekwabelana, weNingizimu Afrika, lekwati kumelana ngalokulinganako nesimo selitulu.
tgt_text: Thekhinoḽodzhi bva zwenezwo yo no shanduka nahone zwi vho ḓura ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya ḽaisentsi dzine ndi kale ri khou shumisa dzone kha tshifhinga tsha zwino.

src_text: Luchaza imigomo netindzawo tenchubomgomo kuze kuphunyelelwe kuloku.
tgt_text: Garaṱa ntswa yo dzinginywaho ḓo ita uri ḽaisentsi ya reila kone shuma na International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).

src_text: Luhlaka lwengucuko lutotsintsa wonkhe umuntfu eNingizimu Afrika, futsi luniketa litfuba lokubukana nekungalingani ngekwemlandvo futsi ludale umnotfo lozuzisa wonkhe umuntfu.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele ya Mbekanyamushumo dza Mishumo ya Tshitshavha dzo Engedzwaho (EPWP).

src_text: IKhomishana yaMengameli Yesimo Selitulu yente inchubo yekubonisana lebanti nebalingani betenhlalakahle futsi yatfola kwesekwa lokubanti kweluhlaka.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa kha  gazethe mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya EPWP itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutsi kuntjintjela emnotfweni wekhabhoni lekuziro lekhicitwako nga-2050 kufanele kusekele tifiso tentfutfuko yavelonkhe, lokufaka umsebenti lohloniphekile wabo bonkhe bantfu, kufakwa kwenhlalakahle nekucedvwa kwebuphuya.
tgt_text: EPWP ndi iṅwe ya mbekanyamushumo khulwane dza muvhuso yo livhiswaho kha ṋetshedza ṱhaḓulo ya muholo na kha vhushai nga sika zwikhala zwa mushumo wa tshifhinga nyana, nga maanḓa kha vhaswa na vhafumakadzi.

src_text: IKhabhinethi yenta lubito kubo bonkhe lababambisene kutenhlalo kutsi basekele futsi balwemukele loluhlaka.
tgt_text: Mvetomveto ya mbekanyamaitele ntswa khwaṱhisa mbekanyamushumo na ṋea ṱhaluso kha masia fanaho na zwa miholo, modele wa ndambedzo na tsireledzo ya matshilisano, na livhanyisa EPWP na maitele zwa mushumo ano maḓuvha ṱuṱuwedza vhushumisani vhukati ha muvhuso na sekhithara ya phuraivethe kha khwaṱhisedza uri  EPWP shela mulenzhe zwihulwane vhukuma kha tsiko ya mishumo yavhuḓi na fhungudza vhushai.

src_text: Kutotfutfukiswa luhlelo lolunemininingwane yekusetjentiswa kwaloluhlaka, futsi lutodidiyelwa neluhlelo lwahulumende lwekuhlela kanye nelwesabelomali.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi ḓo ṱuṱuwedza vhutumbuli kha mathomo mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya tshitshavha mona na shango.

src_text: Likhadi Lelisha Lelayisensi Yekushayela laseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Khwiniso kha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kuntjintjwa kweliKhadi Lelayisensi Yekushayela lamanje kufakwe lelinemidvwebo yetimphawu tekuphepha letengetiwe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muelo, dizaini na bveledzwa ha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya ṅwaha wa 2023 ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Luhlelo lolukhona kwamanje belusebenta kusukela nga-.
tgt_text: (Fourth Decimal Coin Series).

src_text: Bucwepheshe sebusombulukile futsi sekuya ngekubita kugcina sakhiwonchanti lesikhona njengamanje.
tgt_text: Yo ṱanganedza sisiṱeme ya sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumisa nyambo dza tshiofisi kha tshigwada tsha vhuṋa tsha khoini ya tshifumi.

src_text: Likhadi lelisha lelihlongotwako litokwenta kutsi ilayisensi yekushayela yalelive ihambisane nobucwepheshe be-International Information Technology Personal Identification Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).
tgt_text: Ipfi ‘Afrika Tshipembe’ ḽi ḓo dzheniswa kha lurumbu luthihi lwa dzikhoini khathihi na ganḓiswa nga nyambo dza tshiofisi dzoṱhe.

src_text: Inchubomgomo Yeluhlelo Lolunwetjiwe Lwetemisebenti Yahulumende (i-EPWP).
tgt_text: Nyambo tharu dzi ḓo shumiswa kha khoini ya R5; nyambo mbili kha dzikhoini dza R2; 50c, 20c na 10c, R1 ḓo vha nga luambo luthihi.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise kushicilelwa kweluhlaka lwenchubomgomo ye-EPWP kuze kuboniswane nemphakatsi.
tgt_text: Nyambo dzoṱhe hedzi dzi ḓo shumiswa nga sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha  kha miṅwaha ya 10 ḓaho.

src_text: I-EPWP ingulolunye lwetinhlelo tahulumende letibalulekile letihlose kuniketa lusito lokukhululeka kubuphuya nekungena kwemali ngekudala ematfuba emisebenti esikhashana, ikakhulukati kulusha nakulabasikati..     Luhlaka lwesikhashana lwenchubomgomo lensha lutocinisa loluhlelo futsi lunikete kucaciseleka ngetinhlangotsi letifana nemiholo, imodeli yekuchasa ngetimali nekuvikelwa kutenhlalo, futsi lucondzanise i-EPWP nekutayetisa kwesimanje kutemisebenti.
tgt_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamitele yo Ṱanganelaho ya Ndangulo ya Khwaḽithi ya Maḓi (IWQM)  ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Itogcugcuzela budlelwane emkhatsini wahulumende nemikhakha letimele ekucinisekiseni kutsi i-EPWP ifaka sandla kakhulu ekwakhiweni kwemisebenti lehloniphekile kanye nekucedza buphuya.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa kha gazethe ha Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya IWQM itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo itophindze ikhutsate kusungulwa kwekusetjentiswa kwetinhlelo temisebenti yemphakatsi eveni lonkhe..     Tichibelo Teluchungechunge Lesine Lwetinhlavumali lwaseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele yo dzinginywaho ḓo dzhena vhudzuloni ha Mbekanyamaitele ya WQM yo thomiwaho nga ṅwaha wa 1991 ine zwazwino yo fhelelwaho nga tshifhinga na tshiṱirathedzhi tshayo tshe tsha thoma shuma nga ṅwaha wa..  Mbekanyamaitele iyi sumbedzisa zwigwada zwa milayo zwine zwa ḓo vhumba mutheo wa ndangulo ya khwaḽithi ya maḓi ṋetshedza ndivhanyiso kha milayo yoṱhe elanaho na zwa maḓi khathihi na vhuḓikumedzeli ha ḽino shango kha khaedu ya ḽifhasi kha zwa ṋetshedzo na ndondolo ya maḓi sa tshiko tshi shaeaho.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate bungako, idizayini kanye nekugcogcwa kweLuchungechunge Lesine Lwetinhlavumali lwaseNingizimu Afrika lwemnyaka wa-.
tgt_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwentsi ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho.

src_text: Igunyate luhlelo lwekujikeleta lwaminyaka yonkhe lekusetjentiswa kwetilimi letisemtsetfweni eluchungachungeni Lwenhlavumali Yesine.
tgt_text: (Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy).

src_text: Ligama “iNingizimu Afrika” litofakwa eluhlangotsini lunye lwetinhlavumali bese libhalwa ngato tonkhe tilwimi letisemtsetfweni.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khanḓiso ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwensti ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho itela wana mahumbulwa nga tshitshavha.

src_text: Tilwimi letintsatfu titosetjentiswa kuluhlavu lwemali lwa-R5; Tilwimi letimbili R2; Tinhlavumali letingu-50c, 20c no-10c kanye na-R1 titoba ngelulwimi lunye.
tgt_text: Tshipekiṱiramu tsha firikhwentsi ya Radio ndi tshiko tsha mupo tshi sa vusuledzwi tshine tsha vha tsha vhuṱhogwa kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya didzhithala na themamveledziso ya zwa vhudavhidzani.

src_text: Tonkhe letilwimi titosetjentiswa ngekutjintjana njalo ngemnyaka eminyakeni leli-10 letako.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi yo dzinginywaho yo itelwa tikedza khovhelo ya sipekiṱiramu na ṋea ḽaisentsi ya ṱhingothendeleki dzi shumaho nga netiweke, khasho; ngudo ya saintsi ya zwa vhufhufhi na zwa maḓini; ṱhoḓisiso na mveledziso; tswikelelo ya tshitshavha, na dziṅwe nḓowetshumo dzi elanaho na zwenezwi.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Ledidiyelwe Yekulawula Lizinga Lemanti (i-IWQM) ya-.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza khovhelo linganaho na ndi nganyiso kha vhushelamulenzhe kha tshanduko ya sekhithara na tswikelelo ya ṱhumo ya didzhithala na kha zwipiḓa zwa nnḓa zwa shango.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise kufakwa kugazethi kweLuhlaka lwenchubomgomo ye-IWQM kuze kuboniswane nemphakatsi.
tgt_text: Fulo ḽa nanga Nkhetheni wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Khoro ya Dzitshaka ya Mbumbano ya Vhudavhidzani ha kule (ITU)  na Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio.

src_text: Inchubomgomo lehlongotwako itongena esikhundleni seNchubomgomo ya-1991 ye-WQM lephelelwe sikhatsi kanye nendlelasu yayo leyacalwa nga-..     Lenchubomgomo iveta isethi yemigomo letoba sisekelo sekulawulwa kwelizinga lemanti.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza nkhetheni nangiwaho wa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Mandla Samuel Mchunu kha Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio ya ITU (Region .

src_text: Iniketa ngekucondzisana nayo yonkhe imitsetfo lefanele lephatselene nemanti kanye nekutibophelela kwelive emhlabeni wonkhe ekuniketweni nekongiwa kwemanti njengemtfombo loyindlala.
tgt_text: Vho Mchunu zwa zwino vha khou shuma sa muraḓo wa bodo.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo yeSitukulwane Lesitako Sekusakata Ngeligagasi Lemoya.
tgt_text: Ho khou dzingingwa ḽa uri vha dovhe vha khethiwe kha Khoro ya ITU kha themu ya ṅwaha wa 2023 swika..  Khetho dzi ḓo vha hone nga tshifhinga tsha Khonferentsi ya Vhuimeli ha mashango (Plenipotentiary) ha ITU ine ya ḓo farelwa ngei Bucharest, kha shango ḽa Romania bva nga ḽa 26 Khubvumedzi swika nga ḽa 14 Tshimedzi.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kushicilelwa kweluhlaka lweNchubomgomo Yesitukulwane Lesilandzelako yeTekusakata Kwemsakato kuze kutsi umphakatsi uphawule ngawo.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzula ḽo ḓikumedzela kha zwipikwa na ndivho ya ITU ya vala mukano wa zwa didzhithala na ṱumanya vhathu vhoṱhe vha ḽifhasi  Vhuṱambo vhu khou ḓaho.

src_text: Kusakata Ngemagagasi Emoya kuyinsita yemvelo lenemkhawulo lebalulekile ekukhuleni kwemnotfo wedijithali waseNingizimu Afrika nesakhiwoncanti yetekuchumana.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa.

src_text: Inchubomgomo lehlongozwako ihlose kwesekela kwabiwa kwemagagasi emoya kanye nekuniketwa kwelayisensi yemaselula langantjintji; kusakata; tetindiza netetilwandle; lucwaningo nentfutfuko; kufinyelela kwemphakatsi, naletinye timboni letifanele.
