tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa nga Khubvumedzi uno ṅwaha ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero: “U pembelela Ifa ḽa Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika wa Mvelele wa Afrika Tshipembe”.

src_text: Inchubomgomo iphindze ifune kuchubekisa kulingana nekwabiwa lokulungile kuze kufakwe sandla ekuguculeni umkhakha kanye nekufinyelela kwekuchumana kwedijithali ngisho nasetindzaweni letisemaphetselweni elive.
tgt_text: Khabinethe ṱuṱuwedza Maafrika Tshipembe vhoṱhe pembelela vhufa ha mvelele yashu ho pfumaho na phambano zwine zwa vha na maanḓa u ri ṱanganya sa lushaka.

src_text: Kukhetfwa kwalomele iNingizimu Afrika eMkhandlwini Wenyonyana Yemave Ngemave Yetekuchumana (i-ITU) kanye neBhodi Yetimiso Temsakato.
tgt_text: Ri fanela ḓikumedzela roṱhe kha shumisana itela fhelisa phambano na vhushayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhuḓipfi ha muhumbulo wa ḓihudza nga vha Muafrika Tshipembe  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha:Vhathu vhoṱhe vho winaho, vho thubaho mimedala na vhaṱaṱisani vhe vha dzhenela kha 95th Comrades Marathon, une wa ḓivheswa nga pfi “Ultimate Human Race”, nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kukhetfwa kwaMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu lomele iNingizimu Afrika kuleliBhodi le-ITU Letimiso Temsakato (isiFundza .
tgt_text: Mbambe ya vhanna yo winwa nga Tete Dijana (awara dza 5, minetse ya 30, na mithethe ya 38) ane bva Mahikeng ngei Vhukovhela ha Devhula ngeno mugidimi wa shango ḽa Russia Alexandra Morozova (awara dza 6, minetse ya 17, na mithethe ya 47) wina mbambe ya vhafumakadzi.

src_text: Mnu.
Mchunu ulilunga lelisebentako lebhodi kwamanje.
tgt_text: NdilisoKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza:Mama Vho Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), Mulwelambofholowo wa kale na mutshimbidzi wa dzangano ḽa vhashumi vhe vha dovha vha vha muṱanganedzi wa National Order of Luthuli nga ṅwaha wa 2004 kha “vhushelamulenzhe ha vhutshilo havho hoṱhe kha nndwa ya lwela pfanelo dza vhashumi na swikelelwa ha Afrika Tshipembe ḽa demokirasi ḽi sa khethululi nga muvhala, nga mbeu nahone ḽo vhofholowaho ”.Vhaofisiri vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe (SAPS)  vhe vha vha vhe vhaṋameli kha bupo ḽa SAPS ḽe ḽa wa ngei Rand Airport, Germiston nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Ṱhangule.

src_text: Kuhlongotwa kutsi aphindze akhetselwe esikhundleni seMkhandlu we-ITU kusukela nga-2023 kuya ku-.
tgt_text: Vha SAPS vha khou ita ṱhoḓisiso ya tshivhangi tsha wa ha bupo iḽo.
Khabinethe tamela mashudu mutshimbidzabupo huvhalesaho uri fhola nga ṱavhanya  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwiwa madzina ho teahoa.

src_text: Lukhetfo lutokwenteka ngesikhatsi seNgcungcutsela Yemancusa e-ITU letoba e-Bucharest, e-Romania kusukela mhla tinge-26 iNyoni kuya kumhla ti-14 iMphala.
tgt_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Gugulethu Abigail Thimane sa Muthusa Mulangi (DDG): Vhuvheaiṱo kha Sekhithara ya Muvhuso na Mveledziso ya Khaphasithi kha Muhasho wa Vhupulani, Vhuvheaiṱo na ela  Mufumakadzi Vho Kwena Komape sa DDG: Mveledziso ya zwa Ikonomi, Mbambadzo na Vhuvhambadzi kha Muhasho wa Vhulimi, Mvusuludzo ya Mavu na Mveledziso ya Mahayani  Dokotela Vho Bongani Elias Sithole sa DDG: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo tsha Lushaka kha Muhasho wa Vhuvhusi ha Tshumisano.

src_text: TemandlaIKhabhinethi yatiswe nguNgcongcoshe Wetemabhizinisi aHulumende Pravin Gordhan mayelana nemandla a-Eskom ekunciphisa lokucisha-kongiwa kwagezi ngetikhatsi letitsite yaphindze yatfola nembiko wenchubekela phambili lobuya eKomidini Lelithekhnikhali   leliKomidi Lavelonkhe Letinkhinga Temandla.
tgt_text: Fulufulu.

src_text: Letinye timemetelo titokwentiwa nasekucedvwe lokucocisana kabanti ngalemibiko.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadzwa nga ha vhukoni ha Eskom ha fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi zwine zwa khou dzulela itea tshifhinga tshoṱhe nga Minisṱa wa Mabindu Muvhuso khathihi na ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho swika zwino bva kha Komiti ya zwa Thekiniki ine ya vha nga fhasi ha Komiti ya Lushaka ya nga ha Thaidzo dza Fulufulu.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise kudvumala ngalokutsikameteka nekungaphatseki kahle lokubangwe ngulokucisha-kongiwa kwagezi kumabhizinisi nakutakhamiti phaca, leyenteka ikakhulukati ngalesikhatsi hulumende abukene netinhlelo tekungenelela letimenyetelwe nguMengameli ngaKholwane.
Lutjalomali.
tgt_text: Hu ḓo dovha hafhu ha vha na dziṅwe nḓivhadzo dzine dza ḓo itwa nga murahu ha khunyeledzwa ha nyambedzano dzo khwaṱhaho dza nga ha mivhigo iyi.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwemukele kwetfulwa kweNdzawo Lensha Yekukhicita I-Sandvik Khomanani e-Kempton Park, lebeyiyincenye yelutjalomali lwetigidzi letinge-R350 leyatsenjiswa eNgcungcutseleni yesine Yelutjalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAIC) lebeyibanjelwe eSandton Convention Centre eJozi mhla ka-24 iNdlovulenkhulu..  Lesikhungo lesisha lesingemamitha lasikwele lange-62 000 sihlanganisa imisebenti leyayentiwe ngaphambilini etindzaweni letisihlanu letahlukene futsi sihlalisa basebenti lababalelwa ku-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱahisa vhaisala hayo nga thithisea na kanganyisea hune ha khou vhangwa nga khauwa ha muḓagasi kha vhoramabindu na ngomu miṱani, nga maanḓa musi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga tshifhinga tshine muvhuso wa khou ḓidzhenisa kha maga u tandulula thaidzo iyi a ḓivhadzwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwana.

src_text: Ingulesinye setikhungo teSandvik letinkhulu futsi letitfutfuke kakhulu emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele, futsi sinemandla ekukhicita emaloli ekutfwala ematfunjini emhlaba.
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi.

src_text: Tinsimbi tekwakha lemaloli letingetulu kwema-60% titawukhicitwa yiNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽa zwa Vhumagi ḽa Sandvik Khomanani, fhaḽa Kempton Park, ḽe ḽa vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dza zwa vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R350-miḽioni dze dza itwa nga tshifhinga tsha Muṱangano wa zwa Vhubindudzi wa Afrika Tshipembe (SAIC) we wa farelwa fhaḽa Sentharani ya Miṱangano ya Sandton, ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 24 Ṱhafamuhwe..     Tshifhaṱo itshi tshiswa tsha muelo linganaho 62 000 square-metre ndi tshine tsha ṱanganyisa fhethu huthihi mishumo ye kale ya vha tshi itwa kha mamaga maṱanu fhambanaho nahone tshi na vhashumi vha swikaho.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yakwamukela kuvakasha kwaMengameli Ramaphosa KwaZulu-Natali ngesikhatsi kwetfulwa sikhungo sekukhicita i-Hesto Harnesses e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ka-13 iNyoni.
tgt_text: Ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mamaga ha Sandvik mahulwanesa nahone musalauno ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni ha bveledza magandakanda u shuma migodini hu tshi shumiswa 60% ya zwibveledzwa zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza madalo zwa vhulavhelesi nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu tshi rwelwa ṱari tshiimiswa tsha zwa vhumagi tsha Hesto Harnesses fhaḽa Stanger, hune ha vha KwaDukuza nga ḽa 13 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Lesikhungo singuleminye yemiklamo lesihlanu yekutjalwa kwetimali lesiyincenye yetigidzigidzi letinge-R.  lkutibophelela kwe-Metair Investments Limited kuze kusekelwe kunwetjwa nekwentiwa kwasekhaya kweFord Ranger lensha.
tgt_text: Hetshi tshiimiswa ndi tshiṅwe tsha thandela ṱhanu khulwane dzine dza vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dzi linganaho  4-biḽioni dze dza itwa nga vha ha Metair Investments Limited itela tikedza zwa engedzwa na fhaṱwa ha mimoḓoro miswa ya Ford Ranger fhano hayani.

src_text: Mengameli uphindze wahambela kuvulwa kwephrojekthi yekutfutfukisa nekunwetjwa kweSappi Saiccor Mill lebita emabhiliyoni langema-R7,7 eMkomaas, lokuhloswe ngayo kukhulisa emandla kanye nekuncintisana kwenkampani emhlabeni wonkhe kungulapho idala nematfuba emisebenti esikhatsi lesifishane nalesidze.
tgt_text: Phresidennde vho dovha hafhu vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha vulwa ha thandela ya vusuluswa na engedzwa ha ḽimaga ḽa Sappi Saiccor Mill ḽine ḽa ḓura masheleni linganaho R7,7 biḽioni fhaḽa Umkomaas, zwine hezwi zwo livhiswa kha engedza vhukoni khathihi na vhea khamphani iyi kha maimo nṱhesa ḽifhasini ngeno nga thungo hu tshi khou sikwa zwikhala zwa mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi na ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Lokutjalwa kwetimali kuyincenye yetitsembiso letentiwa bosotimboni e-SAIC.
tgt_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu vhumba tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dze dza itwa nga vhoranḓowetshumo nga tshifhinga tsha muṱangano wa SAIC.

src_text: Lonkhe lutjalomali lolusha lolungena eveni letfu lusita ekwakhiweni kabusha nasekuvuseleleni umnotfo wetfu, futsi luyachubeka nekubeka iNingizimu Afrika njengendzawo yekutjalwa kwetimali lengakhetfwa.
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa kha shango ḽashu vhu thusa kha vusuluswa na vhuedzedzwa ha ikonomi yashu khathihi na vhea shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu havhuḓi ha zwa vhubindudzi..     Mveledziso ya themamveledziso.

src_text: Kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa ha tshipiḓa tshiswa tsha bada ya Musina Ring Road ngei Limpopo ine ya ḓo leludzela vhathu uri vha kone enda zwavhuḓi mona na ḓorobo ya Musina khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na engedzea ha mbambadzo na miṅwe mishumo ya zwa ikonomi vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na maṅwe mashango Tshitshavha tsha Mveledziso tsha Tshipembe ha Afrika.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kuvulwa kwencenye lensha yeMusina Ring Road eLimpopo lotokwenta kube lula kutsi bantfu bazulazule eMusina, iphindze futsi ivumele nekwandza kwekuhwebelana nemnotfo phakatsi kweNingizimu Afrika kanye nemave Enhlangano Yentfutfuko YaseNingizimu ne-Afrika (i-SADC).
tgt_text: Thandela ya masheleni swikaho R640-miḽioni yo sika mishumo ya tshoṱhe linganaho 275 hu tshi itelwa vhadzulapo vha vhupo honoho khathihi na ṋetshedza zwikhala kha zwitshavha zwapo hu tshi katelwa na mabindu maṱuku vhukati na mahulwane (SMMEs)..     Uhu fhaṱwa ha bada ya Musina Ring Road ndi tshipiḓa tsha muvhuso tsha mbekanyamushumo ya themamveledziso ya muvhuso, hu tshi shumiswa ERRP ine muhumbulo wayo muhulwane wa vha bveledza nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na zwikhala zwa mishumo kha sekhithara dzoṱhe dzo fhambanaho na zwitshavha nga angaredza..     Tshiwo tsha fhaḽa Jagersfontein.

src_text: Lomklamo lobita tigidzi letingema-R640 udale ematfuba emisebenti esikhatsi lesigcwele langetulu kwema-275 kubantfu bendzawo futsi waniketa ematfuba emiphakatsini yendzawo kanye nakumabhizinisi lamancane, laphakatsi nendzawo nalamancane kakhulu (ema-SMME).

Kwakhiwa kwemgwaco i-Musina Ring Road kuyincenye yeluhlelo lwahulumende lwesakhiwonchanti, ngekusebentisa i-ERRP, lekuhloswe ngayo kudala kukhula lokubandzakanya wonkhe umuntfu nematfuba emisebenti emikhakheni nasemiphakatsini leyehlukene.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedza mapifi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ya avho vhe vha lovha  musi masalela mugodi wo ṱutshelwaho henefho kha vhupo honoho ha Jagersfontein vhu re vunḓuni ḽa Gauteng tshi swika hune pwashea, ha fhedza ho vha na lurofhe lwa khombo lwe lwa elela henefho musi ḓuvha ḽi tshi thoma bva nga matsheloni Swondaha, ya ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Inhlekelele yaseJagersfontein.
tgt_text: Tshiwo itsho tsho dovha hafhu tsha sia themamveledziso ya kha vhupo honoho, ndaka dza vhathu zwavho fana na zwiendedzi khathihi na miṱa minzhi zwo tshinyadzwa vhukuma.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo endvudvuto emindenini yalabo labalahlekelwe timphilo tabo ngemuva kwekuchuma kwelidami leludzaka lelingcolile lemayini yendzawo leshiywe banikati e-Jagersfontein eFreyistati futsi yachitsa ludzaka lolubi ngetitfuba tasekuseni ngeliSontfo, ti-11 INyoni.
Lenhlekelele ishiye sakhiwonchanti salendzawo, timphahla tebantfu njengetimoti kanye nemiti leminingana yonakele kakhulu.
Ngalesikhatsi avakashele lendzawo yenhlekelele ngeMsombuluko, mhla ti-12 INyoni 2022, Mengameli Ramaphosa uvakalise kubonga ngemitamo yekuhlenga nekulungisa leyenteka kulendzawo.
tgt_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo avho henefho kha vhupo he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela hone nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 12 Khubvumedzi 2022, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho sumbedza takalela mushumo wa phuluso na mbuedzedzo une wa khou itwa henefho kha vhupo honoho.

src_text: Uphindze watsembisa kutsi hulumende utoniketa ngelusito loludzingekako kubahlali labatsintsekile baseJagersfontein.
tgt_text: Vho dovha hafhu vha ṋea pfulufhedziso ya uri muvhuso ḓo ṋetshedza thikhedzo yo teaho kha vhadzulapo vha Jagersfontein vho kwameaho.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikhutsatekile ngekutsi banikati bemayini batsi bakulungele kuniketa lusito loluthekhnikhali kanye nekweseka hulumende uma loko kucelwa nguMkhandlu Wetimbiwa eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedzea vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri vhaṋe vha mugodi uyu vho amba uri vho ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso na thikhedzo ya zwa thekiniki kha muvhuso arali hu tshi nga vha na khumbelo yo raloho nga vha Khoro ya zwa Minerala ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Imboni yetimayini solo ifaka ligalelo lelikhulu emnotfweni ngekucasha ngalokuphelele nekwesikhashana, emaholo laphuma kulamanye emave, kanye nekutjalwa kwetimali lokucondzile kwakulamanye emave, futsi idlala indzima lebalulekile ekwenteni ncono timphilo tebantfu emiphakatsini yetimayini.

Hulumende naletinye tinhlangano letingekho ngaphansi kwahulumende bangenelela ngekusheshisa ngekuniketa indzawo yekuhlala ngekuphutfuma, kwelulekwa kwalabahlukumetekile kanye netidzingo letisisekelo njengetingubo tekulala, bomatilasi nemaphasela ekudla.
Kuniketwa kwemanti nagezi kulendzawo sekubuyiselwe.
tgt_text: Nḓowetshumo ya zwa migodi kha ḓi vha yone shelaho mulenzhe zwihulwane kha ikonomi nga kha mishumo yo tou livhanaho nayo na miṅwe ya nga thungo, mbuelo dzi bvaho kha thundu dzi rengiselwaho nnḓa khathihi na vhubindudzi ho tou livhaho bva mashangoni nnḓa nahone dzi shela mulenzhe muhulwane kha khwinifhadza matshilo vhathu vha re kha zwitshavha zwine migodi yeneyo ya wanala khazwo.

src_text: Nasekususwe lokungcola kulendzawo yenhlekelele bosochwepheshe kulindzeleke kutsi bahlole kwakheka kwetindlu.
IKhabhinethi ibonge betimo letiphutfumako, tinhlangano temphakatsi kanye nemalunga emphakatsi ngekufaka sandla nelusito lwabo lolukhulu.
tgt_text: Muvhuso khathihi na maṅwe madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso wo dzhenelela nga ṱavhanya nga ṋetshedza vhudzulo ha shishi, thuso ya muhumbulo musi ho vha na tshiwo tsha ḽikhaulambilu khathihi na tshomedzo dza ndeme dzi fanaho na mabai, maṱirasi na zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa.

src_text: Temnotfo.
tgt_text: Nḓisedzo ya maḓi na muḓagasi kha vhupo uho yo vhuyelela ngonani swika zwino.

src_text: IKhabhinethi idzingidze ngesimo semnotfo welive ngemuva kwekuba tibalo takamuva teLihhovisi Lelubalobalo laseNingizimu Afrika (i-Stats SA) tivete kutsi samba semkhicito wasekhaya (i-GDP) wekota yesibili ya-2022 yehle nga-0,7%.
Tintfo letibe nemtselela kulokwehla tihlanganisa kucisha-kongiwa kwagezi, kungcubutana kweRussia ne-Ukraine, netindleko letisetulu tekuphila nekwehla kwemandla emali.

Kungenelela lokwentiwa luHlelo Lwekwakha Kabusha Umnotfo kanye Nekuvuselela (i-ERRP) kuvikela kakhulu lelive etivunguvungwini temave ngemave, futsi kuvikele nemisebenti kanye netindlela tekutiphilisa.
tgt_text: Musi vhupo uho he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela khaho ho no fhela kunakiswa hafhu, vhorathekiniki vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ite tsenguluso ya zwifhaṱo zwa dzinnḓu.

src_text: Kungenelela kwahulumende lokucinile kutemnotfo sekucala kutsela titselo, njengoba kubonakaliswa miphumela yakamuva yeLuhlololuvo lweKota Lwetisebenti lwe-Stats SA, lolubonise kutsi ingetulu kwema-648 000 imisebenti letfolakele phakatsi kwekota yekucala neyesibili ya-  Tincumo teKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa tshumelo dza shishi, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na miraḓo ya tshitshavha kha thuso yavho khathihi na mpho dze vha dzi ṋetshedza..     Ikonomi.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwekucaphela Nekuhlola (M&E) Lwenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yelusha (i-NYP).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ambedzana nga ha tshiimo tsha ikonomi kha shango ḽashu nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dza vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa Mbalombalo dza Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dzo sumbedzisa uri zwibveledzwa zwoṱhe zwa shango (GDP) kha tshifhinga tsha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 zwo tsela fhasi nga 0,7%.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate luhlaka lwe-M&E lolutokwenta kutsi kube nekucaphela ngemphumelelo kanye nekuhlolwa kwemtselela wetinsika te-NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: Zwiitisi zwe zwa ṱuṱuwedza uhu tsela fhasi ndi zwi fanaho na khauwa ha muḓagasi, khakhathi dza vhukati ha shango ḽa Russia na ḽa Ukraine hu tshi katelwa na ḓura ha zwirengwa khathihi na tshanduko ya mitengo.

src_text: Luhlaka luniketa ngetinkhomba letisihlanu letisezingeni lelisetulu letihambisana netinsika te-NYP.
tgt_text: Maga a dzhiiwa nga Pulane ya Mvusuludzo na Mbuedzedzo ya Ikonomi (ERRP) thusa shango vhukuma kha thaidzo dza ikonomi dze dza vha dzi tshi khou bvelela kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dovha hafhu tsireledza mishumo khathihi na nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo.

src_text: Letinkomba tentiwa nalabatsintsekako labafanele labanenshisekelo ekutfutfukisweni nasekuniketeni kwelusha emandla eveni.
tgt_text: Maga muvhuso khwaṱhaho zwa ikonomi khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo sa zwe zwa vhonala kha mvelelo dza zwenezwino dza Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhashumi dza nga Kotara dza vha tshiimiswa tsha Mbalombalo tsha Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dze dza sumbedzisa uri ho vha na mishumo miswa swikaho 648 000 ye ya sikwa vhukati ha kotara ya thoma na ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Kugcogcwa kwemininingwane kutohlukaniswa ngekweminyaka yebudzala, bulili, kukhubateka, ngekwemacembu ebuhlanga kanye nesimo sendzawo salokungenelela.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi (M&E) wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYP).

src_text: Lokucaphela kutokwentiwa kuto tonkhe tinhlaka tahulumende, mikhakha kanye netinkampani letitimele.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muhanga wa M&E une wa ḓo thusa kha ita uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi ho khwaṱhaho khathihi na tsenguluso ya masiandaitwa thikho dza NYP ya ṅwaha wa 2020-.

src_text: Imibiko itokhicitwa njalo ngekota futsi ishicilelwe kabili ngemnyaka.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu ṋetshedza zwilinganyi zwiṱanu zwa maimo nṱha zwine zwa elana na thikho dza NYP.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Yekuhlela Lokudidiyelwe.
tgt_text: Zwilinganyi izwi zwo bveledzwa nga tshumisano na vhashumisani vho teaho vhane vha vha na dzangalelo kha zwa mveledziso na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhaswa fhano shangoni.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ilugunyatile Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Yekuhlela Lokudidiyelwe kuhulumende, loluhlose kubukana namagebe labonakele ekuhleleni incubomgomo eluhlelweni lolukhona manje lwekuhlela.
tgt_text: Zwa kuvhanganywa ha zwidodombedzwa zwi ḓo khethekanywa hu tshi tevhelwa miṅwaha, mbeu, vhuholefhali, tshigwada tsha murafho na vhupo vhune maga aya khou itwa khaho.

src_text: Kungenelela lokuhlongotwako phakatsi kwalokunye kubukana nekubate kwekuhlelwa kwekucondziswa ngekhatsi kwetinhlaka letintsatfu tahulumende.
Kungenelela kutokwetfula indlela yekucaphela lesekelwe ebufakazini.
tgt_text: Zwa vhulavhelesi zwi ḓo itwa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso, zwiimiswa na kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe.

src_text: Luhlaka lwenchubomgomo luphindze lwetfule kusho ngembili lokulula ngekuhlela sikhatsi lesidze kuya kulesisemkhatsini nesikhatsi lesifishane kuhulumende wonkhe.
tgt_text: Mivhigo ḓo bveledzwa nga kotara nahone ya anḓadzwa luvhili nga ṅwaha..     Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhupulani ho Ṱanganelaho.

src_text: Itosebentela kwetfula tingucuko temtsetfo kuze kutsi kwentiwe ncono kuhambisana nekusho ngembili ekuhleleni nekucaphela kwahulumende.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhupulani ho Ṱanganelaho kha muvhuso, une wa khou lingedza tandulula thaidzo dzo ṱaluswaho dza zwa vhupulani ha mbekanyamaitele kha sisteme ya zwa vhupulani ya zwino.

src_text: Kugunyatwa KweSivumelwane Sekusungulwa Kwenhlangano Yemitsi Yase-Afrika (i-AMA).
tgt_text: Maga ane khou dzinginywa ḓo dovha hafhu sedzesa kha zwa sa elana ha vhupulani kha masia mararu muvhuso.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusayinwa kweSivumelwane Sekusungulwa kwe-AMA kanye nekwetfulwa kwaso ePhalamende kuze sigunyatwe.
tgt_text: Maga aya ḓo thoma shumisa maitele zwa vhulavhelesi ḓitikaho nga vhuṱanzi.

src_text: Loku kutokwenta kutsi kusebente sivumelwane lesamukelwa yi-African Union Assembly nga-.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa mbekanyamaitele dovha hafhu wa thoma shumisa nḓila yo leluwaho ya khumbulelo ine ya vha na vhupulani ha tshifhinga tshilapfu ya kha tsha vhukati na ha tshifhinga tshipfufhi kha mihasho ḓo dovha hafhu wa shuma wo livha kha bveledza maga u shandukisa milayo hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza zwa elana na humbulela kha zwa vhupulani na vhulavhelesi ha muvhuso.

src_text: Lesivumelwane sisungula ngalokusemtsetfweni i-AMA yalelivekati.
tgt_text: Khwaṱhisedzo ya Thendelano ya Thomiwa ha Zhendedzi ḽa zwa Mishonga ḽa Afrika (AMA).

src_text: I-ejensi itolawula imikhicito yetekwelapha, futsi itfutfukise kuphepha nekusebenta ngemphumelelo kwemikhicito yetekwelapha yalelivekati.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza sainwa ha Thendelano ya thomiwa ha AMA khathihi na ṋetshedzwa hayo kha Phalamennde uri kone khwaṱhisedzwa.

src_text: Kusayinwa nekucinisekiswa kwalesivumelwane kukhombisa kutibophelela kweNingizimu Afrika kutivumelwane temhlaba jikelele netalelivekati letimayelana nekucinisa imitsetfo yalelivekati lelawula imikhicito yalo yetemphilo.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri thendelano dze dza ṱanganezwa nga Guvhangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Afrika nga ṅwaha wa 2019 dzi thome shuma.

src_text: Umbiko Ngekusebenta Kweluhlelo Lwekucwaninga Nekutfutfukisa (i-R&D) Luhlelo Lwekuhlomulisa Intsela - 2019/20 kanye na-2020/.
tgt_text: Thendelano idzi ndi dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu mbo ḓi thoma vhumbwa AMA ya dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tshiofisi.

src_text: IKhabinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweluHlelo lwekuhlomulisa intsela ye-R&D eminyakeni lemibili leyengcile (nga-2019/20 na-2020/21).
tgt_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo langa zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga khathihi na khwinifhadza tsireledzea na shuma zwavhuḓi ha zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga kha dzhango.

src_text: Loku kuhambisana nesigaba 11D (17) seMtsetfo Wentsela Yemalingena, 1962 (uMtsetfo 58 1962), lodzinga kutsi lemibiko yetfulwe ePhalamende.
tgt_text: Uhu sainwa na khwaṱhisedzwa ha thendelano idzi hu ḓo engedza vhuḓiimiseli ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽifhasini na kha dzhango ḽa Afrika ho livhiswaho kha khwaṱhisa sisteme ya zwa milayo ya dzhango kha zwibveledzwa zwaḽo zwa mishonga..     Muvhigo nga ha Mashumele Mbekanyamushumo ya Magavhelo Muthelo wa zwa Ṱhoḓisiso na Mveledziso (R&D) – wa 2019/20 na 2020/.

src_text: Loluhlelo lwekuhlomulisa intsela luhlose kugcugcutela tinkampani letitimele kutsi titjale ku-R&D kuze kugcugcuteleke kukhula kwelutjalomali.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa ngei Phalamenndeni ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Magavhelo Muthelo wa miṅwaha mivhili yo fhelaho (2019/20 na 2020/21).

src_text: Kusita kuchubeka kwesayensi nekucamba lokutokhulisa umnotfo, kuchubekise nekuncintisana.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi khou elana na khethekanyo 11D (17) ya Mulayo wa Muthelo wa Mbuelo, wa 1962 (Mulayo 58 wa 1962), une wa lavhelela uri hu ṋetshedzwe mivhigo iyi ngomu Phalamenndeni.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi inetisekile kutsi lombiko ukhombisa kutsi tinkampani letinsha tifake ticelo tekuhlomuliswa ngentsela.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya magavhelo muthelo ndi ine ya khou lingedza ṱuṱuwedza khamphani dza phuraivethe uri dzi ite zwa vhubindudzi kha R&D hu itela ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya vhubindudzi dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa ya zwa saintsi na vhukoni yo livhiswaho kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza mashumele maimo nṱha.

src_text: Loku kugcugcutela letinye tinkampani kufikelela kulesikimu njengencenye lekhulisa lutjalomali igcugcutele kukhula kwemnotfo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri muvhigo sumbedza uri khamphani ntswa dzo ita khumbelo dza magavhelo muthelo khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza uri khamphani dzi swikele tshikimu itshi nga vhunzhi sa tshipiḓa tsha engedza vhubindudzi nga fhambana hadzo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi.

src_text: Tinkampani letine letisetulu letifinyelele kulokuhlomula tikumkhakha wekusetjentwa kwemikhicito yetekulima; timayini, emakhemikhali, tekutimonyonga, temakhemisi nete-elekhtrothekhnikhali nemikhakha yethekhnoloji yelwatiso iKhabinethi lekubeke njengalokuphambili KuluHlelo lweNchubomgomo Yekusebenta kuTetimboni.
Umbiko lophelele uyatfolakala kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko leSayensi nekuCamba letsi: www.dst.gov.za..  Iforamu yeMtsetfo Wekukhula Nematfuba E-Afrika (i-AGOA) –.
tgt_text: Khamphani nṋa khulwane dze dza swikela aya magavhelo muthelo ndi dzine dza vha kha sekhithara ya dzudzanya zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi; ya shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa migodini; ya dzikhemikhaḽa; ya lunako; ya mishonga na ya shumisa muḓagasi kha zwa thekhinoḽodzhi khathihi na sekhithara dza Thekhinoḽodzhi ya Mafhungo dze khabinethe ya dzi khwaṱhisedza sa dza ndeme kha Pulane ya Shuma ya Mbekanyamaitele ya zwa Nḓowetshumo.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusingatfwa kweForamu ye-AGOA nga-.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho nga kona swikelwa nga kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhukoni ine ya vha: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramu ya Mulayo wa Nyaluwo na Zwikhala wa Afrika (AGOA) –.

src_text: I-AGOA yagunyatwa yi-United States of America (USA) nga-2000 kuze kutsi inikete litfuba lekuhwebelana emaveni lamanyenti e-sub-Saharan Afrika kanye ne-USA.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ḓo farwa ha Foramu ya AGOA nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Kweluhwebo lokutfunyelwako kwaseNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kwe-AGOA kuhlanganisa titselo letidliwako, emantongomane, timoti, tincenye talokuhanjiswako, insimbi, lokuyinsimbi kanye nemikhicito yemakhemikhali.
tgt_text: AGOA yo phasiswa nga shango ḽa Amerika (USA) nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋetshedza tswikelo kha mbambadzo ine wa tou funa nga iwe muṋe kha vhunzhi ha mashango tshipembe ha soga ḽa Sahara khathihi na maraga wa ngomu ha shango ḽa USA.

src_text: Lilanga lelingulonalona nendzawo kusatomenyetelwa.
tgt_text: Zwibveledzwa zwa Afrika Tshipembe zwine zwa rengiselwa kha mashango nnḓa nga fhasi ha AGOA ndi zwine zwa katela mitshelo, nḓuhu, dzigoloi, zwipiḓa zwa dzigoloi, tsimbi khathihi na zwibveledzwa zwa khemikhaḽa.

src_text: INgcungcutsela YaboNgcongcoshe ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO).
tgt_text: Datumu ya fhedzisela na fhethu hune foramu ya ḓo farelwa hone kha ḓi ḓo ḓivhadzwa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kutsi iNingizimu Afrika isingatse Ingcungcutsela Yabongcongcoshe be-GEO eKapa nga-.
tgt_text: Tshigwada tsha nga ha Vhulavhelesi ha Ḽifhasi (GEO) Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa –.

src_text: I-GEO iyinhlangano yabohulumende bemave leyasungulwa nga-2003 ngemuva kweNgcungcutsela Yemhlaba Yentfutfuko Lechubekako yanga-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwauri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa wa GEO fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Cape Town nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Isebenta njengenkhundla yetive ngetive lapho emave afaka khona sandla ngekutitsandzela emgomweni lofanako wekwakha tinchubo te-GEO.
tgt_text: GEO ndi tshiimiswa tsha vhukati ha mivhuso tshe tsha vhumbwa nga ṅwaha wa 2003 nga murahu ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa nga ha Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu wa ṅwaha wa shuma sa yone nḓila ya masia manzhi ine khayo mashango shela mulenzhe nga tou funa ho livhiwa kha swikela tshipikwa tshithihi tsha bveledza sisteme dza GEO.

src_text: I-GEO kwanyalo inabohulumende bavelonkhe labangetulu kwema-113, labange-30 kubo babuya e-Afrika kanye netinhlangano letitibandzakanyako letingaba ngema-140, leti-11 tato tibuya e-Afrika.
tgt_text: GEO zwazwino na mashango ane vha miraḓo linganaho 113, hune khao 30 ndi fhano Afrika khathihi na madzangano ane khou shela mulenzhe linganaho 140, hune 11 hone bva fhano kha ḽa Afrika.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika ibe lilunga lelisebentako leliKomidi Leliphetse kusukela nga-2005 futsi bososayensi betfu njengamanje batibandzakanya etinhlelweni letinyentana telucwaningo letiholwa yi-GEO.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo ḓi dzulela vha muraḓo wa Khorotshitumbe fhelelaho bva tsha ṅwaha wa 2005 nahone vhorasaintsi vhashu zwazwino vha khou shela mulenzhe kha mishumo minzhi ya zwa ṱhoḓisiso ine ya khou rangwa phanḓa nga GEO.

src_text: Imphala Inyanga Yetekutfutsa (i-OTM) –.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendi wa Tshimedzi (OTM) –.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa kwemkhankhaso we-OTM ngeMgcibelo, mhla lu-1 Imphala 2022, ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Sishov’ingolovane: ndzawonye sakha sakhiwonchanti kutekutfutsa lesakha siphindze simamise timphilo”.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha fulo ḽa OTM nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 1 Tshimedzi 2022, nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Sishov’ingolovane fhaṱisana themamveledziso ya zwa vhuendi ine ya fhaṱa na bveledza nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo dza tshifhinga tshilapfu”.

src_text: I-OTM yeminyaka yonkhe isetjentiselwa kucaphelisa ngetekutfutsa njengalenye yetintfo letibalulekile ekukhuleni kwemnotfo kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwendzawo.
tgt_text: OTM ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumiswa kha tsivhudza vhathu nga ha vhuendi sa tshiṅwe tsha zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme tsha nyaluwo ya ikonomi na mveledziso ya fhethu.

src_text: Kutokwentiwa imisebenti leminyentana kukhombisa imikhakha leyehlukene yesakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa kutekundiza, taselwandle, tekutfutsa umphakatsi kanye nemigwaco.
tgt_text: Hu ḓo vha na mishumo minzhi ine ya ḓo itwa itela ṱana zwithu zwo fhambanaho zwa themamveledziso ya vhuendi, zwa kha vhuendi ha muyani, ha lwanzheni, vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi na dzibada.

src_text: Lemisebenti itophindze icaphelise mayelana netekuphepha netekuvikeleka kutekutfutsa.
tgt_text: Mishumo iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṋea tsivhudzo nga ha tsireledzo na vhutsireledzi ha zwishumiswa zwa vhuendi.

src_text: Kutophindze kubanjwe tinkhulumiswano nalabatsintsekako kuze kucociswane ngetinsayeya letehlukene emkhakheni wetekutfutsa.
tgt_text: Nyambedzano na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho na dzone dzi ḓo vha hone itela davhidzana nga ha khaedu dzo fhambanaho dzine dza vha hone kha sekhithara ya zwa vhuendi.

src_text: Hulumende usatibophelele ekwenteni ncono sakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa selive, etindzaweni tasemaphandleni netasemadolobheni, kuze kube lula kutfutfwa kwetimphahla nebantfu ngendlela lesebentako nalenelisako.
tgt_text: Muvhuso kha ḓi vha wo ḓiimisela khwinifhadza themamveledziso ya zwa vhuendi ya shango ḽashu, kha vhupo hoṱhe, ha mahayani na ha dziḓoroboni itela uri hu kone vha na enda ha vhathu na thundu nga nḓila yo leluwaho.

src_text: Umhlangano Wenhlangano Yetive Letihlangene (UN) WeluHlelo Lekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu (UN-HABITAT).
IKhabhinethi igunyate kusingatfwa kwemhlangano wemalunga e-UN-HABITAT eJozi mhla ti-16 namhla ti-17 Imphala.
tgt_text: Muṱangano wa nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhudzulo ha Vhathu (UN-HABITAT) ya Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UN).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa farwa ha muṱangano wa miraḓo ya UN-HABITAT fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 16 na 17 Tshimedzi.

src_text: Litiko Letekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu litocondzanisa lomhlangano wemalanga lamabili lotohanjelwa tingcweti tetembusave, bongoti kanye nebacwaningi, lokufaka emalunga labalulekile eliKomidi Lebameleli Ngalokugcwele Be-UN-HABITAT lelitinte eNairobi, eKenya.
Tindzaba letibalulekile lokutocociswana ngato tifaka kufuna kungenelela kwetingucuko emikhukhwini kanye nasemijondolo.
tgt_text: Muhasho wa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ḓo vha wone une wa ḓo tshimbidza hoyu muṱangano wa maḓuvha mavhili une wa ḓo dzhenelwa nga mazhakanḓila zwa polotiki, vhaḓivhi na vhaṱoḓisisi, hu tshi katelwa na miraḓo mihulwane ya Komiti ya Vhaimeleli vha Tshoṱhe vha tshiimiswa tsha UN-HABITAT tshine tsha vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Nairobi, kha ḽa Kenya.

src_text: Imiphumela yalokucocisana itoholela ekwetfulweni kweluHlaka Lwekusebenta Lwemhlaba Wonkhe, lolutokwetfulwa eMhlanganweni We-UN-HABITAT kuze kutsi lugunyatwe nga-  IMitsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Mafhungo ndeme ane ḓo ambiwa nga hao ḓo katela wana maga tshandukiso ya vhudzulo ha mikhukhuni na mishasha.

src_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo weMkhandlu Wavelonkhe Wekuhlukunyetwa Ngekwebulili Nekubulawa Kwalabasikati (i-GBVF) wa-.
IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMkhandlu Wavelonkhe WeMtsetfosivivinyo we-GBVF wa-2021 kuze ucutjungulwe.
tgt_text: Mvelelo dza nyambedzano idzi ndi dzone dzine dza ḓo itisa uri hu vhe na rwelwa ṱari ha Muhanga wa Pulane ya Mashumele ya Ḽifhasi, ine ya ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha muṱangano wa Guvhangano ḽa UN-HABITAT hu tshi itelwa uri dzi khwaṱhisedzwe nga ṅwaha wa     Milayotibe.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uniketa luhlaka lwemtsetfo kuze kusungulwe sigungu lesisemtsetfweni lesitoniketa kungenelela lokucondzene ngco nekubukana ne-GBVF.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa nga ha Khakhathi dzo Ḓitikaho nga Mbeu khathihi na Mabulayo Vhathu vha Tshifumakadzi wa Khoro ya Lushaka (GBVF) wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Iphindze inikete kusungulwa kweBhodi yeMkhandlu letoniketa buholi lobunetindlelasu futsi wengamele kucaliswa kweluHlelo Lwendlelasu Yavelonkhe nge-GBVF, lolwavunywa yiKhabhinethi ngeMphala 2020 kutsi lucalwe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa GBVF wa Khoro ya Lushaka wa ṅwaha wa 2021 ngei Phalamenndeni itela uri kone dzudzanywa.

src_text: Lebhodi itoba nemalunga lama-51% etinhlanganweni temphakatsi kanye nema-49% lavela kuhulumende.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ṋetshedza muhanga wa zwa milayo ya vhumbiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha mulayo hu tshi itelwa maga u dzhenelela nga nḓila yo khwaṱhaho kha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa GBVF dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza vhumbiwa ha Bodo ya Khoro ine ya ḓo ṋetshedza vhurangaphanḓa ha ndeme khathihi na vhona uri hu khou thoma shumiswa Maga Khwaṱhaho Lushaka u Lwa na Zwiito zwa GBVF a ṱanganedzwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri thome shumiswa.

src_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo sewundlulile ekubonisaneni nemphakatsi.
tgt_text: Bodo ḓo vha na vhuimeleli ha 51% bva kha vhadzulapo ngeno ha 49% vhu tshi ḓo bva kha muvhuso.

src_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo wa-2018 wekuLawulwa kweMikhicito yeLigwayi kanye naSikilidi we-elekthronikhi.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wo no ḓi fhira nga fhasi ha maitele vhukwamani na vhadzulapo..     Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola na Mulayotibe wa Ndangulo ya Sisteme dza Nḓisedzo ya Eḽekhiṱhironiki wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo wa-2018 wekuLawulwa kweMikhicito yeLigwayi kanye neSikilidi we-Elekthronikhi, lokuhloswe ngawo kucedza uMtsetfo lokhona manje Wekulawula Imikhicito yeLigwayi, wa-1993 (uMtsetfo 83 wa-1993), njengoba uchitjiyelwe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola na Ndangulo ya Sisteme ya Nḓisedzo ya Eḽekhiṱhironiki wa ṅwaha wa 2018 kha Phalamennde, une wa vha wone une wa khou ḓo phumula Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola, wa 1993 (Mulayo 83 wa 1993) une wa vha hone zwazwino ya nga he wa khwinifhadzwa ngaho.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose nekucinisa tinyatselo telive tetemphilo yemphakatsi futsi ticondzaniswe neSivumelwane Seluhlaka Lwekulawula Ligwayi Senhlangano Yetemphilo Yemhlaba.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe khou dovha hafhu wa ṱoḓa khwaṱhisa maga zwa mutakalo wa tshitshavha shango khathihi na ita uri elane na Thendelano dza Muhanga wa Dzangano ḽa Mutakalo ḽa Ḽifhasi kha zwa Ndangulo ya Mafola.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlongota, kulokunye, ema-100% ekungabhemeli endlini nakuletinye tindzawo letingaphandle; kuvinjelwa kwekutsengiswa kweligwayi ngemishini yekutsengisa, kanye nekucinisa kupakishwa kweligwayi kanye netimphawu letisicwayiso.
tgt_text: Zwiṅwe zwa zwine mulayotibe uyu wa khou dzinginya zwone, ndi vhupo ha nga nnḓa kana ha nga ngomu ha zwifhaṱo vhune khaho ha sa tendelwe zwa daha mafola nga nḓila yo fhelelaho;  nyiledzo kha zwa rengiswa ha sigareṱe hu tshi shumiswa mitshini ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho sigareṱe dzenedzo khathihi na khwaṱhisa zwa tswayo dza tsivhudzo kha phakhethe dza sigareṱe.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo sewundlule ekubonisaneni lokubanti nalabatsintsekako labehlukene, lokufaka imboni yeligwayi, tinhlangano temiphakatsi kanye nematiko ahulumende lafanele  Imicimbi Letako.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wo pfukha nga fhasi ha maitele khwaṱhaho zwa vhukwamani na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho, hu tshi katelwa na vha nḓowetshumo ya mafola, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na mihasho ya muvhuso kwameaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: ISeshini yema-77th yeMbutsano Lotayelekile we-UN.
tgt_text: Dzulo ḽa vhu77 ḽa Guvhangano ḽa Nnyi na Nnyi ḽa Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UNGA77).

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itibandzakanye ku-UNGA77 letoba endlunkhulu ye-UN eDolobheni laseNew York e-USA kusukela mhla ka-20 kuya kumhla ka-27 INyoni 2022 ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Sikhatsi sekuhlukanisa: Kuvula ticatululo tengucuko tetinsayeya letitfungene”.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou shela mulenzhe kha dzulo ḽa UNGA77 ḽine ḽa khou farelwa fhaḽa musanda wa UN une wa vha Ḓoroboni ya New York kha ḽa Amerika bva nga ḽa 20 swika ḽa 27 Khubvumedzi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Tshikhala tsha ndeme vulela thandululo dza ḓisa tshanduko dza valela khaedu”.

src_text: Emaveni laseNingizimu, umtselela kutemnotfo nakutenhlalomnotfo wabhubhane we-Coronavirus (COVID-19) awukalingani nawucatsaniswa nekululama eNyakatfo letfutfukile futsi loku kudzinga umtamo lobumbene kuto tonkhe tive kuze kucinisekiswe kutsi akekho losalela emuva.
tgt_text: Kha sia ḽa Tshipembe ha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe, masiandaitwa kha zwa ikonomi na kha ikonomi na matshilisano ḓiswaho nga Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19) ḓi wanala sa lingani musi ho sedzwa luvhilo lwa mbuedzedzo musi tshi vhambedzwa na re kha sia ḽo bvelelaho ḽa Devhula nahone hezwi zwi ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na farisana vhukati ha tshaka dzoṱhe itela uri hu si vhe na ane salela murahu.

src_text: Andvulela Inkhulumomphikiswano Jikelele ye-UN, Nobhala-Jikelele we-UN, Mnu António Guterres, utobita ingcungcutsela lemayelana "Nengucuko Kutemfundvo" futsi abambe umhlangano losezingeni lelisetulu lobuke etiNhlosweni tekuTfutfukiswa Lokusimeme (ema-SDG).
Umhlangano wema-SDGs kulindzeleke kutsi uhlole tindlela tekutfola umfutfo futsi usheshise kucaliswa kwato.
tgt_text: Phanḓa ha Nyambedzano dza Nnyi na Nnyi dza UN, Muṅwaleli Muhulwane wa UN, Vho António Guterres, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa nga ha “Tshandukiso ya Pfunzo” nahone vha ḓo dovha vha tshimbidza muṱangano wa vhurumelwa ha maimo nṱha une wa ḓo vha wo lavhelesa nga maanḓa kha Zwipikwa zwa Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu (SDGs).

src_text: Lilanga Lemagugu.
tgt_text: Hoyu muṱangano wa SDG khou lavhelelwa uri ḓo sedzesa kha zwa wana hafhu nḓila dza vhuisa nungo khathihi na engedza luvhilo lwa ita uri tshanduko idzi dza pfunzo dzi thome shumiswa.

src_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utokwetfula inkhulumo yelusuku emgubhweni weLilanga Lemagugu Lavelonkhe la-2022 e-Union Buildings ngeMgcibelo, mhlaka-24 INyoni.
Lomcimbi utobanjwa ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Kubungata Lifa LaSolomon Linda Nemculo Wemdzabu waseNingizimu Afrika”.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhufa.

src_text: INyanga Yemagugu yalomnyaka icondzene ngco nemculo wesintfu waseNingizimu Afrika ikakhulukati emculweni wesicathamiya kanye neligalelo lawo lelikhulu kutemidlalo, tebuciko, emasiko nemagugu.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi tshavho tshihulwane kha vhuṱambo ha pembelela Ḓuvha ḽa Vhufa ḽa Lushaka ḽa ṅwaha wa 2022 fhaḽa Union Buildings nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 24 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Indzikimba ihlonipha iminyaka lema-60 kwandlula emhlabeni umculi, Longumhlabeleli nemcambi wetingoma Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), lowatiwa ngaSolomon Ntsele, nalowadvuma kakhulu njengemcambi wengoma letsi, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo vhu ḓo farwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U pembelela Vhufa ha Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika Wapo wa Afrika Tshipembe”..     Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa wa uno ṅwaha wo sedzesa kha muzika wapo wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe, nga maanḓa ho lavheleseswa kha muzika wa Isicathamiya khathihi na nḓila ye wa shela ngayo mulenzhe kha mitambo yashu, vhutsila, mvelele na vhufa.

src_text: Umcimbi Wekulinganisa Welilanga Letaselwandle La-.
tgt_text: Thero iyi fhululedza miṅwaha ya 60 nga murahu ha lovha ha ramuzika, muimbi na muṅwali wa muzika Vho Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), vhe vha vha vha tshi ḓivhiwa hafhu sa Vho Solomon Ntsele, vhane vha ḓivhea vhukuma sa ene muṅwali wa luimbo lu no pfi, “Mbube”.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itobe isingatse Umcimbi Wekulinganisa WeliLanga Letaselwandle Lemnyaka wa-2022 eThekwini kusukela mhla ka-12 kuya mhla ka-14 Imphala.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo ha nga Thungo ha Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi ha ṅwaha wa 2022  .

src_text: Lomcimbi utosingatfwa ngesikhatsi se-OTM, nayo letoba yincenye yekucaphelisa ngemkhakha wetfu wetaselwandle.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo vha ḽi tshi khou fara Vhuṱambo ha nga Thungo ha Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi ha ṅwaha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban bva nga ḽa 12 swika 14 Tshimedzi.

src_text: Lomcimbi utoletsa titfunywa letivela emaveni lahlukene letitotibonela imboni yetaselwandle yaseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo farwa nga tshifhinga tsha OTM, ine na yone ya ḓo vha tshipiḓa tsha tsivhudza vhathu nga ha sekhithara ya zwa lwanzheni.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika ibe lilunga leNhlangano Yetaselwandle Yemave Ngemave kusukela nga-1995, lokusikhungo lesikhetsekile se-UN lesibukene nekulawula imikhumbi.
tgt_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo kuvhanganya vhurumelwa bva kha mashango fhambanaho vhane vha ḓo vha na tshikhala tsha kona vhona nḓowetshumo ya zwa lwanzheni ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Inyanga Yetekuvakasha.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa Dzangano ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi bva tsha ṅwaha wa 1995, ḽine ḽa vha zhendedzi ḽo khetheaho ḽa UN ḽine mushumo waḽo wa vha langa matshimbilele zwikepe.

src_text: INyanga Yetekuvakasha kulomnyaka igujwa ngaphansi kwendzikimba yeLilanga Lemhlaba Letekuvakasha (27 INyoni) lelitsi “Kucabanga Kuvakasha Futsi”.
Tekuvakasha tasekhaya tibalulekile ekuvuseleleni umkhakha wetekuvakasha, loneligalelo lelikhulu kuGDP yaseNingizimu Afrika nasekudaleni imisebenti.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikujabulele kutsi umkhakha wetekunakekela kutekuvakasha urekhode kwenyuka kwetivakashi ngemuva kwesikhatsi seCovid-.
tgt_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango wa uno ṅwaha khou pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ya Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Vhuendelamashango ḽa Ḽifhasi (27 Khubvumedzi) ine ya ri “U humbula hafhu zwa Vhuendelamashango nga huswa”.

src_text: Bantfu labatigidzile-.
tgt_text: Vhuendelamashango ha fhano hayani ndi ha ndeme kha vusuluswa ha sekhithara ya zwa vhuendelamashango ine ya shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha GDP ya Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na sika mishumo.

src_text: 2  batsatfwe luhambo ngesigamu sekucala sa-2022, loku kusho kutsi sibalo setivakashisikhuphuke ngema-114% nakucatsaniswa nesikhatsi lesifanako sa-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri sekhithara ya zwa vhuḓimvumvusi yo rekhoda nyaluwo kha tshivhalo tsha vhaeni kha tshifhinga tsha nga murahu ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.

src_text: Loku kukhombisa kukhuphuka lokubonakalako kwesikhatsi lesifanako sa-2019, lapho bantfu labatigidzi letingema-.
tgt_text: Nyendo dza ngomu shangoni dzi linganaho.

src_text: 6 batsatfwe mahambo asekhaya.
tgt_text: 2 miḽioni dze dza farwa kha tshifhinga tsha hafu ya thoma ya ṅwaha wa 2022 dzo sumbedza nyengedzedzo ya 114% musi dzi tshi vhambedzwa na tshifhinga tshenetsho tshithihi nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Njengencenye yekugubha iNyanga Yetekuvakasha, iKhabhinethi ikhutsata bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi batsatse emahambo nge’Shotleft’ baye etifundzeni tetfu letehlukene.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwo sumbedza khwinifhadzea vhukuma kha idzo dza tshifhinga tshenetsho tshithihi nga ṅwaha wa 2019, he ha vha na nyendo dza ngomu hayani dzi linganaho.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yemukela sincumo se-Air Belgium sekundiza kwetindiza tesizini letita eNingizimu Afrika, kusukela kulenyanga (iNyoni), lokutocinisa tekuvakasha kubuye kusimise simo setfu njengendzawo lesingakhetsa kuyivakashela.
tgt_text: 6 miḽioni.

src_text: Sitofaka ekhatsi tindiza emavikini onkhe letiya eKapa naseJozi  Imilayeto.
tgt_text: Sa tshipiḓa tsha pembelela Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango, Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe uri vha fare nyendo dza ‘Shotleft’ ya kha mavunḓu fhambanaho.

src_text: KuhalaliselaIKhabhinethi yendlulise kuhalalisa netilokotfo letinhle ku:Mengameli William Samoei Ruto waseRiphabhuliki yaseKenya, logcotjwe ngaLweSibili, 13 INyoni 2022, kulandzela makhetfo elive lanekuthula  labanjwe mhla ti-9 iNgci.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo nga vha khamphani ya zwa Vhufhufhi ya Belgium (Air Belgium) ya ḓo vha na mabufho ane ḓo fhufha tshi ḓa fhano Afrika Tshipembe nga zwifhinga thoma kha uno ṅwedzi wa Khubvumedzi, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo khwaṱhisa vhukuma vhuendelamashango khathihi na dovha hafhu zwa khwaṱhisa tshiimo tshashu tsha vha fhethu havhuḓi ha zwa vhuendelamashango.

src_text: Lisekela laMengameli David Mabuza abelapho kulokubekwa amele Mengameli Ramaphosa, hulumende neRiphabhuliki yeNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo katela mabufho ane ḓo enda vhukati ha ḓorobo ya Kapa na ya Johannesburg nga vhege     Milaedza fhululedza    Khabinethe yo ṱahisa milaedza yayo ya fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Phresidennde Vho William Samoei Ruto vha Riphabuḽiki ya Kenya, vhe vha vhewa tshiduloni nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 13 Khubvumedzi 2022, nga murahu ha vha na khetho dze dza tshimbila zwavhuḓi nga mulalo nga ḽa 9 Ṱhangule.

src_text: INyonyana Yelibhola Lembhoco yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neliDolobha laseKapa ngekusingatsa ngemphumelelo luhlelo lwesiphohlongo lwemchudzelwano weNdzebe Yemhlaba Yelibhola Lembhoco lemaSevens phakatsi kwamhla ti-9 kanye namhla ti-11 INyoni.
tgt_text: Muthusa Phresidennde Vho David Mabuza vho dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu ha vhewa tshiduloni vho imela Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa khathihi na muvhuso na vhathu vha Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Bekungekwekucala kutsi lomcimbi lohlonishwa kangaka usingatfwe live lase-Afrika kanye netinkhulungwane letiningi tebalandzeli lebebawuhambele bajikijelwe ngencumbi yelibhola lembhoco kanye nekungenisa tihambi eNingizimu Afrika leyatiwa ngako.
tgt_text: Vha Mbumbano ya Ragibii ya Afrika Tshipembe na vha Ḓorobo khulwane ya Kapa nge vha kona tshimbidza thonamennde ya vhumalo ya mitambo ya Rugby World Cup Sevens nga nḓila yavhuḓi vhukati ha ḽa 9 na 11 Khubvumedzi.

src_text: Emavi EkudvudvutaIKhabhinethi ikhombise emavi endvudvutoemindenini nakubangani be:bantfwana besikolwa labangu-18 nalabadzala lababili labashone engotini lesabekako ePhongola, KwaZulu-Natal ngaLesihlanu, 16 INyoni 2022 ngemuva kwekutsi iloli lebeyigijima ishayisene ngenhloko neveni letfutsa bafundzi  Kucashwa.
tgt_text: Holwu lwo vha lwa tou thoma musi vhuṱambo uvhu ha maimo nṱha ngaurali vhu tshi tsimbidzwa nga shango ḽa Afrika nahone vhunzhi ha vhaṱaleli vha zwigidi na zwigidi vhe vha dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu vho ḓiphina nga mitambo yo fhambanaho ya ragibii khathihi na vhuthu ha shango ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vhu ḓivheaho ḽifhasini..     Maipfi ndiliso      Khabinethe yo ṱahisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa na dzikhonani dza: Vhana vha tshikolo vha linganaho 18 na vhaaluwa vhavhili vhe vha lovha kha khombo shushaho ngei Pongola, kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 16 Khubvumedzi 2022 nga murahu ha musi ṱhiraka ḽa dekudeku ḽi tshi thulana nga tsha phanḓa na kugoloi kwa luṱanḓala kwe kwa vha ku tshi khou endedza vhagudi  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho     Vho Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale sa Mulangi Muhulu (DG): Mukhomishinari wa Lushaka wa Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Vhululamisi     Dokotela Vho Malixole Percival Mahlati sa Muthusa Mulangi Muhulu: Tshumelo dza Zwibadela na Mutakalo wa Nṱha na Mveledziso ya Vhashumi kha Muhasho wa Mutakalo     Vho Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki sa Musedzulusi Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Vhulimi, Mbuedzedzo ya Mavu na Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Mahayani     Vho Phaswa Phineas Mamogale sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa zwa Masheleni kha Muhasho wa Mutakalo..     Khabinethe yo tendelana na tholwa ha vhathu vha tevhelaho     Vho Tshediso Matona sa Mukhomishinari wa Khomishini ya zwa Maanḓafhadzwa ho Angalalaho ha Vharema siani ḽa Ikonomi     Miraḓo ya Khoro ya Khaṱhululo ya Bodo ya Matambwa na Nyanḓadzo: Vho Siyazi Tyamtyam (Mudzulatshidulo)Mufumakadzi Vho Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mufumakadzi Vho Sisanda Nkoala;Mufumakadzi Vho Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mufumakadzi Vho Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Dokotela Vho Litheko Modisane;Vho Phuti Nehemia Phukubje; Vho James Shikwambana; naMufumakadzi Vho Manko Thalitha Bufffel (vhane vha khou tou dovha hafhu tholwa).

src_text: Kutfolakala kwemanti.
tgt_text: Nḓisedzo ya maḓi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ibonge bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika ngekutfobela imibandzela yemanti lesetjentiswe etindzaweni letitsite taseJozi, taseTshwane netase-Ekurhuleni kute kusimamiswe linani lemanti lasemadamini.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe kha tevhedza havho nyiledzo dza kushumisele kwa maḓi dze dza vha hone kha vhuṅwe vhupo ha ḓorobo ya Johannesburg, Tshwane na Ekurhuleni itela dzikisa tshikalo tsha maḓi madamuni.

src_text: Emadamu netilulu temanti tisaloku ticindzetelekile ngenca yemazinga ekushisa lasetulu eGauteng, futsi kukhula kwesidzingo semanti kuphocelele i-Rand Water kutsi inciphise kakhulu kuphakelwa kwemanti kubomasipala.
tgt_text: Madamu na fhethu ha vhulungela hone maḓi zwi kha ḓi vha fhasi ha mutsiko nga mulandu wa thempheretsha dzi re nṱhesa kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng ngeno ṱhoḓea ya maḓi ine ya khou dzulela engedzea yo kombetshedza uri vha ha Rand Water vha fhungudze vhukuma nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha mimasipala.

src_text: Lesikhungo lesilusito sekuphakela emanti siphakela emanti ekunatsa ngebunyenti ebantfwini labangetulu kwetigidzi leti-11 eGauteng, etincenyeni letitsite teMpumalanga, eFreyistata naseNyakatfo Nshonalanga.
tgt_text: Itshi tshiimiswa tsha zwa maḓi tshi ṋetshedza vhunzhi ha maḓi kunaho kha vhathu vha fhiraho 11 miḽioni vhane vha vha vhadzulapo vha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng, zwipiḓa zwa vunḓu ḽa Mpumalanga, Free State na ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela.

src_text: Lemibandzela lengavimbeleki ihlose kuvikela kutfolakala kwemanti futsi itawuhlala ikhona site simo sibe ncono.
tgt_text: Hedzi nyiledzo dze dza vha dzi sa tinyei, dzo livhiswa kha ita uri hu vhe na nḓisedzo yavhuḓi ya maḓi nahone dzi ḓo bvela phanḓa vhuya swikela tshiimo tshi tshi khwinifhadzea.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icela ummango kutsi uchubeke nekutfobela lemibandzela yemanti nekutsi udlale indzima yekutsi usebentise lensita leyimvela kancane ngendlela leyongako.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha miraḓo ya tshitshavha uri vha bvele phanḓa na tevhedza nyiledzo dza maḓi khathihi na shela mulenzhe nga shumisa hetshi tshiko tshi konḓaho wanala ngaurali nga nḓila yavhuḓi.

src_text: Siteleka sase-Transnet.
tgt_text: Tshiṱereke tsha fhaḽa Transnet.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela lesivumelwano semiholo seminyaka lemitsatfu lesisemkhatsini kwe-Transnet nenyonyane yebasebenti i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), lesitawusebenta kusuka mhla lu-1 Mabasa 2022 kuya kumhla tinge-31 Indlovulenkhulu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelano ya zwa miholo ya miṅwaha miraru ye ya swikelwa vhukati ha vha ha Transnet na vha Mbumbano ya Vhuthihi ha zwa Vhuendi ya Lushaka (UNTU), ḽine ḽa vha dzangano ḽa vhashumi, ine thendelano yeneyo ya ḓo thoma shuma vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha bva nga ḽa 1 Lambamai 2022 swika ḽa 31 Ṱhafamuhwe.

src_text: Ikhomishini Yekubuyisana, Yekungenelela Neyekulamula beyengamele lomhlangano lote nalesivumelwano, locedze lesiteleka samanje semalunga e-UNTU ngaleso sikhatsi.
tgt_text: Vha Khomishini ya Vhupfumedzani, Vhuṋenḓila na Vhulamukanyi ndi vhone vho swikelaho vhupfumedzani ha miholo iyi, zwe zwa fhedza nga fhelisa tshiṱereke tshine tsha vha hone zwazwino tsha miraḓo ya UNTU nga ṱavhanya.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yasemukela sincumo se-South African Transport and Allied Workers (i-SATAWU) sekucedza lesiteleka.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo nga vha Dzangano ḽa Vhashumi vha zwa Vhuendi na Sekhithara dzi Elanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe (SATAWU) ya fhelisa tshiṱereke.

Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhuḓiimiseli ha vha Transnet ha sedzesa kha fhungudza mishumo yo salelaho murahu ye ya vha hone kha sisteme yoṱhe ya vhuimangalavha na zwiporo nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha tshiṱereke tshe tsha kwama ikonomi khathihi na dziṅwe sekhithara dzine dzo ḓitika kha tshumelo yayo nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi..   Khabinethe yo livhuwa thikhedzo na tshumisano ye ya ṋetshedzwa nga vha mabindu nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tsha tshiṱereke.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokutibophelela kwe-Transnet ekutseni itawugcila kakhulu ekususeni kusilela emuva lokwenteke kuto tonkhe tikhumulo temikhumbi nasemizileni yetitimela ngalesikhatsi salesiteleka, lokube nemtselela lomubi kutemnotfo nakumikhakha lencike kulemisebenti.
tgt_text: Yo dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa vhukati ha vha ndangulo ya Transnet na madzangano vhashumi vhune ha ḓo vhuedza khamphani yeneyi ya Transnet khathihi na ikonomi ya shango.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ibonge kakhulu lokwesekelwa nekubambisana lokuniketwe betemabhizinisi ngalesikhatsi salesiteleka.
tgt_text: Vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Igcugcutela kutsi buchubeke lobudlelwane lobusemkhatsini kwebaphatsi nebasebenti base-Transnet kute lenkampani netemnotfo tikhone kuzuza.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo u Shuma a tshimbila zwavhuḓi nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa ngei kha shango ḽa Saudi Arabia nga ḽa 15 na ḽa 16 Tshimedzi.

src_text: Budlelwane emkhatsini kweNingizimu Afrika neSaudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo aya, mashango aya vhuvhili hao saina Memorandamu dza Thendelano (MoUs) ya 17 kha masia fhambanaho fanaho na zwa vhulimi, vhufuwakhovhe, migodi, fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho, vhutsireledzi, vhuendi na vhufuwivhulimi ha zwifuwo na zwimela zwa maḓini.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwemukela kuhamba kwaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lokube yimphumelelo Ayovakashela Ngekwemsebenti Bukhosi baseSaudi Arabia mhla ti-15 namhla ti-16 Imphala.
tgt_text: Dziṅwe MoU dze dza sainwa ndi dza thomiwa ha Khoro ya zwa Mabindu yo Ṱanganelaho, tshumisano kha sia ḽa nḓowetshumo dza zwa mmbi na zwa renga thundu na tshumelo khathihi na tshumisano kha sia ḽa ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa tshivhumbeo tsha shango.

src_text: Kulokuvakasha, lamave lamabili asayine tivumelwano tekusebentisana (ema-MoU) leti-17 kumikhakha lehlukahlukene lefana netekulima, tekudvweba, tetimbiwa, temandla lavikela simondzawo, tekuvikela, tekutfutsa netekulima ngetitjalo nangetilwane tasemantini.
tgt_text: Phresidennde vho shumisa madalo avho kha ramba vhoramabindu vha shango ḽa Saudi Arabia uri vha dzhenele muṱangano wa zwa vhubindudzi wa vhuṱanu wa shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe une wa ḓo farwa nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Letinye tivumelwano letisayiniwe timayelana nekusungula Umkhandlu Wetemabhizinisi Lohlangene, kusebentisana kumkhakha wetetimboni tetetimphi netekutsengiselana, kanye nekusebentisana kutesayensi lemayelana nekuhlola ematje nemhlaba.
tgt_text: Shango ḽa Saudi Arabia ndi muvhambadzelani na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe wa vhuvhili nga vhuhulwane kha mashango oṱhe Vhubvaḓuvhakati ḽa dovha hafhu ḽa vha ḽone tshiko tshihulwanesa tsha thundu dzi ṱunḓwaho kha dzingu ḽoṱhe.

src_text: Mengameli usebentise lokuvakasha kumema bosomabhizinisi baseSaudi Arabia kutsi bete eNingizimu Afrika kulenkhomfa yesihlanu Yekutjala timali letawubanjwa ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha dzitshaka vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili ho itisa uri hu vhe na masiandaitwa avhuḓi kha maitele zwa mbambadzo na vhubindudzi.

src_text: I-Saudi Arabia ingumlingani weNingizimu Afrika wesibili ngebukhulu kutekuhwebelana kulesigodzi saseMphumalanga Lemaphakatsi futsi ihamba embili ekutsengeni tintfo letibuya kulesigodzi.
Budlelwane betemave emhlaba emkhatsini walamave lamabili bente kutsi kube nemtselela lomuhle kutekuhwebelana netelutjalomali..   Kutjala Timali Kusakhiwonchanti.
tgt_text: Vhubindudzi kha zwa themamveledziso.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kusungulwe imboni lesezingeni lemhlaba lekhicita iplasitiki lekutawentiwa yimboni lehamba embili emhlabeni, i-ALPLA Group, eLanseria eGauteng.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelo ya thomiwa ha ḽimaga ḽa maimo nṱha ḽa bveledza puḽasitiki nga vhamagi vha puḽasitiki vha ḓivheaho ḽifhasini vha ḓivhiwaho sa ALPLA Group, fhaḽa Lanseria kha ḽa Gauteng.

src_text: Loku kucinisa kutibophelela kwaMengameli Ramaphosa ekubekeni kutfutfukisa sakhiwonchanti njengendlela yekuvuselela kukhulisa umnotfo neyekukhulisa ematfuba emisebenti..   Lolutjalomali lolubita imali letigidzi leti-50 temadola aseMelika lufaka ligalelo lelimcoka kuloluhlelo lolukhulu lwekwakhiwa kwelidolobha i-Lanseria Smart City lolutawuhambisa embili kusimama kwenta imikhicito lemisha ngetintfo lesetilahliwe kanye nekwakha kuphindze futsi kusekelwe ematfuba emisebenti lenge-.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwo engedza vhuḓiimiseli ha Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ha vhea zwa mveledziso ya themamveledziso sa tshone tshithu tshi ṱuṱuwedzaho ikonomi khathihi na engedza sikwa ha mishumo..   Uvhu vhubindudzi vhu linganaho US$50 miḽioni vhu ḓo shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha pulane khulwane ya Lanseria Smart City ine ya ḓo ita uri zwithu zwi tshimbile nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na vusulusa hafhu zwithu zwo no shumaho hu tshi katelwa na sika mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu Iinganaho.

src_text: Lokunye lokutawuba khona luhlelo lwekucecesha bafundzi labange-36 babe bonjiniyela bemishini yebucwepheshe nekuba bocwepheshe bekwenta imikhicito lemisha ngetintfo lesetilahliwe be-ALPLA Group leyenta umsebenti kuso sonkhe sigodzi lesingaseningizimu kwe-Afrika.
tgt_text: Nga ngomu henefho ho katelwa na mbekanyamushumo ya vhugudisamishumo kha vhainzhiniere vha zwa thekiniki na lugisa vha linganaho 36 khathihi na vhorathekiniki vha zwa vusulusa hafhu zwithu zwo no shumaho ya mishumo ya vha khamphani ya ALPLA Group mona na mashango tshipembe ha Afrika.

src_text: Loluhlelo lwekuceceshwa ufundza lutawucala ngemnyaka we-2023, lapho khona bafundzi labatawucala kuceceshwa laba-12 baseNingizimu Afrika batawutsatfwa emimangweni yakuleyondzawo.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa vhugudisamushumo ḓo thoma nga ṅwaha wa 2023, hune vhagudi vha mishumo vha thoma vha Afrika Tshipembe vha linganaho 12 vha ḓo vha vha tshi bva kha zwitshavha zwapo..   Zwa migodi siho mulayoni.

src_text: Kumbiwa kwetimbiwa lokungekho emtsetfweni.
tgt_text: Zwa migodo siho mulayoni zwi vhaisa zwitshavha khathihi na ikonomi, nahone zwi fhedza nga ita uri hu vhe na ndozwo ya mbuelo kha muvhuso khathihi na kha sekhithara ya zwa migodi..   Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa dzhiiwa ha muvhuli wa zwiṱhavhane khathihi na fariwa ha vhahumbulelwa vha swikaho 20 vhane vha ṱumanywa na zwiito zwa bwa migodi zwi siho mulayoni nga tshifhinga tsha fulo ḽe ḽa vha hone kha mulonga wa mugodi wa fhaḽa Stilfontein vunḓuni ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela.

src_text: Kumbiwa kwetimbiwa lokungekho emtsetfweni kulimata imimango netemnotfo, futsi kubanga kutsi kulahleke imalingena kuhulumende nakumkhakha wetetimayini.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha bvele phanḓa na shumisana na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo itela vhona uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa kha mafulo u lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga ḓaho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokutfolakala kwetibhamu letinengi letingekho emtsetfweni nekuboshwa kwebasolwa labange-20 labatsintsekako kulokumbiwa kwetimbiwa letingekho emtsetfweni ngalesikhatsi kwentiwa luphenyo eStilfontein eNyakatfo Nshonalanga.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo rumela mulaedza wo khwaṱhaho wa uri vhugevhenga nangoho vhu badeli, khathihi na uri zwigevhenga zwi ḓo farwa nahone zwa dovha zwa sengiswa hu si na nyofho kana dzhia sia..   Fulufulu.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icela bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi bachubeke basebentisane nema-ejensi etemtsetfo kucinisekisa kutsi kuba nemphumelelo emisebentini yekulwa nebugebengu esikhatsini lesitako.
tgt_text: Eskom kha ḓi tou bva saina thendelano dza ḽisi ya miṅwaha ya 30 na vhabindudzi vha mveledziso ya muḓagasi vho ḓiimisaho nga vhoṱhe vha swikaho vhaṋa dza fhaṱa fhethu huswa ha bveledza fulufulu ḽo kunaho fhaḽa kha tshiṱitshi tsha Majuba na tsha Tutuka tshi re fhaḽa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Loku kutawutfumela umlayeto lonemandla wekutsi bugebengu abukhokheli, nekutsi tigebengu titawubanjwa bese tiyashushiswa ngaphandle kwekusaba noma kwekuvuna luhlangotsi.
tgt_text: Hedzi ḽisi dza mavu dzi ḓo kunga vhubindudzi vhune ha khou humbulelwa ḓo swika henefha kha R40 biḽioni.

src_text: Temandla.
tgt_text: Avha vhabindudzi vhaṋa, vhane vha vha vha ha HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group na Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa, vha ḓo engedza 2 000 megawatts kha sisteme ya muḓagasi ya lushaka.

src_text: I-Eskom isandza kusayina tivumelwano tekucashisa teminyaka lenge-30 nebatjali timali labakhicita gezi labatimele labane kute bakhe umkhicito wemtsamo lomusha wetemandla langabulali simondzawo etiteshini iMajuba neTutuka eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Uvhu vhukoni vhuswa ha bveledza muḓagasi vhu khou lavhelelwa uri vhu ḓo ṱumanywa na sisteme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi kha tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha miṅwedzi ya 24 ya kha ya 36 bva musi ho no tevhedzwa milayo yoṱhe ya zwa thendelano dza zwa masheleni khathihi na dziṅwe thendelano dza zwa milayo ya nga ha mupo, kukhethekanyelwe kwa mavu ya nga kushumisele kwao na miṅwe milayo yo teaho.

src_text: Lokucashiswa kwalomhlaba kutawuheha lutjalomali lolulinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi letinge-R..   Labatjalimali labane –i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – batawungeta lokungenani ema-megawatts la-2000 kulegridi yagezi wavelonkhe..   Lomkhicito wemtsamo lomusha kulindzeleke kutsi uchunywe kugridi yavelonkhe esikhatsini lesisemkhatsini kwetinyanga letinge-24 kuya kuletinge-36 kusuka ngembi kwekuvalwa kwetetimali, lokutawuya ngekugunyatwa ngumtsetfo wetesimondzawo, wekuhlelwa kwemhlaba kanye nangalokunye kuvumeleka kwemitsetfo..   Kutfolakala kwekudla.
Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela kungenisa Ingcungcutsela ye-Agri SA yemnyaka we-2022 ePitoli mhla ti-14 Imphala 2022 ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Kulima Eveni Lakitsi”.
tgt_text: Mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa.

src_text: LeNgcungcutsela yacocisana mayelana netintfo letifana nekwenta kutsi luhlelo lolukhulu lwetekulima lusebentele balimi bakuleli; sakhiwonchanti lesisimeme nekudla lokulinywa kulendzawo; kwenta simondzawo sakuleli sikhone kumelana nekukhicita kudla kwalapha kuleli esikhatsini lesitako; nekukhulisa emandla ebalimi bakuleli kute bakhone kwenta imikhicito yetintfo letilinywa lapha kuleli lakitsi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Guvhangano ḽa vha ha Agri SA ḽa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 13 na ḽa 14 Tshimedzi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U lima fhano hayani”.

src_text: Kuchubeka nekubeka embili kutfolakala kwekudla, Ikhabhinethi futsi iyakwemukela kwetfulwa kwesikhungo savelonkhe lesivimbela magciwane labanga tifo letitsatselanako i-National Biosecurity Hub, ngaphasi kweluhlelo lwe-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, lokwentiwe Litiko Letesayensi Nekucamba kanye Neluhlelo Lwekusebentisana, libambisene neYunivesithi yasePitoli.
tgt_text: Guvhangano iḽi ḽo amba nga ha mafhungo fanaho na ita uri pulane khulwane dza zwa vhulimi dzi thome shumela vhalimi vha fhano hayani; themamveledziso ya tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa zwiḽiwa zwo liṅwaho fhano hayani ita uri vhupo honoho ha fhethu afho vhu tsireledzee lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa yapo yo livhaho kha vhumatshelo khathihi na khwaṱhisa vhukoni ha vhabveledzi vha zwiḽiwa ha shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi zwo ṱavhiwaho fhano hayani..   Sa nḓila ya dovha hafhu dzhiela nṱha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa, Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thomiwa ha Senthara ya Mveledziso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Lushaka nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhushaka ha Tshandukiso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Muhasho wa Saentsi na Tshandukiso vha tshi shumisana na vha Yunivesithi ya Pretoria.

src_text: Lesikhungo sitawusekela kuvikela, kunciphisa nekulawula tifo tetitjalo netetilwane, letitawuba neligalelo ekukhuliseni kukhicitwa kwekudla, ekutfolakaleni kwekudla kanye nentfutfuko lesimeme yetindzawo tasemaphandleni   Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Senthara iyi ḓo tikedza zwa thivhelwa fhungudzwa na ndangulo ya malwadze zwiliṅwa na zwifuwo, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo shela mulenzhe kha engedzea ha mveledziso, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa khathihi na mveledziso ya vhupo ha mahayani ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Kusayinwa Kwemculu Wekusabalalisa Lubumbano Lwemave Ase-Afrika (i-AU).
tgt_text: Tsaino ya Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ya Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa ePhalamnde kweMculu we-AU lomayelana Nekutiphatsa Netimiso Tekusabalalisa, Kuphatfwa Kwendzawo Yasekhaya Nekutfutfukiswa Kwayo Kute Ucinisekiswe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa kha Phaḽamennde ha Thendelanomviswa ya AU ya nga ha Milayo na Maitele Phaḓaladzo, Muvhuso Wapo na Mveledziso Yapo uri sainiwe.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika isayine lomculu ngenyanga yeNgci.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina iyi thendelanomviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.

src_text: Umculu Wekusabalalisa unika onkhe emave langemalunga inchubomgomo leyinkhombandlela lemayelana nekusabalalisa emandla nemisebenti kusukela kuhulumende wavelonkhe kuya kuletinye tinhlaka tahulumende.
tgt_text: Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ṋetshedza muhanga kha mashango oṱhe ane vha miraḓo une wa vha ḽiṅwalo ḽi sumbedzaho nḓila nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na mishumo bva kha mivhuso ya vhukati ya kha maṅwe masia muvhuso.

src_text: Lomculu ukhuluma kakhulu ngekusabalalisa emandla ekuphatsa nemisebenti, ngenchubomgomo lemayelana nekuphatsa bohulumende basekhaya kanye nangekutfutfukisa indzawo yasekhaya..   Umkhandlu Wemave Emhlaba Wetekuphepha Kutetitimela Wemnyaka we-32 (i-IRSC).
tgt_text: Iyi Thendelanomviswa ambesa nga maanḓa nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na vhuḓifhinduleli, muhanga wa mavhusele apo khathihi na mveledziso yapo..   Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa Khoro ya zwa Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ya Dzitshaka (IRSC) wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi ubanjelwe kuleli umhlangano Wemnyaka We-IRSC eJozi kusuka mhla lu-1 kuya kumhla ti-6 Imphala 2023 ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Kubumba kabusha tetitimela kuloMhlaba lote siciniseko.”.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa IRSC wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 1 swika ḽa 6 Tshimedzi 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U fhaṱa hafhu zwiporo nga huswa kha Ḽifhasi ḽi sa fulufhedzisi”.

src_text: I-IRSC iyinkhundla yemave emhlaba lehlanganisa bocwepheshe betekuphepha kutetitimela labavela kuwo onkhe emave emhlaba kute babelane ngelwati kute kutfutfukiswe tekuphepha kutetitimela..   Njengelilunga le-IRSC, Umlawuli WaseNingizimu Afrika Wetekuphepha Kutetitimela lomcimbi wagcina kusingatsa lenkhundla kuleli ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: IRSC ndi muṱangano wa dzitshaka une wa kuvhanganya vhaḓivhi vha zwa vhutsireledzi ha zwiporo bva kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe uri vha kovhane nḓivho hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza vhutsireledzi kha zwiporo..   Sa muraḓo wa IRSC, vha Vhulangi ha Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ha Afrika Tshipembe vho fara muṱangano uyu lwa fhedzisela nga ṅwaha wa.
Luṱa lwa 2 lwa Mvetamveto ya Pulane ya Themamveledziso ya Lushaka ya 2050 (NIP 2050).

src_text: Luhlaka Lweluhlelo Lwesakhiwonchanti Savelonkhe leti-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Sigaba se-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ganḓiswa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso ha mvetamveto ya Luṱa lwa 2 lwa NIP 2050 hu tshi itelwa zwa vhukwamani na miraḓo ya tshitshavha.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma kutsi kushicilelwe kumiculu yahulumende luhlaka lwe-NIP 2050 yeSigaba-2 kute kucociswane ngalo nemmango.
tgt_text: Pulane iyi sumbedzisa nḓila kha zwa khwaṱhiswa na engedzwa ha thandela dza muvhuso dzo ṱanganelaho nahone dza ndeme..   Lu dovha hafhu lwa ṱalusa thandela dza ndeme dza zwa vhudzulo ha vhathu; muḓagasi wa ha masipala; maḓi; mathukhwi omaho; vhuendi ha hwala vhaṋameli; themamveledziso ya pfunzo na mutakalo; themamveledziso ya didzhithala, vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.

src_text: Loluhlelo lunika sicondziso sekukhulisa nesekungeta imiklamo lehlanganisiwe yendlelalisu lahulumende..   Loluhlaka libuka lemiklamo yendlelalisu nemigomo kutekuhlaliswa kwebantfu; kugezi wamasipala; kutemanti; kunkhukhuma; kutigitjelwa temmango; kutemfundvo; nakusakhiwonchanti setemphilo, kusakhiwonchanti lesidijithali, nakubugebengu nenkhohlakalo..     Indlela loluhlelo lwakheke ngayo inika umbono lomayelana nendzawo lekufuneka isetjentwe, iniketa luhlolo lwesimo samanje, ichaza timo letimcoka lekufuneka tiphumelele futsi iyasho kutsi yini lekufuneka yenteke kute kupheleliswe lombono.
tgt_text: Tshivhumbeo tsha pulane tshi ṋetshedza bono ḽa masia ane khou tea lavheleswa khao, tsha dovha hafhu tsha ṋetshedza tsenguluso ya tshiimo tsha zwino, tsha bvisela khagala nyimele dza ndeme dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu vhe na shuma zwavhuḓi khathihi na sumbedzisa zwine zwa tea itwa itela swikela bono ḽeneḽo.

src_text: Ihlongota inchubo yekuphumelelisa lekufuneka itsatfwe kulomjikeleto weluhlelo lwekusebenta lweminyaka lemitsatfu..   Luhlaka Lwavelonkhe Lwekufezekisa Kwenta Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yebucwephesha .
tgt_text: Tshi dovha hafhu tsha dzinginya maitele u thoma shumiswa ha pulane iyi ane ḓo itwa nga vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miraru ya pulane ya kushumele..   Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ilivumile loLuhlaka Lwavelonkhe Lwekufezekisa Kwenta Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yetebuchwephesha.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa thoma shuma ha Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lwashicilelwa kute kucociswane ngalo nemmango ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu wo anḓadzwa hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti luniketa imigomo lenetinsika letisihlanu letimayelana nekungenelela kute kwentiwe Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yetebucwephesha.
tgt_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza thikho ṱhanu dza nga ha maga u ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza mishumogudwa.

src_text: Letinsika tifaka ekhatsi loko lekufuneka kwentiwe ngembi kwekucashwa nekukhetfwa kuTemisebenti Yahulumende; kuchazelwa ngemsebenti nekungeniswa kahle kancane kancane kute ube yincenye yebasebenti ngalokuphelele; kuhlela nendlela yekulawula kwenta umsebenti kwaloyo naloyo muntfu; kuchubeka nekufundza nekutfutfukiswa lokusezingeni lebucwepheshe, kanye nekukhula kulomsebenti lowentako kanye netigameko temsebenti..   Tingucuko Kutimo Tekucashwa Kwebacondzisi Jikelele (ba-DG).
tgt_text: Thikho idzi dzi katela maitele ane vha u ranga musi hu tshi ṱoḓa kungwa vhashumi khathihi na u nanga vhashumi vho teaho henefho kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso pfumbudzwa na ṱanganyiswa na vhaṅwe vhashumi; ndangulo ya vhupulani na mashumele; vhugudi vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa, khathihi na mveledziso ya mishumogudwa hu tshi katelwa aluwa kha zwa mishumo khathihi na zwiwo zwa mishumo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile umbiko lohlongota kutsi kube netindlela tekukhulisa emandla nemakhono abo-DG kuTemisebenti Yahulumende.
tgt_text: Tshanduko kha nyimele dza kutholelwe kwa Vhalangi Vhahulwane (DGs).

src_text: Lombiko ute netiphakamiso letimbalwa, letifaka ekhatsi sikhatsi sabo-DG sekuhlala kulowo msebenti kanye nekulawula ligunya lebalinikwe Sigungu Lesiphetse liye kulabo lababukene wekuphendvula..   Lombiko futsi uhlongote kutsi DG weLihhovisi laMengameli anikwe emandla ekuba Yinhloko Yetemisebenti Yahulumende.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo une wa khou dzinginya maga u khwaṱhisa vhukoni na zwikili zwa dziDG kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso.

src_text: Etifundzeni, lomsebenti utawentiwa bo-DG labasemahhovisini aboNdvunankhulu.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wo ṋetshedza makumedzwa fhambanaho, hu tshi katelwa na themo ya shuma ya dziDG khathihi na ndangulo ya vhurumelwa nga vha Khorotshitumbe ya muvhuso kha vhaofisiri vho ṋewaho maanḓa..   Muvhigo uyu dovha hafhu wa dzinginya uri DG Ofisini ya Phresidennde ḓo ḓivhiwa sa Ṱhoho ya Ndangulo ya Muvhuso.

src_text: Lombiko futsi uhlongote tindlela letitawulandzelwa matiko ekulawuleni emakhontileka abo-DG.
tgt_text: Kha mavunḓu, hoyu mushumo ḓo ṋetshedzwa kha dziDG kha ofisi dza Vhalangavunḓu.
Muvhigo wo dovha hafhu wa dzinginya maga u eletshedza mihasho nga ha kulangelwe kwa khonṱhiraka dza dziDG.

src_text: Luhlelo Lolubuyeketiwe Lwekulawula Kusebenta Kwabo-DG lusabuyeketwa kute lucondzaniswe naletingucuko lekuvunyelwene ngato..   Indvuna Lebambile Yetemisebenti Yahulumende Netekuphatsa, Umnu.
tgt_text: Sisteme ya Ndangulo ya Mashumele dziDG yo senguluswaho khou dovha ya senguluswa hafhu nga huswa itela uri elane na tshanduko dzo tendelwaho.

src_text: Thulas Nxesi, utawubamba umhlangano webetindzaba kuleliviki lelitako kute achaze ngaLenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekwenta Umsebenti letawenta kube neBucwephesha Kutemisebenti Yahulumende iphindze futsi ichaze ngaletingucuko lekuvunyelwene ngato kuletimo tekusebenta kwebo-DG.
tgt_text: Minisṱa vha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo vho tou Farelaho, Vho Thulas Nxesi, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa vhoramafhungo vhege ḓaho une khawo vha ḓo bvisela khagala Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka wo livhiswaho kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa khathihi na bvisela khagala tshanduko dzo tendelwaho dza nga ha nyimele dza shuma dza dziDG.
Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vhane vha vha na Vhuholefhali (WPRPD) wa ṅwaha wa 2020-.

src_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Walosekwentiwe Ngekufezekiswa Kwemtsetfo Lohlongotwako Mayelana Nemalungelo Ebantfu Labanekukhubateka (i-WPRPD) Wemnyaka We-2020-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD, ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho maswamaswa nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile Umbiko Wesihlanu Lomayena Nalosekwentekiwe Ekufezekisweni kwe-WPRPD, leniketa timemetelo ngekusetjentiswa kwe-WPRPD.
tgt_text: Muvhigo katela na vhupfiwa bva kha mihasho ya muvhuso wa lushaka na wa mavunḓu dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala zwiswa nga ha thoma shuma ha mbekanyamaitele ine ya katela mikovho ya migaganyagwama..   Muvhigo wa thoma wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha wo anḓadzwa nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Lombiko ufaka ekhatsi tetfulo letiniketwe ngematiko ahulumende wavelonkhe newesifundza.
tgt_text: Muvhigo wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo ṱanganedzwa uri ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso nahone wa dovha wa anḓadzwa nga vha Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali..   Khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha Thendelano dza nga ha fheliswa ha Zwiito zwoṱhe zwa Khethululo Itelwaho Vhafumakadzi (CEDAW).

src_text: Uniketa timemetelo letimayelana nekusetjentiswa kwetinchubomgomo letifaka ekhatsi kwesabelomali.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha CEDAW itela uri sainiwe.
Khwiniso idzi dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsho engedzwaho tsha miṱangano ya komiti ine ya shuma na mivhigo ya mashango ane vha miraḓo.

src_text: Umbiko wekucala walosekwentiwe wemnyaka washicilelwa ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina hedzi thendelano nga ṅwaha wa 1993 he ḽa dovha ḽa tendelana nadzo nga ṅwedzi wa Nyendavhusiku.

src_text: Lombiko lona wesihlanu uvunyiwe kutsi ufakwe kugazethi nekutsi ushicilelwe Litiko Labomake, Lelusha Nelebantfu Labanekukhubateka kutsi ushicilelwe kumiculu yahulumende.
tgt_text: Uhu ṋetshedzwa hadzo Phalamenndeni ndi hune ha khou lingedza ṱumanya thendelano dze na dzone ha tendelanwa khadzo tshifhingani tsho fhelaho na khwiniso idzi dza Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha thendelano.
Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dza nga ha Ṱanganedzwa ha Ndalukano dza Pfunzo dza Nṱha .

src_text: Kuchitjelwa kweMbhalo 20(1) Wenhlangano Yekucedza Tonkhe tinhlobo Telubandlululo Lolubhekiswe Kubomake (i-CEDAW).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dza nga ha Ṱanganedzwa ha Ndalukano dza Pfunzo dza Nṱha itela uri hu vhe na tendelana.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kutsi kutfunyelwe ePhalamnede sichibelo seMbhalo 20(1) se-CEDAW kute kutsi isayinwe.
tgt_text: Musi ho no vha na tendelana khadzo, dzi ḓo rumelwa kha vha Khethekanyo ya zwa Pfunzo, Saintsi na Mvelele ya vha Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) khathihi na ḓo ita uri ngeno hayani dzi shume nga kha Mulayo wa Muhanga wa Ndalukano wa Lushaka, wa ṅwaha wa 2008 (Mulayo 67 wa 2008).

src_text: Lesichibelo sibonelela kutsi kungetwe sikhatsi semihlangano yelikomidi lelisebenta ngemibiko yemave langemalunga..   INingizimu Afrika isayine lesivumelwano ngemnyaka we-1993 yabese iyasicinisekisa ngeNgongoni ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Thendelano dza Ḽifhasi dzi bveledza milayo ya ḽifhasi ya ṱanganedzwa ha ndalukano dza pfunzo dza nṱha nga nḓila linganaho re khagala nahone si na khethululo.

src_text: Lokutfunyelwa kwaso ePhalamende kuhlose kutsi kulungiswe lesivumelwano sakudzala lesacinisekiswa kute sibe nesichibelo kuMbhalo 20(1) walesivumelwano..  Sivumelwane Semhlaba Sekutsi Kuvunyelwe Ticu Temfundvo Letimayelana Netemfundvo Lephakeme.
tgt_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza tendela hu tshi vha na ṱanganedzwa ha ndalukano dza mashango nnḓa kha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya UN swikaho humiselwa murahu ha khwiniso dza Tsumbamaitele dza Miraḓo ya Khabinethe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivume kutsi kutfunyelwe ePhalamende Sivumelwane kutsi Kuvunyelwe Ticu Temfundvo Letimayelana Netemfundvo Lephakeme kute ticinisekiswe.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza nḓivhadzo ye ya ḓo itwa nga Ofisi ya Phresidennde nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 17 Tshimedzi 2022 ya humisela murahu ha khwiniso dze dza itwa kha Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe, ine ya dovha hafhu ya ḓivhiwa sa Bugupfarwa ya Dziminisṱa, ya ṅwaha wa..   Khwiniso hedzi dze dza ḓo itwa nga ṅwedzi wa Lambamai 2022 dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha engedza vhaṅwe vhashumi kha dziṅwe dza dziofisi dza Dziminisṱa vhane vha vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha muhasho fhiraho muthihi.

src_text: Uma seticinisekisiwe titawutfunyelwa Kunhlangano Yelubumbano Lwemave Emhlaba (i-UN) Yetemfundvo, Tesayensi Neyetemasiko bese iyasetjentiswa lapha ekhaya ngekulandzela Umtsetfo Wenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yeticu, yemnyaka we-2008 (Umtsetfo 67 wemnyaka we-2008)..   Lomhlangano Wemhlaba usungula timiso temhlaba kute kungabi nekuvuna luhlangotsi, kube sobala nekutsi kube nekuvumeleka lokungabandlululi kweticu Temfundvo Lephakeme.
tgt_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza lavhelela uri Muvhuso dzhie vhuḓifhinduleli ho fhelelaho ha zwa masheleni ane elana na ṋetshedzwa ha maḓi na muḓagasi kha madzulo tshiofisi ane avho miraḓo ya khabinethe vha dzula khao..     Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha sa farea zwavhuḓi ha vhadzulapo he ya fhedza nga dzhia tsheo ya dovha shandukisa hafhu iyo Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe.

src_text: Uvumela kutsi ticu temave angaphandle tivumeleke kumave lamalunga e-UN la-.
tgt_text: Haya maitele ḓo tshimbidzwa nga tshiimiswa tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe nahone musi tshi tou khunyeledzwa, iyo tsumbamaitele ya hone vho ḓo wanala na kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo ine ya vha: www.dpsa.gov.za.
