src_text: Gezi.
tgt_text: Muḓagasi .

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yemukele kwetfulwa kwesikhwamamali i-Resource Mobilisation Fund (i-RMF) yiNdvuna yeTagezi letinte Ehhovisi LaMengameli, Dkt.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Kuvhanganya Zwiko (RMF) nga Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi ngomu Ofisini ya Phresidennde, Dokotela Vho Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.

src_text: Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.
tgt_text: Tshumisano iyi ya vhukati ha muvhuso na dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha zwa Mabindu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ndi ine yo livhiswa kha lingedza ṋetshedza zwiko na nḓivho itela uri muvhuso kone thoma shumisa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho Pulane ya shuma ya nga ha Fulufulu ye ya ḓivhadzwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwana 2022 na nga tshifhinga tsha musi vha tshi khou ṋetshedza Mulaedza wavho wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Lushaka  (SoNA) wa ṅwaha wa 2023 sa yone tsumbo ya tshumisano yo khwaṱhaho ya zwa matshilisano khathihi na bvela phanḓa na vha na fulufhelo kha shango ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Lolubanjiswano lolusemkhatsini wahulumende ne-Business Unity South Africa luhlose kuniketa tinsita nabocwepheshe kute kutsi uhulumende akwati kuphumelelisa Luhlelo Lwekusebenta Kwetemandla Agezi ngemphumelelo, lolumenyetelwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngaKholwane 2022 kanye neNkhululumo yaMengameli Yebunjalo Belive (i-SoNA) yanga-2023, kwenta sibonelo, sekwenta sivumelwane nemmango ngalokuyimphumelelo kanye nekutetsemba eNingizimu Afrika lokuchubekako..     Le-RMF itawufukula umsebenti weLikomidi Letetinhlekelele Yavelonkhe Yetemandla Agezi lizuze umgomo walo wekucedza locimicimi lesibukene nawo lapha eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Hetshi tshikwama tsha RMF tshi ḓo thusa vhukuma kha mushumo wa Komiti ya Lushaka ya Thaidzo dza zwa Fulufulu uri kone swikela tshipikwa tshayo tsha fhelisa zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana fhano Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi  icele bonkhe badlalindzima kutsi bafake ligalelo ekuphunyelelisweni kweLuhlelo Lwekusebenta Lwetemandla Agezi kute kutsi kubukwane nekulahlekelwa lokukhulu lokwenteka kutemnotfo ngenca yalocimicimi..     Ikhabhinethi yemukele kukhatsateka lokusandza kuvetwa yi-S&P Global Ratings kwekutsi kukhula kwemnotfo waseNingizimu Afrika ubukene nekucindzeteleka lokukhulako lokuvela etinkingeni tesakhiwonchanti, ikakhulukati kushoda lokukhulu kwagezi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhashelamulenzhe vhoṱhe uri vha shele mulenzhe kha ndingedzo dza thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya shuma ya zwa Fulufulu itela uri ri kone lwa na masiandaitwa vhavhaho ane izwo zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana zwa vha nao kha ikonomi.

src_text: Kute kulungiswe lensayeya, hulumende ucale luchungechunge lwetinyatselo letingujucu, letifaka ekhatsi kuciniswa kwetimali, tingucuko letisheshako kutemnotfo kanye netinyatselo letiphutfumako lokuhloswe ngato kunciphisa locimicimi ngesikhatsi lesincane kanye nekugucula lomkhakha ngetingucuko tetimakethe kute kutsi babe nagezi sikhatsi lesidze.

Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela kuvulwa kwekufakwa kweticelo tekuniketela ngagezi lomamegawatsi (ema-MW) lange-513 lolondvolotwa ngemabhethri njengencenye yekucinisa kuphendvula kwetfu kuletinsayeya temandla agezi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha vhilahedzwa ha zwenezwino he ha bviselwa khagala nga vha S&P Global Ratings musi vha tshi sumbedzisa uri nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khou livhana na mutsiko une wa khou endelela bva kha vhukonḓi ha zwa thememveledziso, nga maanḓa ṱhahelelo yo kalulaho ya muḓagasi itela tandulula khaedzu iyi, muvhuso wo no mbo ḓi thoma ḓidzhenisa kha maga fhambanaho nahone khwaṱhaho, ane khao ha katelwa fhungudza ṱhahelelo ya masheleni na zwikolodo, tshanduko dza tshihaḓu dza zwa ikonomi khathihi na maga tshihaḓu livhiswaho kha fhungudza zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana kha tshifhinga tshipfufhi khathihi na shandukisa sekhithara nga bveledza tshanduko kha zwa mimaraga itela swikela nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Lusuku lwekuvalwa kungeniswa kweticelo ngumhla ti-5 Kholwane 2023 ngensimbi ye-17:00 entsambama futsi bonkhe bantfu labanenshisekelo  bangagcwalisa lifomu lekubhalisa leliku-inthanethi ku: www.ipp-storage.co.za.
Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela sincumo lesentiwe Litiko Letemahlatsi, Tekudweba Netemvelo, Mk.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza zwa vulwa ha luṱa lwa dzhenela thengophikhisano ya beṱiri dza vhubveledzi ha fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho dza vhuhulu vhu linganaho 513 megawatts (MW) sa tshipiḓa tsha khwaṱhisa maga ane ra khou dzhia kha tandulula khaedu dza zwa fulufulu.

src_text: Barbara Creecy, kutsi anike i-Eskom umkhumulasibopho kulenchubo lendze ledzingekako kute kuchitjelwe Ilayisensi yayo yeKubhunyiselwa Kwemhlaba.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa vala rumela thengophikhisano idzo ndi ḽa 5 Fulwana 2023 nga awara ya 17:00 nahone zwiimiswa zwoṱhe zwine zwa vha na dzangalelo zwi tea ḓadza fomo ya ḓiṅwalisa ya eḽekhiṱhironiki nga inthanethe ine ya wanala kha : www.ipp-storage.co.za.

src_text: Ngekuya kwe-Eskom, lomkhumulasibopho utawuyenta ikhone kuphumelelisa sisombululo sesikhashana sekumosheka kweSiphehligezi Ikusile ngeLweti 2023 futsi loko-ke kutawenta lesiphehligezi kutsi sale sicala kuphehla umtsamo wemamegawatsi (ema-MW) lange-2 100 lokutawunciphisa kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ibe setfubeni lelibi lekungena esigabeni sesibili sacimicimi..     Siteleka Senhlangano yeTebasebenti Labahlangane beTemfundvo, Tetemphilo (i-NEHAWU).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo ya Minisṱa wa Maḓaka, Vhufuwakhovhe na zwa Mupo, Mufumakadzi Vho Barbara Creecy, ya ṋea vha ha Eskom thendelo ya sa tea tevhedza maitele dzhiaho tshifhinga tshilapfu ane tea tevhelwa musi vha tshi ṱoḓa khwinifhadza Ḽaisentsi yavho ya Muhasaladzo kha Mupo ya nga vha Eskom, thendelo iyi ya ita ngauralo ḓo ita uri vha kone thoma shumisa thandululo dza tshifhinganyana kha tshinyalelo ye ya itea fhaḽa kha Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile nga ṅwedzi wa Lara 2023 lune zwa vho ḓo ita uri tshiṱitshi itshi tsha muḓagasi tshi kone dovha hafhu bvela phanḓa na vhubveledzi hatsho ha muḓagasi  wa 2 100 megawatts (MW) une wa ḓo thusa kha fhungudza thaidzo ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ya zwa khaulwa ha muḓagsi nga sielisana nga nṱha mbili..     Tshiṱereke tsha vha Mbumbano ya Vhashumi ya Lushaka kha zwa Pfunzo, Mutakalo na dziṅwe Sekhithara dzi Elanaho (NEHAWU).

src_text: Kulesiteleka se-NEHAWU, Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kusayinwa kweSivumelwano Sekusombulula eMkhandlwini Wetekucocisana Ngetemiholo Yebasebenti Bahulumende (i-PSCBC) lesisombulula tingcoco tetemiholo temnyakatimali we-2022/23 nekucedza siteleka kanye nekubuyisela tonkhe tinhlangotsi eMkhandlwini Wekucocisana nekubonisana ngemiholo yemnyaka 2023/..     Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yavakalisa kubonga kwayo kuletinhlangano tebasebenti letisele ku-PSCBC kutsi tichubeke naletingcoco tekubonisana.
tgt_text: Malugana na tshiṱereke tsha NEHAWU, Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa sainwa ha Thendelano ya Miholo fhaḽa kha Khoro ya Matshimbidzele Nyambedzano dza Miholo ya Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso (PSCBC) nga murahu ha vha na thendelano kha nyambedzano dza miholo ya ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/23 lwe zwa kona fhelisa tshiṱereke khathihi na dovha hafhu zwa ṱanganya mahoro oṱhe phanḓa ha Khoro ya Nyambedzano hu tshi itelwa dziṅwe nyambedzano ntswa dza zwa miholo dza ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2023/..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱahisa dzindivhuwo dzayo kha ayo madzangano zwa vhashumi a bvela phanḓa na vha tshipiḓa tsha PSCBC tshi itela bvela phanḓa na nyambedzano.

src_text: Iphindze futsi yakhonkhosela kutinikela kwahulumende kulenchubo yetingcoco nekubonisana, kanye nekusebentisana nabobonkhe badlalindzima kucinisekisa kubaluleka kwekucocisana ngekuhlanganyela kuyavikelwa futsi kuyahlonishwa..     Sifanele sikusho kutsi lomtsetfomgomo wekutsi AKUSETJENTWA, AKUHOLWA utawusebenta ngekushesha futsi kuncutfwa kwemiholo kutawentiwa kuletinyanga letine letitako, njengencenye yeSivumelwane Sekusombulula.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ombedzela vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha maitele nyambedzano khathihi na vha na tshumisano na vhashumisani vhoṱhe vho teaho itela vhona uri ndeme ya nyambedzano dzi katelaho khou tsireledzwa khathihi na ṱhonifhiwa.

src_text: Litiko Letemisebenti Yahulumende Nekuphatsa litawulandzelela ngalokuphelele kuphunyeleliswa kwaletincumo.

Kwengeta, ema-ejensi ekucinisekisa kutfotjelwa kwemtsetfo atawulandzelela tento tebugebengu letentiwe ngesikhatsi salesiteleka, baphatsi labatsintsekako bona batawubukana netento letinyatsele Inkhambo Lenhle Yekutiphatsa yeBasebenti baHulumende.
tgt_text: Ri tea zwi sumbedzisa uri maitele uri SONGO SHUMAHO, HA NGA WANI MUHOLO ḓo mbo ḓi thoma shumiswa na zwenezwo nahone masheleni ayo ḓo kokodzwa vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi miṋa ḓaho sa tshipiḓa tsha Thendelano dza Miholo.
Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Vhulanguli ḓo vha wone une wa ḓo lavhelesa zwa tevhedzwa ha tsheo idzi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho.

src_text: Kuvalwa kwavelonkhe.

Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka ngetimemo tembhikisho letihlelwe kwentiwa ngeMsombuluko, mhla tinge-20 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 futsi itsatsa timemo letinjalo ngekutsi tite sibopho kantsi futsi tibudlabha..     Iklasta yeBulungiswa, Tekuvikela Bugebengu Netekuvikeleka (i-JCPS) ibukene nemsebenti wekucinisekisa kutsi lwephulomtsetfo alubeketelelwa.
tgt_text: Nga nnḓa ha izwo, mazhendedzi zwa mulayo ḓo sala murahu zwiito zwoṱhe zwa vhugevhenga zwe zwa itwa nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu na tshiṱereke ngeno nga thungo vhalangi ya nga fhambana havho vha tshi ḓo sedzesa kha zwiito zwine zwa lwa na Milayo ya Vhuḓifari ha Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso.

src_text: Lolufunomandla lokukhulunywa ngalo lwekucedza cimicimi, tindleko tekuphila letibita kakhulu kanye nelizinga lekweswelakala kwemisebenti leliphakeme Mengameli Ramaphosa wakhuluma ku-SoNA mhla ti-9 Indlovulencane.
Macondzana-ngco nekucedvwa kwacimicimi, Mengameli  ubeke Indvuna yeTagezi, Dkt.
tgt_text: Zwiito zwa Migwalabo ya imisa Tshumelo Dzoṱhe kha Shango.

src_text: Ramokgopa, lobukene-ngco kuphela nekucedza locimicimi.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedzisa kwamea nga khuwelelo dza zwiito zwa gwalaba  zwine zwa khou dzudzanyelwa vha hone nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 20 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 nahone dzhia khuwelelo yo raloho sa zwiito zwa sa londa nahone zwo bvaho..     Vha Tshigwada tsha zwa Vhulamukanyi Thivhela Vhugevhenga na Vhutsireledzi (JCPS) vha khou ḓidzhenisa kha mushumo wa vhona uri hu sa vhe na konḓelelwa ha zwiito zwa nyadza mulayo.

src_text: Kuphunyeleliswa kweMaphuzi Lasihlanu eLuhlelo Lwekusebenta Lwemandla Agezi  luyachutjwa nyalo ngekutimisela lokukhulu futsi Indvuna yeTagezi kulamaviki letako itawumemetela imigomo yekusebenta kwe-Eskom mayelana nekucedza cimicimi..     Ngalokulinganako, Mengameli ku-SoNA yanga-2023 wakhuluma ngetinyatselo lesetibekwe ngabolonina tekubukana nemazinga laphakeme ekweswelakala kwemisebenti kulusha kanye newetindleko tekuphila.
Ngako-ke, lufunomandla lokungulo kuphela lolungulona sisekelo salombhikisho lisu lekususa Mengameli Ramaphosa esihlalweni ngetindlela letingahambisani nemtsetfosisekelo.
tgt_text: Izwo zwine zwa khou dzhiiwa sa dzone mbilo khulwane, zwine zwa vha fheliswa ha maitele u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana, mitengo re nṱhesa ya ṱhoḓea dza misi yoṱhe khathihi na tshikalo tsha shayea ha mishumo tshi re nṱhesa, ndi zwithu zwe zwa ambiwa nga hazwo nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa kha mulaedza wavho wa SoNA nga ḽa 9 Luhuhi.

src_text: Sifuna kwatisa wonkhe umuntfu kutsi KUNTJINTJWA KWEMBUSO NGETINDLELA LETINGASEKELWA NGUMTSETFOSISEKELO ANGEKE KWENTEKE LAPHA ENINGIZIMU AFRIKA.
tgt_text: Kha vhuḓiimiseli havho ha fhelisa maitele u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho thola  Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi, Dokotela Vho Ramokgopa, vhane vha ḓo tou lavhelesana tshoṱhe na zwa fhelisa maitele u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana.

src_text: Nanoma ngubani lonenshisekelo yekuphatsa lelive ufanele kutsi alindze lukhetfo jikelele lwanga-.
tgt_text: Zwa thoma shumiswa ha  Pulane ya shuma ya nga ha Fulufulu ya Nṱha Ṱhanu zwazwino zwi kati lwa tshoṱhe nahone Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi vha ḓo ri dzivhegeni dzi ḓaho, vha ḓivhadza zwipikwa zwa mashumele Eskom zwo livhiswaho kha fhelisa maitele u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana..     Musi zwo ralo, Phresidennde kha mulaedzwa wavho wa  SoNA ya ṅwaha wa 2023, vho amba nga ha maga ane vha hone zwazwino u tandulula thaidzo dza tshikalo tshi re nṱhesa tsha shayea ha mishumo kha vhaswa khathihi na engedzea ha mitengo ya ṱhoḓea dza misi yoṱhe.

src_text: Imitamo yekubanga tibhelu nebuyaluyalu kulelive kutawubukana nemandla emtsetfo.
tgt_text: Ngauralo, mbilo ine ya tou vha tshone tshidziki tshithihi fhedzi tsha heino migwalabo, ndi ndingedzo dza bvisa  Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa tshiduloni hu tshi shumiswa nḓila dzine dza sa tendelane na ndayotewa.

src_text: Sifanele futsi kugcizelela kutsi kute linani lekuklwaya tepolitiki lelifanele kutsi lente bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika bangatinti..     Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yacaphela kuhhema kwemacembu tsite latsi anike iKhabhinethi emalanga lasikhombisa ekuvala tikolwa.
tgt_text: Ri khou tama ḓivhadza avho vhoṱhe uri ZWA SHANDUKISWA HA MUVHUSO HU TSHI SHUMISWA MAITELE ANE SI ANANE NA NDAYOTEWA ZWI NGA ḒO ITEA FHANO AFRIKA TSHIPEMBE.

src_text: Ikhalenda yetikolwa taseNingizimu Afrika tahulumende naletitimele, leyafakwa kugazethi ngeNdlovulenkhulu nga-2022, seyivele ibale umhla tinge-20 Indlovulenkhulu kutsi liholide lesikolwa lelikhetsekile.
tgt_text: Ḽihoro ḽifhio na ḽifhio ḽine ḽa vha na dzangalelo ḽa vhusa ḽino shango, ḽi tea imela dzhenela khetho dza nnyi na nnyi dza ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Bekuvele  kucaca kutsi kunemitamo yekutfola timphumelelo letilula.
tgt_text: Ndingedzo dza vhanga khakhathi na pfudzungule fhano shangoni dzi ḓo lwiwa nadzo lwa mulayo nga nḓila yo fhelelaho.

src_text: Kufanana-ke, nelikhefu letikolwa lelisemkhatsini wemaholidi esive.
tgt_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra zwi bvisela khagala uri hu na zwiito na zwithihi zwa vhuhokoko ha zwa polotiki zwiṋe zwa ḓo ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe nga iṅwe nḓila..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha mafhafhaḓo ane zwiṅwe zwigwada zwa khou amba uri zwo ṋea Khabinethe maḓuvha sumbe uri vale zwikolo.

Khaḽendara ya zwikolo zwa Afrika Tshipembe, zwa muvhuso na zwa phuraivethe, ye ya anḓadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe 2022, yo no ḓi sumbedzisa ḓuvha ḽa 20 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 sa ḓuvha ḽa holodeyi ya zwikolo yo khetheaho.

src_text: Luhlelo Lwelihhovisi LaMengameli Lebuholi Belusha.
tgt_text: Zwo ḓi dzula zwi tshi tou vha khagala uri hu na ndingedzo dza ṱoḓa ḓiita vhafhenyi ngeno zwi songo ralo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kwetfulwa kweLuhlelo Lwelihhovisi Lahulumende Lwebuholi Belusha nguMengameli Ramaphosa mhla ti-10 Indlovulenkhulu 2023, e-Walter Sisulu University, eMthatha, lokwaba sisusa sekusungulwa kweluhlelo lwebudlelwane bayo yonkhe i-Afrika..     Loku kwaba yincenye yeseshini yokucala yeNgcoco yeLusha lwe-Nelson Mandela ngaphasi kwesicubulo lesitsi: “Buholi benkhambo lenhle nalobusemkhatsini wetitukulwane netitukulwane kute kutsi kube ne-Afrika lencono”.
tgt_text: Zwenezwo zwo ḓi ralovho na kha vala ha zwikolo phanḓa ha ḓuvha ḽa holodeyi ya nnyi na nnyi..     Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhurangaphanḓa ha Vhaswa ya Phresidennde.

src_text: Lenkhundla yebuholi emkhatsini wetitukulwane icinisa tivumelwane letikhona tetinhlelo talelivekati kanye netivumelwane letifana ne-Ajenda Yenhlangano Yamave Ase-Afrika yanga-2063, Ishatha Yelusha Yase-Afrika kanye neSivumelwano Sendzawo Yekuhwebelana Ngalokukhululekile Yelivekati Lase-Afrika.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhurangaphanḓa ha Vhaswa ya Phresidennde nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa nga ḽa 10 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023, fhaḽa Yunivesithi ya Walter Sisulu re ḓoroboni ya Mthatha, ye mbekanyamushumo yeneyi ya ita uri hu vhe na thomiwa ha mbekanyamushumo ya vhuthihi ha Pan-African..     Hezwi zwo vhumba tshipiḓa tsha dzulo ḽa rwelwa ṱari ha tshiimiswa tsha Nelson Mandela Youth Dialogue nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Vhurangaphanḓa ha Mikhwa nahone ha vhukati ha mirafho hu tshi itelwa bveledza Afrika ḽa khwine”.

src_text: Sivumelwane seluhlakasimo sekwakhiwa kwetimoto lapha eNingizimu Afrika .
tgt_text: Hetshi tshikhala tsha vhurangaphanḓa ha vhukati ha mirafho ndi tshone tshine tsha khwaṱhisa pulane na thendelano dzine dza vha hone zwazwino mona na dzhango nga angaredza fana na iyo ya Adzhenda ya Mbumbano ya  Afrika ya 2063, Thendelanomviswa ya Vhaswa vha Afrika khathihi na Thendelano dza Vhupo ha Mbambadzo yo Vhofholowaho kha Dzhango ḽa Afrika.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yemukele tindzaba tekutsi inkampani yetimoto i-Stellantis South Africa isayine sivumelwano sekusebentisana neNhlangano Yetekutfutfukiswa Kwetimboni kanye neLitiko Letekuhwebelana, Timboni neKuncintisana kute kutsi kwakhiwe sikhungo lesisha sekukhicita timoto eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Muhanga wa thendelano dza maga mimoḓoro fhano Afrika Tshipembe .

src_text: I-Stellantis itsengisa timoto teluhlobo lwe-Jeep, i-Alfa Romeo, i-Fiat, i-Citroën, i-Opel kanye nelwe-Peugeot eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mafhungo uri khamphani ya maga mimoḓoro ḓivhiwaho sa Stellantis South Africa yo saina memorandamu wa thendelano na vha Koporasi ya Mveledziso ya Nḓowetshumo khathihi na vha Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Phikhisano vha tshi itela fhaṱa tshiimiswa tsha bveledza mimoḓoro miswa fhano Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Budlelwane Lobusemkhatsini WeNingizimu Afrika NeTanzania.
tgt_text: Vha ha Stellantis ndi vhone vhane vha rengisa mimoḓoro ya Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel na Peugeot kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ilwemukele luvakasho lwekuya eNingizimu Afrika ngaLesine, mhla ti-16 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 lwaMengameli Samia Suluhu Hassan wase-United Republic of Tanzania, lobekamenywe ngumlingani wakhe,  Mengameli Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Vhushaka ha shango ḽa Tanzania na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.

src_text: Loluvakasho lulandzela umhlangano weKhomishini Yetindvuna Yalamave YaseNingizimu Afrika neTanzania (i-BNC) lobewubanjelwe ePitoli ngaLesitsatfu, mhla ti-15 Indlovulenkhulu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo Muvhuso kha ḽino ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 16 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 nga Phresidennde Vho Samia Suluhu Hassan vha Riphabuḽiki ya Tanzania, nga murahu ha thambo bva kha mushumisani navho,  Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa.

src_text: Lutawuphindze futsi luhambe embili kuseshini yesibili ye-BNC yeNingizimu Afrika neTanzania, lolwakhiwe ngemakomidi lamane: Letepolitiki neTebuncusa; Tekuvikela Netekuphepha; Temnotfo, neTenhlalakahle neTemasiko.
tgt_text: Madalo aya khou vha hone nga murahu ha Khomishini ya Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa dza Mashango aya Mavhili ane vha Afrika Tshipembe na Tanzania (BNC) ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Pretoria nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 15 Ṱhafamuhwe ḓo dovha hafhu rwela ṱari dzulo ḽa vhuvhili ḽa BNC ya vhukati ha Afrika Tshipembe na Tanzania, ine yo vhumbwa nga komiti nṋa: ya zwa Polotiki na Vhudipuḽomati; Vhupileli na Tsireledzo; Mafhungo zwa Ikonomi, na Mafhungo zwa Matshilisano na Mvelele.

src_text: Kwengeta kulomfelandzawonye nemzabalazo wenkhululeko yaseNingizimu Afrika, iTanzania ingulenye yebalingani betekuhwebelana labakhulu, labahwebelana ngalokuphelele lokusemkhatsini walamave lamabili lokukhuphuke kwesuka kutigidzigidzi leti-R. 89 nga-2021 kwaya kutigidzigidzi leti-R. 71 nga-.
tgt_text: Nga nnḓa ha zwa tikedza haḽo Afrika Tshipembe kha nndwa yaḽo ya lwela mbofholowo, shango ḽa Tanzania ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango ane vha mushumisani muhulwane wa ḽino ḽa Afrika Tshipembe kha vhushaka ha zwa mbambadzo, lwe mbambadzo yoṱhe nga angaredza vhukati ha tshaka idzi mbili, ya engedzea bva kha  89 biḽioni nga ṅwaha wa 2021 swika kha  71 biḽioni nga ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Kunetinkampani taseNingizimu Afrika letingetulu kwe-250 emikhakheni leyehlukene eTanzania.
tgt_text: Hu na khamphani dza fhano Afrika Tshipembe dzi swikaho 250 dzine dza khou shuma kha sekhithara dzo fhambanaho kha ḽa Tanzania.

src_text: Kuhlangana kwe-Heineken ne-Distell.
tgt_text: Ṱhanganyo ya khamphani ya Heineken na ya Distell.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kugunyatwa Sigungu Semincintiswano sekuhlangana kwenkampani yemhlaba lekhicita tjwala yaseYurophu i-Heineken kanye nomkhicizi wetjwala waseNingizimu Afrika i-Distell Group Holdings.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa tendelwa ha ṱhanganyo ya dzitshaka ya khamphani dza vhaingi vha halwa vha Yuropa ḓivhiwaho sa Heineken na vhabveledzi vha halwa vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe, vha ḓivhiwaho sa Distell Group Holdings nga vha Khoro ya Phikhisano.

src_text: Kuhlanganiswa, lokuwukwakha umkhiciti lomkhulu wema-cider kulelive, kweyeme etimeni letinyenti letijatjulelwa ngummango, letifaka ekhatsi kukhutsatwa kwekutfutfukiswa labasita ngemphahla, kugcinwa kwekutsengwa kwempahla yasekhaya, kugcugcutelwa kwekutjalwa kwetimali elucwaningweni nasekutfutfukisweni kanye nekwandza kwemandla ekukhicita akuleli..     Lebhizinisi lehlanganisiwe itawuphindze ikhutsate bunikati bebasebenti ngekusungula luhlelo lwebunikati bemasheya besisebenti iphindze futsi yente kutsi basebenti bamelelwe ebhodini.
tgt_text: Ṱhanganyo iyi, ine ya ḓo vhumba vhabveledzi vhahulwanesa vha halwa vhu ingwaho nga dzhusi ya maapula fhano shangoni, ndi ine ya ḓo tendelwa nga murahu ha musi ho ranga vha na nyimele nnzhi dzine dza ḓo vhuedza vhadzulapo, dzine dza katela ṱuṱuwedza zwa bveledziswa ha vhaṋetshedzi bvela phanḓa na renga zwibveledzwa na tshumelo dzapo ṱuṱuwedzwa ha vhubindudzi kha zwa ṱhoḓisiso na mveledziso khathihi na engedzea ha zwa vhumagi hapo..     Izwi zwiimiswa zwo ṱanganywaho zwi ḓo dovha hafhu zwa ṱuṱuwedza vhuṋe ha bindu nga vhashumi vhaḽo nga bveledza pulane ine ngayo vhashumi vha fhedza vho vha  vhaṋe vha mikovhe khathihi na ṋea vhashumi vhuimeleli kha bodo.

src_text: Kulandzelelwa Kwenchubelembili Yetekuhhamuleka Yetikhukhula Tanga-.
Ikhabhinethi iwemukele umsebenti lowentiwe yiNdvuna yeTekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu, Mk.
tgt_text: Vhulavhelesi ha Mvelaphanḓa kha zwa Ṱhaḓulo ya Miḓalo ya ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Mmamoloko Kubayi kanye neMalunga e-MinMEC yeTekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu wekulandzelela inchubekelembili mayelana nekuhlaliswa kwebantfu kwalomphela kanye nekuhlalisa imindeni lekhahlabetwe tikhukhula tanga-2022 KwaZulu-Natal njengoba lelive lisondzela ekuhlanganeni kwemnyaka wekucala lelive lehlelwa tikhukhula nga-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mushumo we wa itwa nga Minisṱa wa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu,  Mufumakadzi Vho Mmamoloko Kubayi na Miraḓo ya MinMEC ya Muhasho wa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu wa lavhelesa mvelaphanḓa kha zwa sudzuluswa na ṋewa vhudzulo ha tshoṱhe ha miṱa yo kwameaho nga miḓalo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei kha vunḓu ḽa KwaZulu-Natal zwenezwo musi shango ḽi tshi khou swika kha tshifhinga tsha tshihumbudzi tsha thoma tsha tshiwo itshi tou bva tshe tsha wela shango ḽashu..     Mafhungo ane si vhe ngoho nga ha Mbuelo dzine dza wanwa nga Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa.

src_text: Lokungasiwo emaciniso mayelana neTinzuzo teTindvuna neMasekelatindvuna.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedzisa kwamea nga zwa phaḓaladzwa ha mafhungo ane si vhe ngoho hune ha khou bvela phanḓa nga ha Mbuelo dza Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa zwi tshi fhambana na zwiṋe zwa vha zwone kha Tsumbamaitele ya Miraḓo ya Khabinethe, ine ya bvisela khagala mbuelo, tshomedzo dza mushumo na magavhelo Miraḓo ya Khabinethe hu tshi itelwa uri vha kone ita mishumo yavho nga nḓila yavhuḓi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka ngalokuchubekako nalokuhlaneketelwa kabi mayelana neTinzuzo teTindvuna neMasekelatindvuna njengaloku kubekiwe kuNkhombandlela Yetindvuna letiseSigungwini lesiphetse, lobeka tinzuzo, emathulusi ekusebenta kanye netimbasha teMalunga eSigungu kwekwenta imisebenti yawo.
tgt_text: Nzudzanyo dza Vhudzulo ha Dziminisṱa dzi khou vha hone nga murahu ha Thendelano dza 1910 dza musi hu tshi vhumbiwa Mbumbano ya Afrika Tshipembe ine ya vha yone ye ya ta misanda miraru ya shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ine khayo,  Pretoria ya vha yone Musanda wa Shango, Bloemfontein ya vha yone Musanda wa zwa Vhulamukanyi ngeno Cape Town yo vha yone Musanda wa hune ha vha na Phalamennde.

src_text: Kuhlelwa kweTindlu teTindvuna kungumphumela wekuVumelana kwanga-1910 ngesikhatsi kwakhiwa Inhlangano YaseNingizimu Afrika leyancuma lamadolobhanhloko lamatsatfu aseNingizimu Afrika lapho khona iPitoli yaba Sihlalo Sahulumende, iBloemfontein yaba Sihlalo Setebulungiswa, kwabe sekutsi iKapa yona yaba Sihlalo SePhalamende.
tgt_text: Nnḓu idzo dzine ha khou pfi dzi tou vha maḓu vhunzhilinzhili, dzoṱhe dzo rengwa phanḓa ha ṅwaha wa 1994 ngeno hu na uri muvhuso wo ḓaho nga murahu we wa rangwa phanḓa nga African National Congress wo tou ita fhedzi uri hu vhe na ṱhogomelo yo teaho ya nnḓu dzenedzo itela uri dzi dzule dzi na ndeme yo teaho uri dzi kone vhuelwa nga gonya ha ndeme ya ndaka.

src_text: Tonkhe letindlu lekutsiwa titsabatsaba tatfolwa ngembi kwa-1994 futsi hulumende lowalandzela loholwa nguKhongolose usandza kucinisekisa kunakekelwa kwaleto tindzawo tekuhlala kute kutsi kulondvolotwe linani lato futsi ngaleyo ndlela-ke tiyazuza ekukhuphukeni kwelinani letindlu..     Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna lasebentisa totimbili tindlu letiniketwa nguHulumende bakhokha irenti ngendlela lefanako nemalunga ephalamende.

Kungaba yintfo lengakalungi kutsi Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna labasebenta imisebenti lengacinisekisiwe etikhundleni tabo labakuto kwanyalo kute batitfolele tabo tindzawo tekuhlala  babe kodvwa benta umsebenti wesive..     Timoto letisetjentiswa Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna tihambisana kahle kakhulu neLibhukwana  Letindvuna kanye nemkhawulo welinani uncunywa yiNdvuna yeTetimali ngekubonisana neNdvuna Yetemaphoyisa mayelana netekuphepha.
tgt_text: Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa vhane vha shumisa nnḓu dze vha ṋetshedzwa dzone nga muvhuso vha badela rennde nga nḓila fanaho na zwine miraḓo ya phalamennde vha itisa zwone.

src_text: Tici tetekuphepha titinhlangotsi letibalulekile ekuncunyweni kwemkhawulo wemanani futsi tehlakalo letingasitinhle takamuva teBaphatsimadolobha labafile noma labehlelwe tingoti tetemgwaco letimbi kabi kugcizelela kubaluleka kwaloludzaba futsi kufanele kususe loludzaba etinchakeleni tetepolitiki.
tgt_text: Zwi ḓo vha zwi si zwavhuḓi lavhelela uri Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa vhane vho ngo tsireledzea kha mishumo yavho ya zwino vha tou ḓiṱoḓela madzulo avho vhone vhaṋe musi vha tshi khou shumela lushaka..     Zwiendedzi zwine zwa shumiswa nga Dziminisṱa na Vhathusaminisṱa zwi elana zwavhuḓi na Ministerial Handbook nahone ndeme yazwo ya nṱhesa tiwa nga Minisṱa wa zwa Masheleni vha tshi khou shumisana na Minisṱa wa zwa Mapholisa nga ha zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo.

src_text: Onkhe Emalunga ePhalamende afanelwe kutfola lusito kubasebenti betinsita lababasitako ekwenteni imisebenti yabo.
tgt_text: Zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo ndi zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme musi hu tshi tiwa mitengo ya nṱhesa nahone zwiwo zwine zwa si vhe zwavhuḓi zwa zwenezwino zwa musi  dziMEC vha tshi lozwa matshilo avho kana vha vha kha khombo dza moḓoro dzi shushaho, zwi ombedzela ndeme ya fhungo iḽi nahone ḽi tei shumiswa nga nḓila ya ḓiṱoḓela mbuno dza zwa polotiki..     Miraḓo yoṱhe ya Phalamennde vha tewa nga vha na vhashumi vhavho vha thikhedzo vhane vha vha thusa kha ita mishumo yavho.

src_text: Imehluko yemanani ebasebenti betinsita emahhovisi eTindvuna angumphumela wesikhatsi lesitsite leNdvuna leyacashwa ngaso, ngoba bonkhe basebenti bachumene nesikhatsi sekuba sehhovisi leNdvuna letsite.
tgt_text: Phambano kha tshivhalo tsha vhashumi vha thikhedzo kha ofisi dza Dziminisṱa vha hone nga mulandu wa tshifhinga tshe Minisṱa onoyo tholwa ngatsho sa izwi vhashumi vhoṱhe vha tshi ṱumanywa na themo ya ofisi ya Minisṱa onoyo.

src_text: Loku kubangelwa kutsi Libhukwana Letindvuna liyidokhumenti lephilako lehlala njalo ibuyeketwa..     Mengameli wendlulisele leLibhukwana Letindvuna lanyalo kuKhomishini Letimele yeTekuholelwa Kwalabasemahhovisi Emisebenti Yahulumende, leselivele libukana netemiholo yalabasemahhovisi ahulumende kutsi ibuyeketwe     Tincumo Tekhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwo ralo nga mulandu wa uri Ministerial Handbook ndi ḽiṅwalo ḽine ḽa dzulela shandulwa misi yoṱhe..     Phresidennde vho rumela Ministerial Handbook ine ya vha hone zwazwino kha vha Khomishini ya nga ha Miholo ya Vhaofisiri vha kha Ofisi Khulwane dza Muvhuso yo Ḓiimisaho nga Yoṱhe ine zwazwino ndi yone ine ya sedzana na zwa miholo ya vhaofisiri vhoṱhe vha ofisi khulwane dza muvhuso uri senguluswe     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.

src_text: Inchubomgomo Leluhlaka yeTabomake Kutemidlalo.
tgt_text: Mvetamveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhafumakadzi vha zwa Mitambo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kugazethi luhlaka lweNchubomgomo yeTabomake Kutemidlalo kute ummango uphawule ngalo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso ha mvetamveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhafumakadzi vha zwa Mitambo hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo ibeka isethi yetinyatselo letifanele kutsi titsatfwe letitawukhutsata futsi tisekele besifazane kutemidlalo iphindze futsi icinisekise kutsi kunetinhlelo tekubukana nekungafani kwebulili emitsetfweni nasetinhlakeni tetemidlalo..     Iphindze ibukane netihibe tekungena kwebesifazane kutemidlalo njengekushoda kwetimali, lusito kanye nekungaholi ngalokwenele.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele bvisela khagala mutevhe wa maga ane ḓo ṱuṱuwedza na tikedza vhafumakadzi kha zwa mitambo khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na mbekanyamaitele dza fhelisa thaidzo dza tshayandingano ya zwa mbeu kha mitambo yo fhambanaho na zwiimiswa zwa hone dovha hafhu ya tandulula thaidzo dza zwikhukhulisi zwa dzhena ha vhafumakadzi kha mitambo zwi ngaho shayea ha masheleni, ndambedzo na miholo songo eḓanaho.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo lehlongotwako ihlose kukhutsata kwandza kwekutibandzakanya kwebesifazane kutemidlalo netebuholi njengekucecesha nekuphatsa..     Lenchubomgomo yemukela kutsi kwandza kwekutibandzakanya kwebesifazane kutemidlalo nasetikhundleni tebuholi kutawuncipha kakhulu bese kutsi ekugcineni kucedze kungalingani ngekwebulili kanye netinhlobo letehlukene tekubandlululwa kwebesifazane.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele ine ya khou dzinginywa yo livhiswa kha ṱuṱuwedza zwa shela mulenzhe ha vhafumakadzi kha zwa mitambo na vhurangaphanḓa nga nḓila yo engedzeaho fana na zwa vhugudisi na vha malogwane.

src_text: Iphindze futsi ikhutsate kulingana kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi besifazane batfola kuhlonishwa noma kunakwa ngekwebungcweti betemsebenti, lokufaka ekhatsi nemiholo lelinganako njengebalingani babo labadvuna.
Kungeniswa Kwengcungcutsela Yemave Emhlaba Yetemphilo Yabomake Netinswane Letisandza Kutalwa Yanga-.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele dzhiela nṱha uri zwa shela mulenzhe ha vhafumakadzi kha zwa mitambo na vhurangaphanḓa zwo engedzeaho, zwi ḓo fhungudza vhukuma khathihi na fhelisa lwa tshoṱhe zwa tshayandingano ya mbeu khathihi na zwiito zwo fhambanaho zwa khethululo itelwaho vhafumakadzi dovha hafhu ya lavhelela ṱuṱuwedza ndinganelo khathihi na vhona uri vhafumakadzi vha khou wana ṱhonifho na dzhielwa nṱha kha maimo phurofeshenaḽa, hu tshi katelwa na miholo linganaho sa vhashumisani vhavho vha vhanna farwa ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa nga ha Mutakalo wa Vhomme na Dzitshetshe dzavho -.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi igunyate kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ingenise Ingcungcutsela Yemave Emhlaba Yetemphilo Yabomake Netisandzakutalwa (tinswane Letisandza Kutalwa) letawubanjelwa eKapa kucala mhla ti-8 kuya kumhla ti-11 Inkhwekhweti 2023, lapho khona badlalindzima labavela emhlabeni jikelele labangetulu kwalaba-1 000 batawube babutsene kute kutsi baphutfumise ludzaba lwetisombululo tekwenta kancono kuphila kwabomake netinswane tabo letisandza kutalwa kanye nekuvikela kutalwa kwebantfwana sebashonile..     INingizimu Afrika yente inchubekelembili lenkhulu ekufezekiseni tinjongo teNtfutfuko Lesimeme yaMhlabuhlangene (i-UN) yetemphilo yamake nesisandzakutalwa sakhe, kanye nekuvikelwa kutala umntfwana asashonile.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṋea thendelo ya uri shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe ḽone ḽine ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa nga ha Mutakalo wa Vhomme na Dzitshetshe dzavho khaḽo fhaḽa Ḓoroboni ya Kapa bva nga ḽa  8 swika 11 Shundunthule 2023, une muṱangano uyo wa ḓo dzhenelwa nga vhashelamulenzhe vha swikaho 1 000 bva ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe vha tshi lingedza wana thandululo nga ṱavhanya dza khwinifhadza tshikhala tsha tshila ha vhomme na dzitshetshe dzavho khathihi na thivhela zwa bebwa ha vhana vho no lovha.

src_text: Lelive lakitsi litawuzuza kakhulu ngoba titfunywa talengcungcutsela titawukwabelana, emkhatsini walokunye, emasu ato lasebentako kanye netintfo letinsha letitsintsa imphilo yamake nesisandzakutalwa.
Umklamo Wendlela Yetemafa Emzabalazo Nenkhululeko (i-RLHR).
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane kha ndingedzo dza swikela Zwipikwa zwa Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu zwa Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UN) hu tshi itelwa mutakalo wa vhomme na dzitshetshe dzavho khathihi na zwa thivhelwa ha vhana vhane vha bebwa vho no lovha.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko lonemininingwane yenchubekelembili mayelana nekucala kusetjentwa kwemklamo we-RLHR.
tgt_text: Shango ḽashu ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa vhuelwa vhukuma musi vhueni ha muṱangano uyu vhu tshi ḓo vha vhu tshi khou kovhana zwinzhi nga ha pulane na mihumbulo yavho ine ya khou shuma zwavhuḓi ya nga ha mafhungo kwamaho mutakalo wa vhomme na dzitshetshe dzavho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yagunyata kutsi Indvuna yeTebudlelwane Bemave Emhlaba Nekubambisana kanye Netebulungiswa Nekucondziswa Kwesimilo babe yincenye yeLikomidi Letindvuna (i-IMC) le-RLHR..     Lomklamo we-RLHR ungumklamo wesikhumbuto savelonkhe lokuhloswe ngawo kutsi kukhunjulwe futsi kugujwe umkhosi wendlela yeNingizimu Afrika leya enkhululekweni.
tgt_text: Thandela ya nga ha Nḓila dza Vhufa ha Nndwa ya Mbofholowo na Mbofholowo  (RLHR).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi isungule i-IMC kutsi yengamele lomklamo futsi isite ngebuholi betepolitiki.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wo dodombedzwaho wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha thandela ya RLHR.

src_text: Loluhlelo luhlose kufaka tinhlobo letehlukene tesikhumbuto sekutinikela kwebalweli benkhululeko kute kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ikhululeke futsi ibe nentsandvo yelinyenti.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya tendela zwa uri Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa zwa Vhushaka ha Dzitshaka na Tshumisano khathihi na Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa  zwa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Ndulamiso vha vhe tshipiḓa tsha Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa (IMC) kha RLHR..     RLHR ndi thandela ya vhea mafhungo ṱhohoni ya lushaka yo livhiswaho kha fhululedza na pembelela nḓila ya Afrika Tshipembe ya livha kha mbofholowo.

src_text: Iphindze ivumele kwakhiwa kwemisamo, ematje esikhumbuto, imitapolwati netilulu temilandvo, futsi ihlose kucaphela umoya welubumbano nekubambisana emkhatsini kwema-Afrika.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo vhumba IMC itela lavhelesa thandela iyi khathihi na ṋetshedza vhurangaphanḓa ha zwa polotiki.

src_text: Igunyatwe yi-UN futsi inemandla ekucinisa kubambisana emkhatsini webantfu kusetjentiswa lisiko nemagugu kulo lonkhe lelivekati..     Imisebenti leminyentana leyentiwe nga-2022 ifaka ekhatsi kuvakasha kweNdvuna eBotswana naseZimbabwe kanye nekuhlela imihlangano ne-Angola kanye neTanzania..     Imisebenti lemayelana nalomsebenti ihlose kuchumanisa onkhe emave aseNingizimu ne-Afrika futsi ifundzise bantfu labasha ngemzabalazo wekulwa nebukoloni kanye nekubandlululwa ngekwelibala.
tgt_text: Thandela iyi ndi ine ya khou lavhelela katela tshaka dzo fhambanaho dza vhea mafhungo ṱhohoni nga ha vhuḓiṋetshedzeli he vhalwelambofholowo vha vhu ita vha tshi itela uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe shango ḽo vhofholowaho nahone ḽa demokirasi dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu kone fhaṱwa mimuziamu, zwihumbudzi, dziḽaiburari na mbulungelo nahone yo livhiswa kha dzhiela nṱha maitele vhuthihi na tshumisano vhukati ha vhathu vha Afrika.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo ngalokufanako ivumela kubuyiselwa ekhaya kwematsambo ebalweli benkhululeko baseNingizimu Afrika labangcwatjwa kulamanye emave.
tgt_text: Yo dovha hafhu ya khwaṱhisedzwa nga vha UN nahone na khonadzeo ya khwaṱhisa tshumisano vhukati ha vhathu na vhathu nga shumisa mvelele na vhufa mona na dzhango ḽoṱhe ḽa Afrika.

src_text: Kunemangcwaba lalinganiselwa kula-11 ebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika lakhonjiwe eZambia, lafaka ekhatsi elishanhlitiyo neLichawe lemzabalazo lokunguMnu.
Duma Nokwe..     Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekufaka Tebuciko, Temasiko Netemafa Kudijithali.
tgt_text: Vhunzhi ha mishumo ye ya itwa nga ṅwaha wa 2022 ndi ine ya katela madalo Minisṱa u ya ngei Botswana na Zimbabwe hu tshi katelwa na dzudzanya miṱangano na mashango ngaho Angola na Tanzania..     Mishumo ine ya khou itwa kha iyi thandela, ndi ye ya livhiswa kha ṱumanya mashango oṱhe Tshipembe ha Afrika khathihi na funza vhaswa nga ha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa vhukoḽoni na khethululo nga lukanda.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kuphunyeleliswa kweNchubomgomo Yavelonkhe yeKufaka Tebuciko, Temasiko Netemafa Kudijithali.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele na yone ita uri hu kone vha na khonadzeo dza vhuisela murahu hayani masalela vhalwelambofholowo vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vhe vha vhulungwa kha mashango nnḓa.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo iphindze futsi iphumelelise Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekwentiwa Kwetinsita Tetemafa kutsi tibe teDijithali lokwasungulwa Litiko Letebuciko Netemasiko nga-.
tgt_text: Mavhiḓa linganaho 11 ane ḓivhiwa sa mavhiḓa vhadzulapo vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe swika he ṱaluswa fhaḽa kha shango ḽa Zambia, hu tshi katelwa na iḽo ḽa Ḽizhakanḓila ḽa mulwelambofholowo Vho Duma Nokwe..     Mbekanyamaitele ya Lushaka ya nga ha ita uri Vhutsila, Mvelele na Vhufa zwi vhe nga nḓila ya Didzhithaḽa.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo igcila ekufakeni tinsita tetemafa kutedijithali ngekwenhloso yekutilondvolota, kufinyeleleka kanye nekulawulwa kwebuniyo.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamaitele ya Lushaka ya nga ha ita uri Vhutsila, Mvelele na Vhufa zwi vhe nga nḓila ya Didzhithaḽa uri thome shuma.

src_text: Nanoma-nje kukwenta kube kwedijithali kuyinchubo yekugucula lokucuketfwe kwe-analogi kube ngulokucuketfwe kwedijithali, lokufaka ekhatsi emarekhodi eliphepha, i-microfiche kanye nekucoshwa kwematheyiphu langasiwe ekwedijithali, lenchubomgomo ikhulise lenchazelo emitfonjeni yetedijithali njengelwati lolukhicitwe ngekwedijithali, lolungeke luguculwe lube simo salokuphatsekako.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi dovha hafhu ya khwaṱhisedza Mbekanyamaitele ya Lushaka ya nga ha ita uri Zwiko zwa Vhufa zwi vhe zwa Didzhithaḽa ye ya bveledzwa nga Muhasho wa Vhutsila na Mvelele wa kale nga ṅwaha wa.
Mbekanyamaitele yo lavhesesa kha zwa ita uri zwiko zwa vhufa zwi vhe zwa didzhithaḽa hu tshi itelwa uri zwi kone vhulungea swikelelea khathihi na uri hu kone vha na ndangulo ya vhuṋe.

src_text: Kwentiwa kube kwedijithali kutawuba tinzuzo letinkhulu kulelive njengoba kutawusita kufinyelela kalula emitfonjeni yelwati, ikakhulukati leyo lephetfwe tilululwati, imitapolwati kanye nemisamo.
tgt_text: Naho aya maitele u ita uri zwi vhe zwa didzhithaḽa tshi tou vha maitele u shandukisa mafhungo bva kha anaḽogo ya kha didzhithaḽa, hu tshi katelwa na rekhode dza mabambiri, microfiche na mafhungo rekhodiwaho kha theiphi dzine dza si vhe dza didzhithaḽa, mbekanyamaitele yo lapfisa ṱhalutshedzo iyi ya vho katela zwiko zwo dzulaho zwi zwa dzidzhithaḽa tou bva na mathomoni fana na mafhungo a bveledzwa nga nḓila ya didzhithaḽa ane nga si vhuye bva shandukiselwa ya kha tshivhumbeo tshi fareaho..     Aya maitele u ita uri zwiko izwi zwi vhe zwa didzhithaḽa ḓo vha na mbuelo nnzhi kha shango sa izwi tshi ḓo ita uri hu kone vha na tswikelo yo leluwaho ya zwiko zwa mafhungo, nga maanḓa izwo zwine zwa vha fhethu ha mbulungelo, dziḽaiburari na mimuziamu.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo itawusetjentiswa kuhulumende wonkhe kanye nasemmangweni wonkhe     Umtsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Mbekanyamaitele ḓo thoma shumiswa kha mihasho yoṱhe ya muvhuso na tshitshavha nga angaredza     Mulayotibe.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetebulungiswa Wanga-.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Vhulamukanyi, wa ṅwaha wa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetebulungiswa wanga-.
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Vhulamukanyi, wa ṅwaha wa 2023 ngei Phalamenndeni.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kuchibela Imitsetfo leminyenti lesetjentiswa Litiko Letebulungiswa NeMtsetfosisekelo ngekulungisa tindzaba tetebucwepheshe kanye netindzaba letitsintsa kusetjentiswa mbamba kweMitsetfo..     LoMtsetfosivivinyo ucuketse tindzinyana letinge-37 letihlongota tichibelo kute kutsi kulungiswe kungahambi kahle ngekwemtsetfosisekelo kwaleMitsetfo leyehlukahlukene     Imikhosi Letako.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khou lavhelala khwinisa Milayo yo fhambanaho ine ya vha nga fhasi ha ndangulo ya Muhasho wa zwa Vhulamukanyi na Mveledziso ya Ndayotewa nga tandulula mafhungo zwa thekiniki khathihi na zwithu zwine zwa kwama shumiswa ha Milayo nga nḓila re khagala.

src_text: Lilanga Lemalungelo Eluntfu.
tgt_text: Mulayotibe na zwiteṅwa zwa 37 zwine khazwo ha khou dzinginywa khwiniso itela khakhulula vhuṱudzeṱudze ha ndayotewa kha Milayo yo fhambanaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.

src_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawetfula inkhulumo yelilanga emkhosini wavelonkhe weLilanga Letemalungelo Eluntfu langa-2023 ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-21 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo  Enshonalanga yeDe Aar, eNyakatfo Kapa..     Ingcikitsisicubulo  itsi: “Kuhlanganisa Nekusimamisa Lisiko Lelilungelo Leluntfu Kuchubekela Embili Kulikusasa”, lapho sikhumbula kubulawa ngesibhuku nangebunyenti kwebantfu baseSharpeville nebakaLanga, kanye naleminye imishuco leyaba khona mhla tinge-21 Indlovulenkhulu 1960 kulo lonkhe lelive lakitsi.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Pfanelo dza Vhuthu.

src_text: Singuhulumende, sichubeka nekutinikela etibopheni tetfu temtsetfosisekelo tekuvikela emalungelo eluntfu abo bonkhe bantfu balelive letfu.
tgt_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ṋetshedza mulaedza wavho wa ḓuvha kha vhuṱambo ha lushaka ha elelwa Ḓuvha ḽa Pfanelo dza Vhuthu ha ṅwaha wa 2023 nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 21 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 fhaḽa Tshitediamu tsha De Aar West, kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Devhula..     Thero ya uno ṅwaha ndi ine ya ri: “U khwaṱhisa na Bvela Phanḓa na Maitele Pfanelo dza Vhuthu ho Livhiwa kha Vhumatshelo”, zwenezwo musi ri tshi khou elelwa mabulayo fhaḽa Sharpeville na Langa hu tshi katelwa na miṅwe migwalabo ye ya vha hone nga ḽa 21 Ṱhafamuhwe 1960 mona na shango ḽoṱhe..     Sa muvhuso, ri kha ḓi vha ro ḓiimisela kha zwa vhuḓifhinduleli ha ndayotewa ha tsireledza pfanelo dza vhuthu vhoṱhe fhano shangoni.

src_text: Asisebente sonkhe ngekubambisana kutsi kungabikhona lesimshiya emuva ekwenteni imigomo yeMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996 kanye neMculu Wemalungelo ube yintfo lephilwa mbamba yawonkhewonkhe..     Lilanga Lemhlaba Lemanti.
tgt_text: Kha ri shumisane itela vhona uri hu na ane khou salela murahu musi ri tshi khou lingedza ita uri mbetshelwa dza Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 khathihi na Mulayotibe wa Pfanelo zwi vhe zwithu zwine zwa kona swikelwa nga vhathu vhoṱhe.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawugubha Liviki Lemanti kusukela mhla tinge-20 kuya kumhla tinge-26 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsisicubulo letsi: “Kusheshisa Ingucuko”..     Leliviki lihlangana neLilanga Lemhlaba Letemanti mhla tinge-22 Indlovulenkhulu 2023, legcamisa kubaluleka kwemanti lahlantekile.
tgt_text: Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Maḓi ḽa Ḽifhasi.

src_text: Nanoma-nje kube netimvula letinkhulu etindzaweni letinyenti talelive, iNingizimu Afrika iyachubeka nekuba live leleswela emanti futsi isezingeni le-30 lemave lome kakhulu emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele.
tgt_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fhululedza Vhege ya zwa Maḓi ya Lushaka bva nga ḽa 20 swika ḽa 26 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U Ṱavhanyedzisa Tshanduko”..     Vhege iyi kho fhululedzwa nga tshifhinga tshithihi na  Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Maḓi ḽa Ḽifhasi nga ḽa 22 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023, ḽine ḽa vha ḓuvha ḽi ombedzelaho ndeme ya maḓi kunaho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icele tonkhe takhamuti kutsi tivikele imitfombo yetfu yemanti leligugu kakhulu njengetihlambo, njengoba tibaluleke kakhulu ngoba tingumtfombo wesikhatsi lesidze.
tgt_text: Naho ho vha na mvula dze dza na vhukuma zwenezwino kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa shango, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kha ḓi vha shango ḽi re na ṱhahelelo ya maḓi nahone ḽi dzhiiwa sa ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango 30 shayesaho maḓi ḽifhasini.

src_text: Sonkhe sinendzima lesifanele kutsi siyidlale songe emanti kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi imitfombo yetfu ayipheli..     Lilanga Lemhlaba Lesifo Semaphaphu  (i-TB).
tgt_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe ya uri vha tsireledze zwiko zwashu zwa maḓi fana na maroroma sa izwi hezwi zwi zwiko zwa ndeme kha zwa nḓisedzo ya maḓi ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Sekelamengameli Paul Mashatile utawetfula inkhulumo yelilanga ngelilanga lekukhunjulwa ngalokusemtsetfweni kweLilanga Lemhlaba Le-TB mhla tinge-24 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsisicubulo letsi: “Yebo!
tgt_text: Roṱhe, ri na zwine ra nga ita kha lingedza vhulunga maḓi khathihi na ita uri zwiko zwashu zwi si swike hune zwa nga xa..     Ḓuvha ḽa Vhulwadze ha Lufhiha (TB) ḽa Ḽifhasi.

src_text: Wena ukanye Nami Singayicedza i-TB”..     Lomkhosi losemtsetfweni lotawubanjelwa eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo i-Thlabane eNyakatfonshonalanga utawuphindze futsi ube sikhatsi sekutsi Umkhandlu Wavelonkhe WaseNingizimu Afrika Wete-AIDS kanye neLitiko Letemphilo wetfule Luhlelobuciko Lwavelonkhe Lwekusebenta lwanga-2023 kuya ku-2028 lwe-TB, i-HIV kanye neTifo Letitsatselwana Ecansini.
tgt_text: Muthusaphresidennde Vho Paul Mashatile vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi tsha ḓuvha nga tshifhinga tsha vhuṱambo ha tshiofisi ha elelwa nga ha Ḓuvha ḽa TB ḽa Ḽifhasi nga ḽa 24 Ṱhafamuhwe 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Ee!

src_text: Loku kwakhela kunchubekelembili lenkhulu letfolwe ngekugcila kabusha ekuvikeleni, ekwelapheni, ekutsatseni, ekufinyeleleni kanye nasekutfobeleni, kanye nekucedza lubandlululo nekukhishwa inyubatana  Imilayeto.
tgt_text: Nṋe na Vhone Ri nga Fhelisa Dwadze ḽa TB”..     Vhuṱambo ha tshiofisi vhune ha ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Tshiṱediamu tsha Thlabane vunḓuni ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela vhu ḓo thusa kha ḽa uri Khoro ya Lushaka ya Afrika Tshipembe ya nga ha AIDS khathihi na rwelwa ṱari ha Pulane ya Ndeme ya Lushaka ya nga ha Dwadze ḽa TB, HIV na ayo Fhiriselwaho nga zwa Vhudzekani kha miṅwaha ya bva nga 2023 swika kha.

src_text: KuhalaliselaIkhabhinethi yendlulisela kuhalalisa netilokotfo letinhle: Ecenjini lema-Protea kwanyalo langenise ema-West Indies mayelana neluvakasho lolumkhakhaminyenti.
tgt_text: Hezwi zwi khou tou vha ḓadzisa kha mvelaphanḓa khulwane vhukuma ye ya swikelwa nga mulandu wa tou lavhelesa tshoṱhe kha zwa thivhela ilafha shumisa mishonga na tevhedza vhiga na tevhedza khathihi na fhelisa zwiito zwoṱhe zwa khethululo na nyefula         Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ayo u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Thimu ya The Proteas ine zwazwino ya khou tamba na thimu ya West Indies kha madalo zwivhumbeo zwo fhambanaho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi imema bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi besekele licembu lema-Protea ngesikhatsi lichubeka liphakamisa umjeka wetfu.
tgt_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha tikedze thimu ya The Proteas zwenezwo musi tshi khou bvela phanḓa na fhefheḓisa fulaha yashu nṱha..     Maipfi ndiliso Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa na mashaka a: MEC wa Muhasho wa Pfunzo wa vunḓu ḽa Free State, Vho Tate Makgoe (60), vhe vha shela mulenzhe vhukuma kha sekhithara ya zwa pfunzo lwe vha fhedza vho kona ranga phanḓa zwavhuḓi vunḓu ḽa Free State kha uri ḽi wane tshikalo tsha nṱhesa tsha vhagudi vho phasaho maṱiriki kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miṋa nga tevhekana.

src_text: Emavi endvudvuto Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ekulilela nekudvudvuta imindeni nebangani: I-MEC yeTemfundvo yaseFree State Tate Makgoe (60), lowafaka ligalelo lelikhulu kakhulu emkhakheni wetemfundvo futsi wahola ngemphumelelo iFree State kutsi itfole lizinga lekuphumelela kamatekuletjeni lelisetulu kakhulu iminyaka lemine lelandzelanako.Mk.
tgt_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Maurencia Gillion, vhe vha vha vha tshi imela vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhukovhela kha Khoro ya Mavunḓu ya Lushaka vha dovha hafhu vha shuma na kha Komiti ya Tshumelo dza zwa Mutakalo na Matshilisano ya NCOP.

src_text: Maurencia Gillion, lobekamelele Inshonalanga Kapa kuMKhandlu Wavelonkhe Wetifundza, futsi lobekasebenta kuLikomidi Lavelonkhe Letifundza leTemphilo Netenhlalakahle.
tgt_text: Vho vha vhe mulwelambofholowo ḓivheaho nahone vho shumela vhathu vha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhukovhela, nga maanḓa kha zwipiḓa zwa vhupo ha mahayani zwa vunḓu ḽeneḽo lwa tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha minzhi.

src_text: Bekasishikashiki lesatiwa kakhulu futsi ubasebentele kakhulu bantfu baseNshonalanga Kapa, ikakhulu betindzawo tasemaphandleni, iminyaka leminyenti.UMnu.
tgt_text: Vho John Wills (66), ramilayo na mulwelambofholowo lwelaho pfanelo dza vhathu ḓivheaho we ḓo imela vhunzhi ha vharangaphanḓa vha zwa polotiki, hu tshi katelwa na  Phresidennde wa kale Vho Nelson Mandela.Vho Mark Pilgrim (54), muthu ḓivheaho kha zwa nyanḓadzamafhungo we dovha  ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhanzhi kha yeneyi nḓowetshumo ya zwa nyanḓadzamafhungo.

src_text: John Wills (66), lobekasishikashiki futsi angummeli wetemalungelo ebantfu lobekatiwa kakhulu lowamelela baholi betembusave labanyenti, kufaka ekhatsi Mengameli wesikhatsi lesendlulile Nelson Mandela.UMnu.
tgt_text: Mufumakadziwavhaṋe Vho Gloria Bosman (50), ramuzika na musiki wa dzinyimbo wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ane vha muwini wa pfufho dza zwa muzika dzo fhambanaho ane lidza muzika wa jazz   tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha musi ho ranga khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.

src_text: Mark Pilgrim (54), lobekawetindzaba lowafaka inshisekelo waphindze futsi wakhutsata bantfu labanyenti embonini yetindzaba.
tgt_text: Miraḓo ya Khorongeletshedzi ya Ndangulo ya Tshikimu tsha Vhuṋe ha Tshipiḓa tsha Mavu     Muambeli Vho Boyce Mkhize (Mudzulatshidulo)     Khosi Vho Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Muthusamudzulatshidulo)     Mufumakadzi Vho Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     Vho Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Muambeli Vho Nomonde Nokuthula January     Vho Iqbal Mohamed Motala; na     Dokotela Vho Vuyisani Moss..     Miraḓo ya Khomishini ya Vhomadzhisiṱaraṱa     Mufumakadzi Vho Nomzamo Zondo;(ii)    Vho Hanif Vally;(iii)    Dokotela Vho Cornelia September;(iv)    Vho Makgabhana Mokoena (vha khou tou dovha tholwa hafhu); na     Phurofesa Vho Estelle Hurter (vha khou tou dovha tholwa hafhu).
